original: dgag pa nyid kyi sgrub byed yin //ğŸ”½'di la du med pa reg phyir //
analyzed: dgag pa nyid kyi sgrub byed yin // 'di la du med pa reg phyir //
translated: are the proof of a negation.ğŸ”½Here there is no smoke, because there is the touch of snow.

original: me rgyu nus pa med pa'i phyir //ğŸ”½'di na du yod la reg med //
analyzed: me rgyu nus pa med pa'i phyir // 'di na du yod la reg med //
translated: Here there is no cause of fire, which is unobstructed and potent.ğŸ”½Here there is no touch of snow, because there is smoke.

original: grang rgyu nus pa med pa'o //
analyzed: grang rgyu nus pa med pa'o //
translated: Here there is no cause of cold, which is unobstructed and potent.

original: bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is a summary verse.

original: de ltar re zhig rnam pa gcig gis sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma brjod pa'i rgol ba dag tshar gcod pa'i gnas yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar re zhig rnam pa gcig gis sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma brjod pa'i rgol ba dag tshar gcod pa'i gnas yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: Thus, it has been shown that the opponent who does not state the part that establishes by way of one of these two is to be refuted.

original: de nyid rnam pa gzhan gyi thams cad bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid rnam pa gzhan gyi thams cad bstan pa ni /
translated: The same point is taught by way of another aspect:

original: yang na 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: yang na 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Or, this is the establishment of the object of expression.

original: tshig gi phrad kyis bsdu ba 'di yang 'dir 'jug pa dang sngar bstan pa'i don ma spangs par don gzhan bsdu ba la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: tshig gi phrad kyis bsdu ba 'di yang 'dir 'jug pa dang sngar bstan pa'i don ma spangs par don gzhan bsdu ba la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: This collection of words is also used here to collect the meaning that has been taught previously without abandoning it, and to collect another meaning.

original: 'di ltar gcod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar gcod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not like this, however.

original: yang na 'dis sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa'i don yongs su spangs nas rnam par brtag par bya ba yin na //
analyzed: yang na 'dis sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa'i don yongs su spangs nas rnam par brtag par bya ba yin na //
translated: Or, having abandoned the meaning of the establishment of the object of expression, etc., it is to be analyzed.

original: don rnam pa gnyis kyang brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don rnam pa gnyis kyang brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the two kinds of meaning are also intended to be expressed.

original: 'dir yang yang na'i sgras ni rnam grangs pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang yang na'i sgras ni rnam grangs pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i ste /
translated: Here, the word â€œorâ€ indicates an alternative establishment.

original: byed par sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: byed par sgrub pa'o //
translated: It is the establishment of the agent.

original: snga ma ni yod par sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma ni yod par sgrub pa'o //
translated: The former is the establishment of the existent.

original: 'di zhes pa ni yan lag gi sgra'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes pa ni yan lag gi sgra'o //
translated: The word this is a part of the expression.

original: tshig gi yan lag la snga ma ni byed pa por brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: tshig gi yan lag la snga ma ni byed pa por brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The word former in the expression the former is called the agent is a remainder.

original: tshul gsum pa'i rtags bstan pa bsdoms nas brjod pa yin gyi mtshan nyid gcig la sogs pa brjod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshul gsum pa'i rtags bstan pa bsdoms nas brjod pa yin gyi mtshan nyid gcig la sogs pa brjod pa ma yin te /
translated: The statement that the sign having the three modes is taught by combining the two is not a statement of a single characteristic, etc.

original: sgrub par byed pa spangs pas so //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa spangs pas so //
translated: Because it is abandoned by the proof.

original: chos mthun pa nyid can gyi sbyor ba'i blo ni gtan tshigs mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par brjod par yod mod kyi /
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid can gyi sbyor ba'i blo ni gtan tshigs mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par brjod par yod mod kyi /
translated: The cognition of the application having the property of the similar instance is indeed stated to exist in the similar class.

original: chos mi mthun pa brjod pas mi mthun pa'i phyir la med par de ma thag tu 'gegs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa brjod pas mi mthun pa'i phyir la med par de ma thag tu 'gegs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But because it is not stated in the dissimilar class, and because it is immediately negated in the dissimilar class.

original: de ji ltar de'i gcig brjod pa yang sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin no zhes bya ba 'dis phyis 'chad par 'gyur pa dang 'gal par mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar de'i gcig brjod pa yang sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin no zhes bya ba 'dis phyis 'chad par 'gyur pa dang 'gal par mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: How is it that the statement of one of them is not a part of the proof? This will be explained later. Is it not contradictory?

original: de yang de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang de lta ma yin no //
translated: That is not so.

original: 'di ltar tshul gsum po dag gi rtags kyi don gyi bdag nyid bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar tshul gsum po dag gi rtags kyi don gyi bdag nyid bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the meaning of the sign is taught to be the three modes.

original: don dam par na de'i rnam par gnas pas brjod pa @99a * //ğŸ”½yin no // gsal bar byed pa phyogs kyi chos brjod pa dang mthun pa'i phyogs la yong par brjod pa 'am /
analyzed: don dam par na de'i rnam par gnas pas brjod pa @99a * // yin no // gsal bar byed pa phyogs kyi chos brjod pa dang mthun pa'i phyogs la yong par brjod pa 'am /
translated: In the ultimate sense, it is expressed by its mode of subsistence.

original: phyogs kyi chos brjod pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par brjod pa nyi do //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos brjod pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par brjod pa nyi do //
translated: The expression of the property of the subject that is consistent with the expression of the similar instance, or the expression of the property of the subject that is inconsistent with the expression of the dissimilar instance, is the second member.

original: des na tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: des na tshogs pa'o //
translated: Thus, the two together are the second member.

original: de'i tshig gnyis po tshogs pa'i yan lag tu phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshig gnyis po tshogs pa'i yan lag tu phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa brjod pa'o //
translated: The expression of the property of the subject, etc., is a part of the collection of the two.

original: phyogs kyi chos kyi tshig ni mi g-yo ba yin la cig shos dag ni res 'ga' gzhan dang gzhan du ma yin pa des na /ğŸ”½tshig gnyis tshogs pa'i ngo bo'i yan lag can la /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos kyi tshig ni mi g-yo ba yin la cig shos dag ni res 'ga' gzhan dang gzhan du ma yin pa des na / tshig gnyis tshogs pa'i ngo bo'i yan lag can la /
translated: The expression of the property of the subject is the invariable, and the other two are not always so.

original: tshig gnyis rtag tu yan lag yin no //
analyzed: tshig gnyis rtag tu yan lag yin no //
translated: Therefore, the two expressions are always parts of the collection of the two.

original: da ni de'i yan lag gcig brjod kyang gnyis po dag 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: da ni de'i yan lag gcig brjod kyang gnyis po dag 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Now, even though one of its parts is expressed, not only the two are expressed, but also the three together are expressed.

original: sgrub pa'i yal lag tu brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i yal lag tu brjod pa yin no //
translated: The branches of the proof are mentioned.

original: bshad pa snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas smos pa yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas smos pa yin te /
translated: The earlier explanation is followed.

original: gnyis po mi brjod pa ni mi smra bar 'dug pas so //
analyzed: gnyis po mi brjod pa ni mi smra bar 'dug pas so //
translated: The two are not mentioned because they are not spoken.

original: rnam grangs gzhan yang de bzhin du zhes bya ba dang / de nyid kyi zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs gzhan yang de bzhin du zhes bya ba dang / de nyid kyi zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Another enumeration is â€œjust like thatâ€ and â€œjust that.â€

original: tshul gsum pa'i tshogs kyi tshogs gang yin pa'i yan lag gi cha shas so //
analyzed: tshul gsum pa'i tshogs kyi tshogs gang yin pa'i yan lag gi cha shas so //
translated: The collection of the three modes is a part of the branches.

original: ji ltar dam bca' ba la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag nyid ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar dam bca' ba la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag nyid ma yin zhe na /
translated: How are the thesis and so on not branches of the proof?

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: It is said:

original: dam bca' ba brjod pa ni dngos sam brgyud pas de grub pa mi skye'o //
analyzed: dam bca' ba brjod pa ni dngos sam brgyud pas de grub pa mi skye'o //
translated: The statement of the thesis does not directly or indirectly generate the arising of its establishment.

original: 'di ltar don dang 'brel pa kho nas don rtogs kyi sgras ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar don dang 'brel pa kho nas don rtogs kyi sgras ni ma yin no //
translated: In this way, the meaning is understood only through connection with the meaning, not through the words.

original: don dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no connection with the meaning.

original: de'i phyir dam bca' ba brjod pa 'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir dam bca' ba brjod pa 'am /
translated: Therefore, the statement of the thesis

original: gtan tshigs brjod pa ni dngos su sgrub par byed pa'i don mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs brjod pa ni dngos su sgrub par byed pa'i don mi 'grub ste /
translated: or the statement of the reason does not directly establish the meaning to be proven.

original: phyogs kyi tshig las the tshom za ba dang / don mthong ba las nges pa yin pa de'i tshe dngos su sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi tshig las the tshom za ba dang / don mthong ba las nges pa yin pa de'i tshe dngos su sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: When the opponent and proponent are uncertain from the words of the thesis, but are certain from seeing the meaning, then the thesis does not actually prove anything.

original: 'on te the tshom za ba kho nar ma grub ste /
analyzed: 'on te the tshom za ba kho nar ma grub ste /
translated: But if they are uncertain, then the thesis is not established,

original: phyogs kyi tshig las rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs kyi tshig las rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the opponent and proponent are uncertain from the words of the thesis.

original: de lta ma yin na gzhan du gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gzhan du gyur te /
translated: If that were not so, then the thesis would be inconclusive,

original: 'di ltar byas pa la sogs pa'i tshig las kyang mi mkhas pa rnams the tshom skye bas ma nges par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar byas pa la sogs pa'i tshig las kyang mi mkhas pa rnams the tshom skye bas ma nges par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: because even from the words â€œproductâ€ and so on, the ignorant would generate uncertainty.

original: 'di ni ma 'brel pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni ma 'brel pa yin te /
translated: This is not a proper objection,

original: chos can gcig la mi rtag pa la sogs pa shes par byed par 'dod pas /
analyzed: chos can gcig la mi rtag pa la sogs pa shes par byed par 'dod pas /
translated: because when one wishes to prove that a single subject is impermanent and so on,

original: yid ches par byed pa'i chos gnyis brtsis nas rgol ba dang phyir @99b rgol pa dag nges pa yin no //
analyzed: yid ches par byed pa'i chos gnyis brtsis nas rgol ba dang phyir @99b rgol pa dag nges pa yin no //
translated: the opponent and proponent are certain from the two properties that prove that.

original: re zhig dngos po gcig la brtson par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: re zhig dngos po gcig la brtson par mi 'gyur te /
translated: They do not become uncertain about a single thing.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba dag mi byed par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba dag mi byed par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that the proof would not be a correct application.

original: yid ches par byed par mi 'gyur te /ğŸ”½chos gnyis kyi dngos po gnyis su 'gyur la /
analyzed: yid ches par byed par mi 'gyur te / chos gnyis kyi dngos po gnyis su 'gyur la /
translated: It would not be convincing,ğŸ”½because the two properties would be two things,

original: dngos po gnyis kyi chos 'gal ba gnyis par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po gnyis kyi chos 'gal ba gnyis par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and it would follow that the two contradictory properties would be two things.

original: gang gi tshe dngos po gcig la tshad ma'i stobs kyis rgol ba las chos 'gal ba'i dngos po yin pa de'i tshe de dngos po gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe dngos po gcig la tshad ma'i stobs kyis rgol ba las chos 'gal ba'i dngos po yin pa de'i tshe de dngos po gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: When, by the power of a valid cognition, a property is ascertained as a thing that is contradictory with the opponentâ€™s thesis, then it is a property.

original: 'on te tshad ma'i stobs kyis nges pa ma yin na ni lung las rang nyid kyis go bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te tshad ma'i stobs kyis nges pa ma yin na ni lung las rang nyid kyis go bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is not ascertained by the power of a valid cognition, then it is understood by the opponentâ€™s own words.

original: 'di ltar gzhan yang chos gnyis tshad mas nges pa yin na /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan yang chos gnyis tshad mas nges pa yin na /
translated: Moreover, if the two properties are ascertained by a valid cognition,

original: ji ltar phyogs kyi tshig la the tshom za bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod do //
analyzed: ji ltar phyogs kyi tshig la the tshom za bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod do //
translated: then how could there be doubt about the words of the thesis?

original: de bas phyogs kyi tshig dngos su sgrub par byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de bas phyogs kyi tshig dngos su sgrub par byed pa ma yin la /
translated: Thus the words of the thesis are not a direct proof,

original: brgyud pas kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: brgyud pas kyang ma yin no //
translated: nor are they an indirect proof.

original: gtan tshigs ma grub pa dang dpe ltar snang ba bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa nyid kyis ston par mi nus pa'i phyir dang / gtan tshigs kyi tshig gis ston par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma grub pa dang dpe ltar snang ba bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa nyid kyis ston par mi nus pa'i phyir dang / gtan tshigs kyi tshig gis ston par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it cannot be demonstrated by the mere statement of the proposition, as is the case with an unestablished reason or a fallacious example, and because it cannot be demonstrated by the words of the reason.

original: gtan tshigs kyi nus par 'dod do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi nus par 'dod do //
translated: The words of the reason are accepted as the means of demonstrating the proposition.

original: 'on te sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu dam bca' ba'i tshig brjod par 'gyur yang gtan tshigs kyi tshig bzhin du sgrub par byed pa la phan 'dogs par byed pa'i yul gsal bar byed pa'i sgo nas dam bca' ba bsgrub par rjes su bzung ngo //
analyzed: 'on te sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu dam bca' ba'i tshig brjod par 'gyur yang gtan tshigs kyi tshig bzhin du sgrub par byed pa la phan 'dogs par byed pa'i yul gsal bar byed pa'i sgo nas dam bca' ba bsgrub par rjes su bzung ngo //
translated: Even if the words of the proposition are stated as a member of the proof, the proposition is accepted as being established by the words of the reason, because they clarify the object that is being helped in the proof, just as the words of the reason do.

original: de lta ma yin na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na /
translated: If that were not so,

original: de sgrub par byed pa'i yul du ma byas na 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de sgrub par byed pa'i yul du ma byas na 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then the proposition would not be engaged as the object of the proof.

original: shes pa dang bdag dang yid dang phrad pa la sogs pa yang sgrub par byed pa phan 'dogs par byed pa des na tshig nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: shes pa dang bdag dang yid dang phrad pa la sogs pa yang sgrub par byed pa phan 'dogs par byed pa des na tshig nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The words of the reason are also accepted as the means of demonstrating the proposition, because they clarify the object that is being helped in the proof, just as the words of the reason do.

original: 'dis kyang sgrub pa'i yan lag gi bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'dis kyang sgrub pa'i yan lag gi bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa ni /
translated: This also states the object to be established by the member of establishment.

original: dpe'i tshig bzhin du sgrub par byed pa'i yul gsal bar byas nas mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: dpe'i tshig bzhin du sgrub par byed pa'i yul gsal bar byas nas mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it clarifies the object of establishment as if it were the word of an example.

original: 'di yang shin tu don med pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di yang shin tu don med pa yin no //
translated: This is also completely meaningless.

original: gzhan gang gi phyir sgra la mi rtag pa'i sgrub pa ni sgrub par byed kyi tshig tu brjod par 'gyur ba'i sgrub par byed pa'i yul la phan btags bas gsal bar byed pa ma yin no //ğŸ”½de ma thag pa'i yan @100a * //
analyzed: gzhan gang gi phyir sgra la mi rtag pa'i sgrub pa ni sgrub par byed kyi tshig tu brjod par 'gyur ba'i sgrub par byed pa'i yul la phan btags bas gsal bar byed pa ma yin no // de ma thag pa'i yan @100a * //
translated: For, in the case of the establishment of sound as impermanent, the object of establishment is not clarified by the statement of the reason, because it is not benefited.

original: lag ni bsgrub bya bsgrubs pas yan lag ma yin na /
analyzed: lag ni bsgrub bya bsgrubs pas yan lag ma yin na /
translated: The immediately preceding member is not a member because it establishes the object to be established.

original: yul bstan pas nye bar sbyor ba gang la yin na /
analyzed: yul bstan pas nye bar sbyor ba gang la yin na /
translated: In what application is the object indicated?

original: gal te 'di med na bsgrub bya mi 'grub na ni thams cad mdzes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'di med na bsgrub bya mi 'grub na ni thams cad mdzes par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the object to be established is not established in the absence of that, then everything would be beautiful.

original: ji srid du de med kyang gang ji snyed pa'i byas pa dang yod pa mi rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: ji srid du de med kyang gang ji snyed pa'i byas pa dang yod pa mi rtag pa yin te /
translated: But as long as it does not exist, whatever is produced and exists is impermanent,

original: dper na bum pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na bum pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: like a pot, etc.

original: sgra yang byas pas zhes bya ba 'dis phyogs ma brjod kyang mi rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba go bar 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: sgra yang byas pas zhes bya ba 'dis phyogs ma brjod kyang mi rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba go bar 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: Also, the word â€œbecauseâ€ indicates that even though the term â€œdirectionâ€ is not stated, impermanence is understood.

original: de'i phyir 'di bstan pa'i don med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di bstan pa'i don med pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, this is pointless to teach.

original: gal te 'di phyin ci log tu gyur pa gtan tshigs kyi byed pa'i yul ston phyogs kyi tshig sbyar bar mi bya ba nyid na /
analyzed: gal te 'di phyin ci log tu gyur pa gtan tshigs kyi byed pa'i yul ston phyogs kyi tshig sbyar bar mi bya ba nyid na /
translated: If this is the case, then the object of the activity of the reason is the demonstration of error, and the term â€œdirectionâ€ should not be employed.

original: de ji ltar phyogs la brtan nas brjod pas phyogs kyi chos nyid la sogs pa grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ji ltar phyogs la brtan nas brjod pas phyogs kyi chos nyid la sogs pa grub par 'gyur /
translated: How then could the property of the position and so on be established by stating it in dependence on the position?

original: de dag nges pa'i bdag nyid yod par gyur pa de'i mthus phyogs rtogs pa ma yin na /
analyzed: de dag nges pa'i bdag nyid yod par gyur pa de'i mthus phyogs rtogs pa ma yin na /
translated: If the existence of those that have the nature of ascertainment is not understood by the power of that,

original: nus pa thob pa'i phyogs kyi stobs kyis phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa grub pa yin no zhes mi rigs te /
analyzed: nus pa thob pa'i phyogs kyi stobs kyis phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa grub pa yin no zhes mi rigs te /
translated: then it is illogical to say that the property of the position and so on are established by the power of the position that has obtained the capacity.

original: de dag yod pa la nus pa thob pa nyid kyi phyogs med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag yod pa la nus pa thob pa nyid kyi phyogs med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the existence of those that have obtained the capacity is not a position.

original: gzhan yang phyogs bstan pa 'dis phyogs kyi chos nyid la sogs pa shugs kyis 'ong ba sa phyogs kyi dbang gis phyogs chos la sogs pa 'grub po //
analyzed: gzhan yang phyogs bstan pa 'dis phyogs kyi chos nyid la sogs pa shugs kyis 'ong ba sa phyogs kyi dbang gis phyogs chos la sogs pa 'grub po //
translated: Moreover, by this indication of the position, the property of the position and so on come about implicitly, because the position is established by the power of the position.

original: phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa'i stobs kyis kyang phyogs yin no zhe na /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa'i stobs kyis kyang phyogs yin no zhe na /
translated: And by the power of the property of the position and so on, it is a position.

original: de la 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: de la 'dir brjod pa /
translated: Here, in response to that, it is said:

original: bsgrub byar byed pa'i dus su phyogs kyi chos nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yod par zad kyi /
analyzed: bsgrub byar byed pa'i dus su phyogs kyi chos nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yod par zad kyi /
translated: At the time of making the probandum, there is only the conception of the property of the position and so on.

original: gang la shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i chos can sgra la sogs pa 'am spra pa dang rta spangs la sogs pa mi'i gnas kyi chos can la byas pa nyid dang du pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rjes su dpag pas byed pa'i mngon sumğŸ”½gyis shes pa 'am /
analyzed: gang la shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i chos can sgra la sogs pa 'am spra pa dang rta spangs la sogs pa mi'i gnas kyi chos can la byas pa nyid dang du pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rjes su dpag pas byed pa'i mngon sum gyis shes pa 'am /
translated: The subject that possesses the particular that is desired to be known, such as sound and so on, or the subject that is the property of the human abode, such as a monkey or a horse, is made by the inference of the definition of being produced and having parts and so on.ğŸ”½It is known by the direct perception of the agent.

original: shes par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: shes par bya ba yin no //
translated: Or it is to be known.

original: de bye brag dang ldan par ma nges pa yin na gzhan bum pa'i tshad bang la sogs yod par dran par byed do //
analyzed: de bye brag dang ldan par ma nges pa yin na gzhan bum pa'i tshad bang la sogs yod par dran par byed do //
translated: If it is not ascertained as having a particular, then it causes one to remember the existence of another, such as the size of a pot.

original: de'i khyad par spangs pa ni nam mkha' 'am mtsho la sogs pa la med pa dran par byed do //
analyzed: de'i khyad par spangs pa ni nam mkha' 'am mtsho la sogs pa la med pa dran par byed do //
translated: If it is devoid of that particular, then it causes one to remember space, the ocean, etc.

original: de'i dngos po'i chos de dag med kyang phyogs kyi cho nyid la sogs pa brjod pas /
analyzed: de'i dngos po'i chos de dag med kyang phyogs kyi cho nyid la sogs pa brjod pas /
translated: Although those properties of the entity do not exist, by stating the nature of the direction, etc.,

original: de shes par 'dod pa'i chos can la @100b chos kyi bye brag shugs kyis brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de shes par 'dod pa'i chos can la @100b chos kyi bye brag shugs kyis brjod pa yin no //
translated: the particular property of the subject that is desired to be known is implicitly stated.

original: de yang 'di shugs kyi yul la phyogs zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de yang 'di shugs kyi yul la phyogs zhes brjod do //
translated: Moreover, that is implicitly called the subject.

original: de nas phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba rten pa'i ji ltar 'dod pa la phyogs kyi chos zhes btags so //
analyzed: de nas phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba rten pa'i ji ltar 'dod pa la phyogs kyi chos zhes btags so //
translated: Later, what arises in dependence is designated as the property of the subject according to one's desire.

original: bstan bcos kyi tha snyad kyi rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: bstan bcos kyi tha snyad kyi rgya cher bstan to //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of the terminology of the treatise.

original: gal te shes pa mthong ba'i gnas skabs kyi stobs kyis sgrub par byed pa'i dus su phyogs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te shes pa mthong ba'i gnas skabs kyi stobs kyis sgrub par byed pa'i dus su phyogs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: If it is established by the power of the cognition of the state of seeing, what is the conception of direction, etc. at the time of establishment?

original: dngos po'i chos gang la rgol ba'i gnas su gyur pa'i chos kyi khyab par sgrub par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos gang la rgol ba'i gnas su gyur pa'i chos kyi khyab par sgrub par 'dod pa'o //
translated: The property of the subject is the property that is to be established as pervading the subject.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs de'i chos gang yin pa'i chos ni mthun pa'i phyogs chos so //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs de'i chos gang yin pa'i chos ni mthun pa'i phyogs chos so //
translated: The property of the similar instance is the property that is the property of the similar instance.

original: rnal ma'i rnam pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi dang don mthun pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: rnal ma'i rnam pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi dang don mthun pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs so //
translated: The similar instance is that which is similar to the property of the subject in that it is the universal of the property to be established.

original: de spangs pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no zhe na /ğŸ”½gang yang sgrub par byed pa'i dus su phyogs kyi sbyor ba yod pa de yang phyi rol gyi yan lag ma yin pa'i phyogs brjod pa ni mi rtag go zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de spangs pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no zhe na / gang yang sgrub par byed pa'i dus su phyogs kyi sbyor ba yod pa de yang phyi rol gyi yan lag ma yin pa'i phyogs brjod pa ni mi rtag go zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The dissimilar instance is that which is devoid of that.ğŸ”½Also, when the proof is stated, the application of the reason is present. The statement of the subject is not an external member, because the subject is stated in order to indicate the basis of the property to be established.

original: 'on te gnas skabs can gzhan yin yang skabs kyi stobs kyis phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa dag brjod pa yin na de yang phyogs kyi sbyor ba sum 'byin pa la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: 'on te gnas skabs can gzhan yin yang skabs kyi stobs kyis phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa dag brjod pa yin na de yang phyogs kyi sbyor ba sum 'byin pa la yang mtshungs so //
translated: If, although the subject is not a member, the subject is stated by the power of the occasion, then the statement of the subject is similar to the statement of the property of the subject and so forth in the trimodal formulation of the proof.

original: de'i phyir dam bca' ba'i tshig gi sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yin pa dang / nye bar sbyar ba dang mjug bsdu ba'i tshig dag sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa de bzhin du brjod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir dam bca' ba'i tshig gi sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yin pa dang / nye bar sbyar ba dang mjug bsdu ba'i tshig dag sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa de bzhin du brjod do //
translated: Therefore, the words of the thesis are a part of the proof, and the words of the application and the conclusion are not a part of the proof.

original: de la re zhig dpe la ltos nas ni de bzhin nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: de la re zhig dpe la ltos nas ni de bzhin nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: In this regard, the application is like the example, and the conclusion is like the application.

original: de lta bu ma yin pa'i sgrub pa ni nye bar sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu ma yin pa'i sgrub pa ni nye bar sbyor ba'o //
translated: The application is not like that.

original: dper na de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni gzugs brnyan gyi don to //
analyzed: dper na de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni gzugs brnyan gyi don to //
translated: The meaning of â€œjust asâ€ is like a reflection.

original: 'dir gzugs brnyan yang ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir gzugs brnyan yang ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is a reflection here?

original: dper na gyur pa'i chos 'khrul pa med pa nyid du grub pa ni bsgrub par bya ba 'gyur ba dang chos mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dper na gyur pa'i chos 'khrul pa med pa nyid du grub pa ni bsgrub par bya ba 'gyur ba dang chos mtshungs pa yin no //

analyzed: de bzhin du 'di yang byas pas zhes bya bas bsgrub par bya ba srid pa ni nye bar sbyor ba'i don to //
translated: Similarly, the meaning of the application is the possibility of the probandum by â€œbecause it is produced.â€

analyzed: 'o na byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'dis srid pa ji ltar brjod ce na /
translated: But how is the possibility of the probandum stated by â€œbecause it is producedâ€?

original: ma brjod de /
analyzed: ma brjod de /

original: bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i chos tsam bstan pa'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½byas pa nyid ni bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i chos can bstan to //

translated: This

original: tshad ma'i 'thad pas dam bca' ba'i yul ni don ma lus pa las bzlog par thal bar 'gyur ba dgag pa'i phyir phyis brjod pa gang yin pa de ni mjug bsdu ba'o //

analyzed: dam bca' ba kho na yang brjod pa ni ma yin te /

analyzed: gang gi phyir sgrub pa ston pa ni /

analyzed: dam bca' ba yin la /

translated: and the demonstration of the established fact is not the application of the conclusion.ğŸ”½The word â€œalsoâ€ is seen in various places, such as â€œThis light also arises for a moment,â€ and â€œThis gandharva city is also seen.â€

analyzed: yang gi sgra yang sna tshogs pa la mthong ste 'od 'di yang thang cig 'byung ngo zhes brjod pa dang / dri za'i grong khyer 'di yang mthong zhes bya ba bzhin du 'dir yang gtan tshigs bstan pa ni shugs kyis nye bar sbyar ba'i nang du 'dus par bzung ste /
translated: Here, the statement of the reason is implicitly applied and is included in the statement of the thesis,

analyzed: dam bca' ba'i nang du 'du ba ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible for it to be included in the thesis.

original: dam bca' ba'i phyi nas gtan tshigs 'ga' zhig ston pa ni 'jug bsdu bar sbyor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i phyi nas gtan tshigs 'ga' zhig ston pa ni 'jug bsdu bar sbyor ba ma yin no //
translated: Some say that after the thesis, the reason is stated, but that is not a syllogism.

original: sgra mi rtag pa yin te byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag pa yin te byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Sound is impermanent because it is produced.ğŸ”½Therefore, sound is impermanent.

original: de'i phyir sgra mi rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba de yang dam bca' brjod pa las don tha dad pa brjod pa ni mjug bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra mi rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba de yang dam bca' brjod pa las don tha dad pa brjod pa ni mjug bsdu ba ste /
translated: That is a conclusion because it states a meaning different from the statement of the thesis.

original: dam bca' ba brjod pa la ngo bo tha dad par gyur ba'i gtan tshigs brjod pa'i dus phyis brjod pa'i phyir dpe brjod bzhin no //
analyzed: dam bca' ba brjod pa la ngo bo tha dad par gyur ba'i gtan tshigs brjod pa'i dus phyis brjod pa'i phyir dpe brjod bzhin no //
translated: It is like stating an example because it is stated after the statement of the thesis, which is a different entity from the statement of the reason.

original: mtha'i ngo bo mjug pa sdu ba'i sgra yang bsgrub bya'i don ston pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mtha'i ngo bo mjug pa sdu ba'i sgra yang bsgrub bya'i don ston pa ma yin te /
translated: The word â€œconcludeâ€ in the term â€œconclusionâ€ also does not indicate the meaning of the probandum.

original: de nges par gzung bar 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nges par gzung bar 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is definitely grasped.

original: gang yang 'gro bas na 'di rva can yin no zhes 'ga' zhig brjod pa de'i tshe rta ma yin no zhes brjod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gang yang 'gro bas na 'di rva can yin no zhes 'ga' zhig brjod pa de'i tshe rta ma yin no zhes brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like saying â€œThis is a horned animal because it goes,â€ and then saying â€œIt is not a horse.â€

original: de'i phyir spyi sgra dang lhan cig pa'i dag gis spyod pa'i yul du @101b yod pa ni bsgrub bya'i don bstan par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir spyi sgra dang lhan cig pa'i dag gis spyod pa'i yul du @101b yod pa ni bsgrub bya'i don bstan par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the thesis is not stated when the word â€œexistsâ€ is used in the phrase â€œexists as the object of activity of the eye,â€ because the reason is stated later.

analyzed: rgyu bstan pa'i dus phyis skye ba mthong ba'i phyir snga ma bzhin no zhe na /

original: de 'dir dgag par bya ste /
analyzed: de 'dir dgag par bya ste /
translated: Here we refute that.

original: mi rtag ste /
analyzed: mi rtag ste /
translated: Sound is impermanent.

analyzed: sgra 'di byas pa'i phyir ro zhes de skad du sbyor ba ni ma yin te /
translated: This is not the way to formulate the syllogism, â€œSound is impermanent because it is produced.â€

original: dam bca' ba'i sbyor ba ni de ma thag par gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i sbyor ba ni de ma thag par gsal ba'i phyir ro //

original: 'on kyang sgra ni byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang sgra ni byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: However, sound is impermanent because it is produced.

original: gang de lta bu yin pa de thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: gang de lta bu yin pa de thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin te /

original: dper na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //

original: yang na gang byas pa de thams cad mi rtag pa ste /
analyzed: yang na gang byas pa de thams cad mi rtag pa ste /

original: dper na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: like a pot, for example.ğŸ”½Sound is also like that, because it is produced.

analyzed: de bzhin du sgra yang byas pas zhes bya ba de lta bu gnyi ga de ltar 'dod par sbyor bar bya ste /

translated: Therefore, the other part of the application is a nonestablished reason, because it is like a snakeâ€™s eating a magical creation. It is not possible as a part.

analyzed: gang 'di yang grub pa'i don bstan pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mjug bsdu ba zlos par bshad pa yongs su spangs par brjod do //
translated: Also, it is said that the statement of the definition of the thesis that teaches the established meaning is completely abandoned, because it is explained as a repetition.

analyzed: mjug bsdu ba med par don bsgrub pa kho na yan lag lnga pa'i sgrub par byed par brjod par 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not tenable to say that the five parts are the proof of the mere establishment of the meaning without a conclusion.

original: de lta ma yin na mjug bsdu ba brjod pa don med de don grub pa'i phyir sgrub pa'i yan lag tu mjug bsdu ba sbyor bar bya ba dang / des kyang brjod par yang mi bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa ma grub par brjod pa yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na mjug bsdu ba brjod pa don med de don grub pa'i phyir sgrub pa'i yan lag tu mjug bsdu ba sbyor bar bya ba dang / des kyang brjod par yang mi bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa ma grub par brjod pa yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the statement of the conclusion would be pointless, because the meaning would be established. The conclusion would be applied as a part of the proof, and it would not be stated by that. Also, the statement of the nonestablished proof would be a thesis.

original: rmongs pa'i log par rtogs pa la ltos pa med pa la mi rtag pa nyid du grub par smra'o //
analyzed: rmongs pa'i log par rtogs pa la ltos pa med pa la mi rtag pa nyid du grub par smra'o //
translated: But you claim that impermanence is established without depending on a mistaken conception due to confusion.

original: mjug bsdu ba ni dam bca' pa'i yul gyi don tshad ma mtha' dag gi thabs gzhan ma lus pa'i yan lag dpyad nas mi rtag pa kho nar nges par bzung nas 'jug go zhe na /

translated: The conclusion is that, having analyzed all the other means of valid knowledge that are the objects of the thesis, one should definitely ascertain that sound is impermanent and then engage in the thesis.

original: de ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: But that is not tenable.

original: gal te tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa med pa de lta na shugs kyis bsgrub bya nyid nges par gzung ba yin no //ğŸ”½'di ltar gang byas pa yin pa ste /

translated: If it does not depend on another means of valid knowledge, then the probandum itself is ascertained implicitly.

original: mi rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa yin te /
translated: In that case, sound is impermanent because it is produced.

original: dper na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //ğŸ”½sgra yang byas pas zhes bya bas mi rtag pa nyid med par mi 'byung ba yin no //

translated: For example, it is like a pot.ğŸ”½Since sound is produced, it is not that impermanence does not occur.

analyzed: sgra las byas pa nyid yod par bshad pa de'i shugs kyis sgra mi rtag par nges pa yin no //
translated: Since it is explained that production exists in sound, impermanence is ascertained implicitly in sound.

original: des ni 'di brjod pa'i shugs rtogs par bya ba'i don shes par byed pa'i phyir yang brjod pa ni rgyu mi dmigs pa dang / 'dir yang bzlog par thal bar 'gyur bar cung zad tsam yang 'dogs par mi bya'o //ğŸ”½ngag gis de rnam par gcad pa'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i 'dir rgyur 'gyur te /

translated: Therefore, since the reason is understood by implication from the statement of the thesis, the statement of the reason is not stated, and the statement of the pervasion is not stated, because the meaning of the pervasion is understood by implication from the statement of the thesis.

analyzed: byas pa la mi rtag pa nyid khyab pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //

translated: Even if the property of the position does exist, it does not make one understand.

analyzed: de nyid kyis the tshom bskyed pas phyogs kyi tshig ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /

analyzed: the tshom skyed pa'i yan lag bstan pa yin no //

analyzed: de dag nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
translated: In order to clarify those,

analyzed: @103a * // phyogs kyis chos kyi tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: he says, â€œthe words of the property of the positionâ€ and so on.

original: 'dis ni de ma thag pa'i gtan tshigs de 'khrul par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni de ma thag pa'i gtan tshigs de 'khrul par brjod pa yin no //
translated: This states that the reason just given is mistaken.

original: 'o na 'brel pa ma bstan pa'i mnyan bya la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi chos sgrub pa'i yan lag ni mi mthun phyogs med pa nyid du 'khrul pa med pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: 'o na 'brel pa ma bstan pa'i mnyan bya la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi chos sgrub pa'i yan lag ni mi mthun phyogs med pa nyid du 'khrul pa med pa nyid ma yin /
translated: Well, the property of the position, the object of hearing and so on, which is not taught to be related, is not a proof that is free from the fault of the absence of the discordant side.

original: 'brel pa bstan pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag yin pa de'i tshe de las the tshom za ba'i ma nges pa tshigs med par ldog go //
analyzed: 'brel pa bstan pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag yin pa de'i tshe de las the tshom za ba'i ma nges pa tshigs med par ldog go //
translated: If the relation is taught, then the unestablished doubt, which is not removed, is removed.

original: 'di snyam du sems pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sems pa yin te /
translated: This is what is thought.

original: 'di'i phyogs kyi tshig dang mtshungs pa'i phyir de yang sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di'i phyogs kyi tshig dang mtshungs pa'i phyir de yang sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of the similarity of the words of this side, that also becomes the proof.

original: 'on te bstan pa ni bden na gal te yod pa ma yin na yang de las bsgrub bya mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on te bstan pa ni bden na gal te yod pa ma yin na yang de las bsgrub bya mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But if the teaching is true, then even if it does not exist, the probandum is not established from it.

original: brngas zin pa zor bas rnga bar byed pa ma yin na byed pa yang don ci zhig rgyas par byed /
analyzed: brngas zin pa zor bas rnga bar byed pa ma yin na byed pa yang don ci zhig rgyas par byed /
translated: If what has already been reaped is not reaped again with the sickle, then what is the point of the action?

original: 'brel pa ma bstan na gtan tshigs the tshom skyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa ma bstan na gtan tshigs the tshom skyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the relation is not taught, the reason gives rise to doubt.

original: de nyid kyis the tshom skye'o zhes 'chad do //
analyzed: de nyid kyis the tshom skye'o zhes 'chad do //
translated: It is explained that doubt arises from that itself.

original: gal te de lta na 'on te sbyor ba gzhan des bsgrub bya 'grub pa med pa'i phyir don med pa nyid de sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de lta na 'on te sbyor ba gzhan des bsgrub bya 'grub pa med pa'i phyir don med pa nyid de sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If that is so, then because the probandum is not established by that other application, it is pointless and does not become an application.

original: de lta ma yin na phyogs sgrub par byed par ji ltar nus par 'gyur /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na phyogs sgrub par byed par ji ltar nus par 'gyur /
translated: If it were not so, then how could it be possible to establish a position?

original: des kyang tshul gsum pa bstan pa'i gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa slob dpon gyis bshad pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des kyang tshul gsum pa bstan pa'i gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa slob dpon gyis bshad pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And it would contradict the explanation of the master Dignaga that an inference for the sake of others teaches the three modes.

original: de lta na phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel pa la brjod pas bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa ji ltar spong ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel pa la brjod pas bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa ji ltar spong ba yin zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then how can the statement of the thesis be avoided by the statement of the relation of the property of the subject?

original: 'gal ba med de phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel pa dag gis bsgrub bya brjod pa yin pas gsal bar byed pa la 'phangs pa de'i phyir gzhan dag phyogs dang nye bar sbyor bar byed /
analyzed: 'gal ba med de phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel pa dag gis bsgrub bya brjod pa yin pas gsal bar byed pa la 'phangs pa de'i phyir gzhan dag phyogs dang nye bar sbyor bar byed /
translated: There is no contradiction, because the statement of the relation of the property of the subject is the statement of the thesis. It is stated in order to clarify it. Therefore, others apply the position.

original: brjod pa la sogs pa sgrub par byed par khas blangs pa'i tshig spangs pa yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: brjod pa la sogs pa sgrub par byed par khas blangs pa'i tshig spangs pa yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: The statement of the thesis is avoided by the statement of the reason and so on, which is accepted as the proof. This has already been explained.

original: bshad pa'i don 'di yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa'i don 'di yin te /
translated: This is the meaning of the explanation.

original: gang gi phyir phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel pa nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis brjod par 'dod pa'i don grub pa'i rgyur rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel pa nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis brjod par 'dod pa'i don grub pa'i rgyur rigs pa yin te /
translated: Because it is logical that the relation of the property of the position itself is the reason for the establishment of the intended meaning by the forward and reverse pervasions.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not otherwise.

original: de'i phyir rjes su dpag par bya ba'i bstan pa'i don sgrub pa'i phyir phyogs kyis chos bstan pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin zhes 'gal bar byed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su dpag par bya ba'i bstan pa'i don sgrub pa'i phyir phyogs kyis chos bstan pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin zhes 'gal bar byed do //
translated: Therefore, the property of the position is taught for the purpose of establishing the meaning indicated by the inference, not for any other purpose.

original: phyogs brjod pa 'phangs pa ni gsal bar byed pa yin @103b no ;
analyzed: phyogs brjod pa 'phangs pa ni gsal bar byed pa yin @103b no ;
translated: The statement of the position is the instigation, and the statement of the reason is the clarification.ğŸ”½They means that the statement of the position is the same as the instigation of the statement of the trimodal reason.

original: / de dag gis zhes bya ba ni phyogs brjod pa ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags kyis 'phangs par brjod pa dang mtshungs so snyam nas rtags kyi tshig brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: / de dag gis zhes bya ba ni phyogs brjod pa ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags kyis 'phangs par brjod pa dang mtshungs so snyam nas rtags kyi tshig brjod pa yin te /
translated: The statement of the reason is the statement of the reason.

original: brjod pa dang don gcig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod pa dang don gcig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the statement and the meaning are the same.

original: de la kho bo cag ni rjes su dpag par bya ba bstan pa ni dpe dang gtan tshigs kyi yul du 'dod pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de la kho bo cag ni rjes su dpag par bya ba bstan pa ni dpe dang gtan tshigs kyi yul du 'dod pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
translated: In that regard, we do not contradict the statement of the inferendum because we assert that the example and the reason are the objects of the statement.

original: phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir te /
analyzed: phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir te /
translated: The word â€œbecauseâ€ means â€œfor what reason.â€

original: de rtog ge'i bstan bcos bden pa nyid brjod par bya ba yin pas 'brel pa mang po'i sbyor ba ni 'brel pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: de rtog ge'i bstan bcos bden pa nyid brjod par bya ba yin pas 'brel pa mang po'i sbyor ba ni 'brel pa med pa yin no //
translated: Since that is the subject matter of the treatise on logic, the application of many relations is meaningless.

original: gzhan de nyid kyis mtshan nyid log par rtogs pa'i bye brag dgag pa ni zhar la byung bas chog ste /
analyzed: gzhan de nyid kyis mtshan nyid log par rtogs pa'i bye brag dgag pa ni zhar la byung bas chog ste /
translated: The refutation of the otherâ€™s specific error in understanding the definition is sufficient as a digression.

original: rnal ma de nyid brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rnal ma de nyid brjod par bya'o //
translated: The truth should be stated.

original: de'i dngos po'i ngo bo sgrub pa'i yan lag ni gnyug ma'i don gyi chos sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag gang yin pa de nyid gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa ni tshig rkang pa gnyis yin no //
analyzed: de'i dngos po'i ngo bo sgrub pa'i yan lag ni gnyug ma'i don gyi chos sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag gang yin pa de nyid gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa ni tshig rkang pa gnyis yin no //
translated: The two lines, â€œThat which is not a means of establishing the nature of a thing . . .â€ are not a means of establishing the nature of a thing, which is the intrinsic object.

original: shes par 'dod pa ma yin pa ni phyir rgol bas so //
analyzed: shes par 'dod pa ma yin pa ni phyir rgol bas so //
translated: â€œNot intended to be knownâ€ means not intended to be known by the opponent.

original: bstan bcos la brten pa'i g-yo la sogs pa'i tshig ni 'brel pa med pa zhar la 'ongs pa ni dor bar bya ba tsam yin pas rgya cher brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos la brten pa'i g-yo la sogs pa'i tshig ni 'brel pa med pa zhar la 'ongs pa ni dor bar bya ba tsam yin pas rgya cher brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: The words â€œdeceitâ€ and so on, which are based on the treatise, are meaningless and are mere digressions that should be rejected. Therefore, they should not be elaborated on.

original: dper na blo dang dbang po dang yul dag gi tshogs las tha dad pa'i bdag yod dam med ces 'dri bar byed pa na rigs pa can gyis brjod pa /
analyzed: dper na blo dang dbang po dang yul dag gi tshogs las tha dad pa'i bdag yod dam med ces 'dri bar byed pa na rigs pa can gyis brjod pa /
translated: For example, when one asks, â€œIs there a self that is separate from the collection of mind, sense faculties, and objects?â€ the VaiÅ›eá¹£ika says:

original: tshad ma ni yod pa la sogs pa yul yin pa dang yul ma yi pa la khyad par med pa zhes bya ba'i yul can gyi kho bo'i mngon sum la sogs pa ni kho bo'i yul la sogs pa rog par byed pa dang shes pa rig par byağŸ”½ba tha dad pa'i shes pa ste /
analyzed: tshad ma ni yod pa la sogs pa yul yin pa dang yul ma yi pa la khyad par med pa zhes bya ba'i yul can gyi kho bo'i mngon sum la sogs pa ni kho bo'i yul la sogs pa rog par byed pa dang shes pa rig par bya ba tha dad pa'i shes pa ste /
translated: â€œThe object of valid knowledge is not different whether it exists or not, and so on. The subject, my perception, and so on, is a consciousness that is different from the object, and so on, that is known.ğŸ”½Because it arises in dependence on its cause, it is like the consciousness of another person.â€

original: rang gi rgyu la rag las pa'i skye ba dang ldan pa'i phyir skyes bu gzhan gyi shes pa bzhin no zhes bya ba dang / des na rdzas ni yod pa'i phyir mi rtag pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi rgyu la rag las pa'i skye ba dang ldan pa'i phyir skyes bu gzhan gyi shes pa bzhin no zhes bya ba dang / des na rdzas ni yod pa'i phyir mi rtag pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: â€œTherefore, because substance exists, it possesses impermanence.â€

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dang spyi dang khyad par bzhin no zhes bya ba ni rdzas dang yon tan dang las dag khyad par med pa'i phyir 'bad pa chen pos yod par sogs par khyad par med par smra'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dang spyi dang khyad par bzhin no zhes bya ba ni rdzas dang yon tan dang las dag khyad par med pa'i phyir 'bad pa chen pos yod par sogs par khyad par med par smra'o //
translated: Since substance, quality, and action are not distinguished, they say that existence, etc. are not distinguished.

original: yod pa la sogs pa ni yul dang yul ma yin pa la khyad par med pa'i shes bya'i yul nyid du chos kyi khyad par rnam pa 'ga' zhig med kyang rnam pa'i bsgrub bya sgrub pa la phan @104a * //
analyzed: yod pa la sogs pa ni yul dang yul ma yin pa la khyad par med pa'i shes bya'i yul nyid du chos kyi khyad par rnam pa 'ga' zhig med kyang rnam pa'i bsgrub bya sgrub pa la phan @104a * //
translated: Existence, etc. are not distinguished as to whether they are the objects or non-objects of cognition. Even though there is no difference in the mode of the object of cognition, they are useful for establishing the probandum of the mode.

original: dogs pa'i gtan tshigs su rjes su brjod par gzhan mi shes pa'i rjes su brjod pa la sogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dogs pa'i gtan tshigs su rjes su brjod par gzhan mi shes pa'i rjes su brjod pa la sogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are not like the expressions of others who do not understand, such as â€œnon-cognition of other.â€

original: 'dir sgrub pa la sogs pa brjod bas lan gzhan gyis khong du chud par byed pa'i nus pa gnod pa'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya bar yongs su gzung bar bya'i zhar la byung ba gang yin pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'dir sgrub pa la sogs pa brjod bas lan gzhan gyis khong du chud par byed pa'i nus pa gnod pa'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya bar yongs su gzung bar bya'i zhar la byung ba gang yin pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Here, the expression of proof, etc. is the reason for refuting the ability to understand the reply by another means. It should be understood as â€œthe reason for refuting the ability to understand the reply by another means,â€ not as â€œwhatever is extraneous.â€

original: bdag med par smra ba la dpe ji lta bu zhig smra bar byed ce na /
analyzed: bdag med par smra ba la dpe ji lta bu zhig smra bar byed ce na /
translated: What example do we give to those who propound selflessness?ğŸ”½We give the example of the Buddha, who, by refuting the mass of errors such as substantialism and by teaching the doctrine of the Sugata, the discipline of the selflessness of persons, completely removes the banner of pride of those who propound the self.

original: gang la rdzas la sogs pa'i skyon gyi tshogs dgag pa dang / sgrub pa'i bde bar gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'dul bas kyang bdag tu smra ba'i nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan ma lus pa sel bar byed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa des na glu dang gar la sogs ba ston par byed pa'i zhar la byung ba yin
analyzed: gang la rdzas la sogs pa'i skyon gyi tshogs dgag pa dang / sgrub pa'i bde bar gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'dul bas kyang bdag tu smra ba'i nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan ma lus pa sel bar byed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa des na glu dang gar la sogs ba ston par byed pa'i zhar la byung ba yin
translated: Thus, the teaching of the Buddha is a digression from the topic of the teaching of song, dance, and so on.

original: no // de la gzhan dag dang gzhan dag la ni lta smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: no // de la gzhan dag dang gzhan dag la ni lta smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: What need is there to mention others?

original: 'o na ni kho bo cag sangs rgyas pas brjod pa yin no zhes ji srid du dgag pa bye brag dang bcas pa brjod pa ji ltar yin /
analyzed: 'o na ni kho bo cag sangs rgyas pas brjod pa yin no zhes ji srid du dgag pa bye brag dang bcas pa brjod pa ji ltar yin /
translated: But how can you say that we Buddhists make the above statements, since we have already made a specific refutation of them?

original: kho bo cag sangs rgyas pa 'di skad brjod do zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: kho bo cag sangs rgyas pa 'di skad brjod do zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: We Buddhists say that the Buddha said this.

original: dper na bdag med brjod do zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bdag med brjod do zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, we say that the Buddha taught selflessness.

original: mang po rnams la mang po'i tshig gis brjod par mi nus pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mang po rnams la mang po'i tshig gis brjod par mi nus pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that it is not possible to express the many by the word many.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni brjod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni brjod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is because of the expression â€œthat which,â€

original: de lta yin te /
analyzed: de lta yin te /
translated: then that is so.

original: gang gi phyir 'di rang gi phyogs pa dag nyid gzhan 'ba' zhig yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di rang gi phyogs pa dag nyid gzhan 'ba' zhig yin gyi /
translated: Because it is only for those who are on oneâ€™s own side,

original: gzhan la ltos nas mang po'i sgra de bzhin du sbyar ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan la ltos nas mang po'i sgra de bzhin du sbyar ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: the word many is applied in that way, not in relation to others.

original: 'di 'dra ba nyid rgol bar 'dod pas dper brjod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba nyid rgol bar 'dod pas dper brjod pa yin gyi /
translated: The challenger wishes to cite an example of just this kind,

original: gzhan dag la ma yin pa ni brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag la ma yin pa ni brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: not of others, because of the expression â€œthat which.â€

original: yang na rmongs pas smra la mngon par zhan pa'i phyir 'di nyid brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na rmongs pas smra la mngon par zhan pa'i phyir 'di nyid brjod pa yin no //
translated: Or, because of the expression of shamelessness in speech due to delusion, this is stated.

original: de lta na yang sgra'i bstan bcos ni don med par bstan par 'gyur ba de nyid kyi phyir shing rta chen po ba gzhan gyis rgyal po khyed pas kho bo cag ni 'khor gyis brten pa'i slob dpon gyis shes rab kyis mngon par rlom mo zhes bya ba
analyzed: de lta na yang sgra'i bstan bcos ni don med par bstan par 'gyur ba de nyid kyi phyir shing rta chen po ba gzhan gyis rgyal po khyed pas kho bo cag ni 'khor gyis brten pa'i slob dpon gyis shes rab kyis mngon par rlom mo zhes bya ba
translated: Even so, because the treatise on grammar is shown to be pointless, the other great charioteers say, â€œO King, we are arrogant due to our wisdom, supported by our retinue.â€

original: 'di brjod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'di brjod pa lta bu'o //
translated: This is like the statement.

original: mkhas pa dam pa ni dam pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ji ltar bzhad gad byed pa yin /
analyzed: mkhas pa dam pa ni dam pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ji ltar bzhad gad byed pa yin /
translated: How can a true expert, who possesses a holy mind, make a joke?

original: kye ma zhes bya ba 'dir kha bskang bar @104b bya'o //
analyzed: kye ma zhes bya ba 'dir kha bskang bar @104b bya'o //
translated: Alas!

original: tshad ma'i mtshan nyid bcu gnyis rgyas par spros nas ston pa ni rgyal dpog pa'i bstan bcos las de yang rgyal ba pa'i 'dod pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma'i mtshan nyid bcu gnyis rgyas par spros nas ston pa ni rgyal dpog pa'i bstan bcos las de yang rgyal ba pa'i 'dod pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: Having elaborated extensively on the twelve characteristics of valid cognition, the treatise of Jayanta teaches them.

original: de na rtag par dam bca' ba de kho na nyid kyi rten sgra dang bum pa las gang yang rung ba'i gnyis pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i dam bca' ba 'di nye bar bkod nas /
analyzed: de na rtag par dam bca' ba de kho na nyid kyi rten sgra dang bum pa las gang yang rung ba'i gnyis pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i dam bca' ba 'di nye bar bkod nas /
translated: There, having stated the thesis that sound and a pot are both permanent and impermanent, he formulates the thesis that sound and a pot are both permanent and impermanent.

original: mtshan nyid bcu gnyis la sogs pa'i tshig gis lan 'debs par byed do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid bcu gnyis la sogs pa'i tshig gis lan 'debs par byed do //
translated: Then, using the words â€œtwelve characteristics,â€ he replies.

original: re zhig tshad ma'i mtshan nyid gcig yun ring po nas brjod pas mtshan nyid kyi chos rig pa ni 'jug par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: re zhig tshad ma'i mtshan nyid gcig yun ring po nas brjod pas mtshan nyid kyi chos rig pa ni 'jug par byed pa yin no //
translated: First, by stating one characteristic of valid cognition for a long time, he makes known the characteristic of valid cognition.

original: 'jug pa'i tshig gis byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang phra ba dang bar du chod pa dang / bskal ba'i don bstan pa la cung zad cig kyang dbang po rtogs par nus pa med do //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i tshig gis byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang phra ba dang bar du chod pa dang / bskal ba'i don bstan pa la cung zad cig kyang dbang po rtogs par nus pa med do //
translated: By the words of the commentary, one cannot understand even a little of what is taught, namely, the meaning of the kalpa, because of the subtlety, the remoteness, and the interruption of the past and future.

original: 'di ltar yod pa dang 'brel pa'i skyes bu'i dbang po las kyang skyes pa ni mngon sum yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar yod pa dang 'brel pa'i skyes bu'i dbang po las kyang skyes pa ni mngon sum yin te /
translated: Thus, perception is that which arises from the sense faculty of a person who is connected with the present.

original: rgyu med par rig par bya ba dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu med par rig par bya ba dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is to be known as causeless, because it is the apprehension of an object.

original: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ba nyid grub pa med par yang mi rtogs pa nyid grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ba nyid grub pa med par yang mi rtogs pa nyid grub pa ma yin te /
translated: And the suffering of conditioned existence is not established without the establishment of non-apprehension.

original: rten cing 'brel par ma byung ba la skad cig ma rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par ma byung ba la skad cig ma rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because momentariness is not reasonable in what is not dependently arisen.

original: de ltar na de ni de dang 'dra ba'i chos logs shig tu brjod par bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na de ni de dang 'dra ba'i chos logs shig tu brjod par bya'o zhe na /
translated: Thus, it should be stated separately as a phenomenon similar to that.

original: de ltar na yang dngos po'i chos ma smras su zin kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ltar na yang dngos po'i chos ma smras su zin kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Even so, although the phenomenon of entity is not stated, etc.

original: rnam pa de lta bu ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir rgol bas shes par 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir rgol bas shes par 'dod pa yin te /
translated: Because it is included within the property to be established, the opponent wishes to know it.

original: de ni de las logs shig tu ni dam bca' ba las gzhan pa gtan tshigs dang dpes so //
analyzed: de ni de las logs shig tu ni dam bca' ba las gzhan pa gtan tshigs dang dpes so //
translated: But it is not stated separately from the thesis, by means of the reason and example.

original: gang gi tshe 'di dag sgrub pa'i yan lag ma brjod pa'i ji skad bshad pa'i tshar gcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di dag sgrub pa'i yan lag ma brjod pa'i ji skad bshad pa'i tshar gcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: When are these not stated as parts of the proof?

original: bshad pa / rgol bas de ltar dngos po sgrub pa'i yan lag ma brjod pa dang / lan brjod pa gang yin pa des ni gnyis las gcig kyang rgyal ba dang pham par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / rgol bas de ltar dngos po sgrub pa'i yan lag ma brjod pa dang / lan brjod pa gang yin pa des ni gnyis las gcig kyang rgyal ba dang pham par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Response: When the proponent does not state those parts of the proof and the opponent does not state a response, neither will be victorious or defeated.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /ğŸ”½sgrub par byed pa ma brjod pa'i phyir rgol ba rgyal ba med pa 'am //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / sgrub par byed pa ma brjod pa'i phyir rgol ba rgyal ba med pa 'am //
translated: Why is that?ğŸ”½Because the proponent does not state a proof, he is not defeated.

original: phyir rgol bas de'i dngos po ma rtogs pa'i phyir pham pa yang med de de ni sgrub pa la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir rgol bas de'i dngos po ma rtogs pa'i phyir pham pa yang med de de ni sgrub pa la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the opponent does not understand that property, he is not victorious, because that depends on the proof.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rgol ba la yang de dag la med pa'i yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rgol ba la yang de dag la med pa'i yin no //
translated: Therefore, they are not in the opponent.

original: @105a * // da ni phyir rgol bar tshar gcad pa'i gnas pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: @105a * // da ni phyir rgol bar tshar gcad pa'i gnas pa bstan pa ni /
translated: Now, the topic of refuting the opponent is taught.

original: rgol ba skyon mi brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rgol ba skyon mi brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, â€œThe opponent does not state a fault,â€ and so on.

original: yul gang las shes par 'dod pa dag la'o //
analyzed: yul gang las shes par 'dod pa dag la'o //
translated: It is with regard to those who wish to know the object.

original: shes par mi 'dod pa la yang skyon mi brjod pa ni nyes pa ma yin no snyam du dgongs so //
analyzed: shes par mi 'dod pa la yang skyon mi brjod pa ni nyes pa ma yin no snyam du dgongs so //
translated: It is not a fault not to state a fault to those who do not wish to know.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i skyon de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i skyon de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the fault of the proof?ğŸ”½It is said:

original: bshad pa / ma tshang ba nyid ni drug ste /
analyzed: bshad pa / ma tshang ba nyid ni drug ste /
translated: There are six incompletions.

original: re re dang gnyis gnyis kyis sgrub par ma brjod pa'o //
analyzed: re re dang gnyis gnyis kyis sgrub par ma brjod pa'o //
translated: It is not stated to be a proof by each one and by two.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa cig car sbyor ba ma yin na rnam pa drug tu ma tshang ba'i skyon ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa cig car sbyor ba ma yin na rnam pa drug tu ma tshang ba'i skyon ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is not applied simultaneously to the presence and absence in the similar and dissimilar classes, how can the six types of incompletion be accepted?

original: gang gi cha thams cad las nye bar sbyor ba las khyab pa dag tha dad pa de la ltos pa des na 'di rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: gang gi cha thams cad las nye bar sbyor ba las khyab pa dag tha dad pa de la ltos pa des na 'di rnam par gzhag go //
translated: That which is pervaded by the application of all its parts is established in dependence on that which is the basis of the pervasion.

original: 'o na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag la ma bstan pa la sogs pa de'i tshe yang dpe'i skyon du 'gyur bar brjod par bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag la ma bstan pa la sogs pa de'i tshe yang dpe'i skyon du 'gyur bar brjod par bya'o zhe na /
translated: But if the pervasion is not stated, then the fault of the example will be stated.

original: 'di gzhan la skyon du 'gyur yang gtan tshigs la skyon gcig kho na dang ldan par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'di gzhan la skyon du 'gyur yang gtan tshigs la skyon gcig kho na dang ldan par mi 'gyur la /
translated: Although this is a fault in the other, it is not a fault in the reason.

original: dpe ltar snang ba bco brgyad kyi dper brjod pa ni rigs pa'i thigs par rgyas par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: dpe ltar snang ba bco brgyad kyi dper brjod pa ni rigs pa'i thigs par rgyas par blta bar bya'o //
translated: The eighteen pseudo-examples should be seen in detail in the Tarka-samgraha.

original: de dag sgra gang dang gang gis blta bar bya ba ma brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de dag sgra gang dang gang gis blta bar bya ba ma brjod pa'o //
translated: They are not stated by any word.

original: ma brjod pa de yang rnam pa gsum gyi rgyus yin te /
analyzed: ma brjod pa de yang rnam pa gsum gyi rgyus yin te /
translated: That non-statement is due to three kinds of causes.

original: de yang sgrub par byed pa'i skyon med pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de yang sgrub par byed pa'i skyon med pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: And that is stated by the faultlessness of the proof, etc.

original: 'o na sgrub par byed pa skyon med pa brjod pa la rgol bas skyon brjod pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas rigs pa yin na skyon dang bcas pa nyid la shes pa nus pa med pa dag gis skyon ma brjod kyang rgol bas sgrub par byed pa skyon can
analyzed: 'o na sgrub par byed pa skyon med pa brjod pa la rgol bas skyon brjod pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas rigs pa yin na skyon dang bcas pa nyid la shes pa nus pa med pa dag gis skyon ma brjod kyang rgol bas sgrub par byed pa skyon can
translated: Well, if it is logical that the proponent is defeated when the opponent exposes a fault in the proponentâ€™s flawless proof, then even if the opponent does not expose a fault in the proponentâ€™s faulty proof, the proponent is still defeated because the proponent applies the faulty proof.

original: sbyar ba'i phyir rgol ba pham par rnam par gzhag phyir rgol ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sbyar ba'i phyir rgol ba pham par rnam par gzhag phyir rgol ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the proponent is defeated, not the opponent.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, we say:

original: sgrub par byed pa skyon can brjod pa yin yang zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa skyon can brjod pa yin yang zhes bya'o //
translated: Even if the proponent states a faulty proof,

original: gal te rgol bas phyir rgol ba spangs pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa skyon can yin pa de lta na yang des ci'i phyir pham par ma gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rgol bas phyir rgol ba spangs pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa skyon can yin pa de lta na yang des ci'i phyir pham par ma gyur zhe na /
translated: if the opponent abandons the debate, then even though the proponentâ€™s proof is faulty, why is the proponent not defeated?

original: 'ba' zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: To answer this, he says â€œaloneâ€ and so on.
