analyzed: gtan tshigs khyad par bstan pas gtan tshigs gzhan du gyur pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin pas 'di ni shin tu rigs pa yin no //
translated: Since the reason together with its qualification is stated, the opponentâ€™s thesis is a case of defeat. Therefore this is quite reasonable.

original: 'di ltar phyogs kyi chos nyid mkhas pa'i blos rnam par dpyod pa na /
analyzed: 'di ltar phyogs kyi chos nyid mkhas pa'i blos rnam par dpyod pa na /
translated: Thus, when the nature of the property of the subject is analyzed by the intelligent mind,

original: dam bca' ba gzhan par bshad par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam bca' ba gzhan par bshad par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not established as another thesis.

original: gang gi tshe gtan tshigs kyi khyad par du bstan pas gtan tshigs gzhan pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar gzhan gyis brjod pa de'i tshe shin tu mdzes pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe gtan tshigs kyi khyad par du bstan pas gtan tshigs gzhan pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar gzhan gyis brjod pa de'i tshe shin tu mdzes pa yin no //
translated: When another states a reason that is different from the one stated, then it is very beautiful to say that it is a case of defeat by reason of the difference in the reason.

original: gang gi phyir de nyid yin pa ni @109a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de nyid yin pa ni @109a * //
translated: Because that very reason is stated,

original: blo'i dam bcas pa gzhan pa ni 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo'i dam bcas pa gzhan pa ni 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: another thesis of the mind is not related.

original: dpe brjod pa dang chos mthun pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: dpe brjod pa dang chos mthun pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: The statement of an example, etc.

original: chos mthun pa'i bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs yin gyi /
analyzed: chos mthun pa'i bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs yin gyi /
translated: A reason is that which proves the probandum through similarity.

original: de'i dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya ba ston pa'i dam bca' ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya ba ston pa'i dam bca' ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no other thesis that shows the definition of the thesis, which is the probandum.

original: khas blangs pa 'dis dam bca' ba dam bca' bas sgrub par byed na dam bca' ba tsam gyis spangs pa ni 'dod par grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khas blangs pa 'dis dam bca' ba dam bca' bas sgrub par byed na dam bca' ba tsam gyis spangs pa ni 'dod par grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If this thesis is established by the thesis through acceptance, then the mere thesis is not established as the desired conclusion.

original: des kyang dang po'i snga ma las dam bca' ba'i gzhan pa yin du zin kyang gtan tshigs dbang pos gzung bar bya ba mi brjod do //
analyzed: des kyang dang po'i snga ma las dam bca' ba'i gzhan pa yin du zin kyang gtan tshigs dbang pos gzung bar bya ba mi brjod do //
translated: Even though the latter is different from the former, the reason is not stated to be perceptible by the senses.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa 'di lta bu'i dam bca' ba sgrub pa'i ched du dam bca' gzhan pa sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba ni byis pas brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa 'di lta bu'i dam bca' ba sgrub pa'i ched du dam bca' gzhan pa sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba ni byis pas brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the statement that another thesis is proved for the sake of proving a thesis of this kind is the utterance of a fool.

original: ngo bo 'di lta bu la gzhan dag dgos pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo 'di lta bu la gzhan dag dgos pa'o //
translated: The need for another thesis is of this kind.

original: mtshan nyid nges pa ni 'brel pa med pa kho na nas yin no ;
analyzed: mtshan nyid nges pa ni 'brel pa med pa kho na nas yin no ;
translated: The definition is ascertained only from the absence of connection.

original: / dam bca' ba gzhan par brjod pa ni /
analyzed: / dam bca' ba gzhan par brjod pa ni /
translated: The statement of another thesis

original: dam bca' ba gzhan pa zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas 'di gang zhig yin //ğŸ”½'on te mtshan nyid 'di 'dra'o //
analyzed: dam bca' ba gzhan pa zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas 'di gang zhig yin // 'on te mtshan nyid 'di 'dra'o //
translated: What is this topic of refutation, namely, another thesis?

original: zhes pa'i nges pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa'i nges pa med pa yin te /
translated: Or is it the absence of the definition?

original: dam bca' ba'i don bkag pa la chos rnam par brtags nas de'i don to zhes de ltar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i don bkag pa la chos rnam par brtags nas de'i don to zhes de ltar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of the thesis is to be understood as follows: Having examined the object of refutation, the thesis is stated in order to refute it.

original: 'on te de las bzlog pa gzhan pa ston pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: 'on te de las bzlog pa gzhan pa ston pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhes brjod pa na /
translated: But if you say that there is no fault because you are teaching the opposite of that,

original: mkhas pas dam bca' bas bsgrub par brjod pas ji lta ba de ltar bsgrub bya mi 'grub pa yin na /
analyzed: mkhas pas dam bca' bas bsgrub par brjod pas ji lta ba de ltar bsgrub bya mi 'grub pa yin na /
translated: then the wise would say that the thesis is not established in the way it is stated, because the proof is stated.

original: ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa la sogs pa yang sbyor bar byed pa na de dag sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma brjod pa la sogs pa khyed kyis brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa la sogs pa yang sbyor bar byed pa na de dag sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma brjod pa la sogs pa khyed kyis brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: And when you apply nonestablishment, contradiction, uncertainty, and so on, you should not say that you have not stated the parts that establish those.

original: des na mkhas pa dag gis kyang //
analyzed: des na mkhas pa dag gis kyang //
translated: Therefore, the wise

original: zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: say that the thesis is not established.

original: tshad ma brjod pa med pa rang gi bstan bcos khas blangs pa yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma brjod pa med pa rang gi bstan bcos khas blangs pa yin te /
translated: The statement â€œwithout stating a valid cognitionâ€ is accepted in our treatise.

original: de ltar 'gyur ba'i spyi de nyid ma grub pa yin no zhes de ltar bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur ba'i spyi de nyid ma grub pa yin no zhes de ltar bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement â€œthat generality which would be like that is not establishedâ€ is that it is taught.

original: 'di ltar snang ba'i sems kyis gzhan gyi gzhung lugs rnam par 'jog pa na tshad ma med pa'i tshig gzhan de kho na nyid mthong bas ma nges pa'i skye bo mkhas pa de ltar nges par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar snang ba'i sems kyis gzhan gyi gzhung lugs rnam par 'jog pa na tshad ma med pa'i tshig gzhan de kho na nyid mthong bas ma nges pa'i skye bo mkhas pa de ltar nges par mi bya'o //
translated: When the mind that appears in this way posits the tenets of another, it is not ascertained by valid knowledge, and so one should not be certain about it in that way.

original: tshad ma dang ldan pa'i khas blangs pa @109b mkhas pas dor bar mi bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma dang ldan pa'i khas blangs pa @109b mkhas pas dor bar mi bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the wise do not abandon assertions that are endowed with valid knowledge.

original: 'di ltar 'gyur te tshad mas ma bsgrubs pa'i sgrub par byed pa las ni rgyal ba yin par yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'gyur te tshad mas ma bsgrubs pa'i sgrub par byed pa las ni rgyal ba yin par yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: This is how it goes: One does not become a victor from a proof that is not established by valid knowledge,

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the discordant class is not abandoned.

original: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dag 'gal bas dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dag 'gal bas dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no //
translated: Because the thesis and reason are contradictory, the wise should abandon the thesis that contradicts the reason.

original: yon tan la ma gtogs pa'i don ni /
analyzed: yon tan la ma gtogs pa'i don ni /
translated: The meaning of â€œnot included in the qualitiesâ€ is as follows.

original: rdzas zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'o //
analyzed: rdzas zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'o //
translated: â€œSubstanceâ€ is the thesis.

original: gzugs la sogs pa las don gzhan mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa las don gzhan mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs te /
translated: â€œBecause an object different from form and so on is not observedâ€ is the reason.

original: de ni 'dir dam bca' ba dag gtan tshigs su 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: de ni 'dir dam bca' ba dag gtan tshigs su 'gal ba'o //
translated: This is the contradiction of the thesis and reason here.

original: gal te yon tan las rdzas tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te yon tan las rdzas tha dad pa yin te /
translated: If it is different from the qualities,

original: gal te gzugs la sogs pa las don gzhan mi dmigs pa ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te gzugs la sogs pa las don gzhan mi dmigs pa ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: it is not tenable that a substance is perceived as different from form, etc.

original: 'on te gzugs la sogs pa las don gzhan ma dmigs pas yon tan las tha dad pa'i rdzas zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te gzugs la sogs pa las don gzhan ma dmigs pas yon tan las tha dad pa'i rdzas zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: But if a substance is not perceived as different from form, etc., then it is not tenable to say that substance is different from the qualities.

original: 'di nyid kyis dam bcas pa dang gtan tshigs 'gal bas dam bcas pa rang gi tshig dang 'gal bar bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis dam bcas pa dang gtan tshigs 'gal bas dam bcas pa rang gi tshig dang 'gal bar bshad pa ni /
translated: This very contradiction of the thesis and reason explains the contradiction of the thesis with its own words,

original: mdo byed pas nye bar mtshon pa'i don du bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mdo byed pas nye bar mtshon pa'i don du bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the author of the treatise explains it as an illustration of the meaning.

original: dge sbyong ma skyes bu'i longs spyod pa spangs pa'i sbrum ma'i skyes bu'i longs spyod pa med na med pa yin pas rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: dge sbyong ma skyes bu'i longs spyod pa spangs pa'i sbrum ma'i skyes bu'i longs spyod pa med na med pa yin pas rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Since the enjoyment of a pregnant woman who has abandoned the enjoyment of a non-arisen ascetic is not without the enjoyment of a man, it contradicts its own words.

original: gtan tshigs kyi 'gal ba de nyid kyis bshad zin pa dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi 'gal ba de nyid kyis bshad zin pa dang sbyar ro //
translated: The contradiction of the reason is explained by that very contradiction of the thesis.

original: de tha dad pa ni sna tshogs pa ste gcig pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de tha dad pa ni sna tshogs pa ste gcig pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the various things are not one.

original: tshogs pa las dngos po'i sgra sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa las dngos po'i sgra sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the word â€œthingâ€ is applied to a collection.

original: spyir brjod pa ni bum pa la sogs pa la dngos po'i sgra sbyar ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spyir brjod pa ni bum pa la sogs pa la dngos po'i sgra sbyar ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the word â€œthingâ€ is applied to a pot, etc.

original: gang gi phyir tshogs pa zhes bya bar brjod pa ni gcig khas blangs pa yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tshogs pa zhes bya bar brjod pa ni gcig khas blangs pa yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the word â€œcollectionâ€ is used, it is understood that one thing is accepted.

original: gcig pa sogs pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gcig pa sogs pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: One thing, etc.

original: de bzhin du ba lang nyid la sogs pa la bsags pa las rdzas su bstan pa 'di la 'dus pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de bzhin du ba lang nyid la sogs pa la bsags pa las rdzas su bstan pa 'di la 'dus pa zhes brjod do //
translated: In the same way, in the statement â€œa substance is a collection of cowness, etc.,â€ the word â€œcollectionâ€ is used.

original: 'di thams cad tshogs pa las rdzas gang yin pa de ni ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i dngos por rnam par gnas pa zhes bya bas rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di thams cad tshogs pa las rdzas gang yin pa de ni ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i dngos por rnam par gnas pa zhes bya bas rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: All of these are a collection. That which is a substance is a thing, such as cowness, etc. Thus it is established.

original: tha dad pa phra mo dang ches shin tu phra ba dang de @110a * //
analyzed: tha dad pa phra mo dang ches shin tu phra ba dang de @110a * //
translated: The subtle difference, the very subtle difference, and the difference of non-difference.

original: las kyang chos shin tu phra mo ste /
analyzed: las kyang chos shin tu phra mo ste /

original: gang tha mi dad pa ni de las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: gang tha mi dad pa ni de las bzlog pa'o //
translated: That which is not different is the opposite of that.

original: gang gi phyir 'di tha dad pa las bzlog pa de ni 'on te gcig par sems na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di tha dad pa las bzlog pa de ni 'on te gcig par sems na /
translated: If you think that it is one because it is the opposite of different,

original: rdul phra rab tha dad par sems pa de ni la sogs pa'i tshogs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rdul phra rab tha dad par sems pa de ni la sogs pa'i tshogs zhes bya'o //
translated: then the one who thinks that the different subtle particles are a collection, etc.,

original: kye ma 'dir mthong ba ni gzugs la sogs pa yin na /
analyzed: kye ma 'dir mthong ba ni gzugs la sogs pa yin na /
translated: Alas! Here, if what is seen is form, etc.,

original: rdul phra rab tshogs pa'i ngo bo de su zhig gi tshogs pa yin zhes brjod par bya ba de bzhin du lhag ma'i yon tan rnams la yang ngo zhe na /
analyzed: rdul phra rab tshogs pa'i ngo bo de su zhig gi tshogs pa yin zhes brjod par bya ba de bzhin du lhag ma'i yon tan rnams la yang ngo zhe na /
translated: then whose collection is that which is the nature of a collection of subtle particles?

original: rdul phra rab rdzas brgyad 'dus pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdul phra rab rdzas brgyad 'dus pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It would contradict the treatise that states, â€œThe subtle particle is an aggregation of eight substances.â€

original: 'di rnams las rdzas ni gang /
analyzed: 'di rnams las rdzas ni gang /
translated: What is a substance among these?

original: sgra med phra rab rdul rnams yin //
analyzed: sgra med phra rab rdul rnams yin //
translated: The subtle particles without sound.

original: zhes bya ba de'i phyir gcig tu mi 'thad pa du mar 'thad pa yin no zhes bya ba ni shin tu rmongs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba de'i phyir gcig tu mi 'thad pa du mar 'thad pa yin no zhes bya ba ni shin tu rmongs pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is very confused to say that it is not tenable that they are one but it is tenable that they are many.

original: 'di'i rgyu ma grub pa yin no /
analyzed: 'di'i rgyu ma grub pa yin no /
translated: The reason is not established.

original: gang gi phyir du ma'i mtshan nyid mi mthun pa 'di la sogs pa'i yon tan la tshul 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i yan lag can gcig tu 'dus pa'i dngos po skye ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir du ma'i mtshan nyid mi mthun pa 'di la sogs pa'i yon tan la tshul 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i yan lag can gcig tu 'dus pa'i dngos po skye ba yin no //
translated: Because in this, which has the characteristic of being manifold and not homogeneous, the arising of a single entity with parts such as grasping a mode is not tenable.

original: des na sgra gcig rtogs pas na lhag ma shugs kyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: des na sgra gcig rtogs pas na lhag ma shugs kyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, when one sound is cognized, the rest are cognized by implication.

original: 'on te dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs la 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs la 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say there is a contradiction between the thesis and reason,

original: thog ma dang phyi ma dang khyad par med pa de lta na gnyis ka rten par mi srid kyang 'gal bar brjod pa dang 'dod pa gang yang rung bar bstan pa yin no zhes dva ra dva dzas bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang phyi ma dang khyad par med pa de lta na gnyis ka rten par mi srid kyang 'gal bar brjod pa dang 'dod pa gang yang rung bar bstan pa yin no zhes dva ra dva dzas bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: since it is explained by VÄgÄ«Å›a that if there is no difference between the beginning and end, then although it is not possible for both to be supported, it is shown that either the contradiction or the assertion is to be stated,

original: dam bca' ba dpe dang 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: dam bca' ba dpe dang 'gal ba yin te /
translated: the thesis contradicts the example.

original: dper na gsal ba ni gcig gi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na gsal ba ni gcig gi rang bzhin te /
translated: For example, an instance has the nature of being one,

original: tshad ma dang ldan pa'i phyir kham phor la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: tshad ma dang ldan pa'i phyir kham phor la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: because it possesses valid cognition, like a pot and so on.

original: kham phor la sogs pa'i dpe gcig gi rang bzhin brjod pa'o //
analyzed: kham phor la sogs pa'i dpe gcig gi rang bzhin brjod pa'o //
translated: The nature of a single example, such as a pot, is described.

original: dper gyur pa'i rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gzhan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dper gyur pa'i rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gzhan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The nature of the example is different from the nature of the subject.

analyzed: rang bzhin gcig yin pa'i kham phor la sogs pa'i dper rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not logical for a single nature, such as a pot, to be the example.

original: gtan tshigs dang dpe la sogs pa dang 'gal ba ni dper na yon tan las ma gtogs pa'i rdzas gzhan nyid ma dmigs pa'i phyir dper na bum pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang dpe la sogs pa dang 'gal ba ni dper na yon tan las ma gtogs pa'i rdzas gzhan nyid ma dmigs pa'i phyir dper na bum pa bzhin no //

analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa tha dad pa smos pas gtan tshigs la gnod pa'i dpe'o //
translated: The example contradicts the reason because of mentioning the difference of pot, etc.

original: sogs pa smos pa ni gtan tshigs dang @110b nye bar sbyar ba dang / mjug bsdu ba'i 'gal ba yang gzugs par bya'o //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pa ni gtan tshigs dang @110b nye bar sbyar ba dang / mjug bsdu ba'i 'gal ba yang gzugs par bya'o //
translated: The mention of â€œetc.â€ is to include contradiction of the application of the reason and the conclusion.

original: dpe ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: dpe ni 'di yin te /
translated: Here is an example:

original: sgra ni mi rtag pa yin te byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra ni mi rtag pa yin te byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: â€œSound is impermanent because it is produced.

original: gang byas pa de ni mi rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: gang byas pa de ni mi rtag pa yin te /
translated: Whatever is produced is impermanent,

original: dper na nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: like space.â€

original: de bzhin sgra byas pas zhes bya ba nye bar sbyar ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin sgra byas pas zhes bya ba nye bar sbyar ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba'o //
translated: Likewise, the application and reason are contradictory when one says, â€œSound is impermanent because it is produced.â€

original: de bzhin du dpe la ltos pa dang de bzhin du mjug bsdu ba dang / de bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba dang / nye bar sbyar ba yang bshad do //
analyzed: de bzhin du dpe la ltos pa dang de bzhin du mjug bsdu ba dang / de bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba dang / nye bar sbyar ba yang bshad do //
translated: Likewise, the example, the conclusion, and the application are explained to be contradictory.

original: 'dir yang dpe phyin ci log pa yin no zhes bya ba la de la ltos nas nye bar sbyar ba dang / gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang dpe phyin ci log pa yin no zhes bya ba la de la ltos nas nye bar sbyar ba dang / gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Here, the example is reversed. The application and reason are contradictory in dependence on that.

original: 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor ba yin pa de'i phyir mi rtag go zhes bya bas tshad ma dang 'gal ba'i dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs ni dper na dro ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor ba yin pa de'i phyir mi rtag go zhes bya bas tshad ma dang 'gal ba'i dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs ni dper na dro ba ma yin te /
translated: Because of this kind of application, the thesis and reason are contradictory with valid knowledge, as in the case of, â€œSound is impermanent because it is produced.â€

analyzed: me'i rdzas yin pa'i phyir chu bzhin no zhes bya ba de mngon sum dang 'gal ba'o // gzhan gyi phyogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The thesis and reason are contradictory with direct perception, as in the case of, â€œIt is not hot, because it is a substance of fire, like water.â€

original: de dang rang gi phyogs la ltos pa med pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa /
analyzed: de dang rang gi phyogs la ltos pa med pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa /
translated: The thesis and reason are contradictory with scripture, as in the case of, â€œThe self is permanent, because it is an agent, like a pot.â€ğŸ”½The thesis and reason are contradictory with what is commonly acknowledged, as in the case of, â€œThe sound of a conch is not audible, because it is a sound, like the sound of a pot.â€ğŸ”½The thesis and reason are contradictory with what is commonly acknowledged, as in the case of, â€œThe sound of a conch is not audible, because it is a sound, like the sound of a pot.â€

original: 'di dag gtan tshigs dang dam bca' gnyis ka dang 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba 'dis gzung ba'i phyir tshar gcad pa'i gnas logs shig tu brjod do zhes bya ba bstan par mi bya'o /
analyzed: 'di dag gtan tshigs dang dam bca' gnyis ka dang 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba 'dis gzung ba'i phyir tshar gcad pa'i gnas logs shig tu brjod do zhes bya ba bstan par mi bya'o /
translated: This is not to be taught as a separate ground for refutation, saying, This contradicts both the reason and the thesis.

original: gzhan gyi phyogs zhes bya ba ni 'dir rkang mig la sogs pa gzhan gyi tshad ma byed pas ma nges pa brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi phyogs zhes bya ba ni 'dir rkang mig la sogs pa gzhan gyi tshad ma byed pas ma nges pa brjod pa'o //
translated: The phrase the position of others refers to the expression of uncertainty by others, such as Aká¹£apÄda, who do not accept it as a valid means of knowledge.

original: rang gi phyogs la mi ltos pa zhes bya ba ni zhes bye brag pa'i tshad ma byed pas gzhan la /
analyzed: rang gi phyogs la mi ltos pa zhes bya ba ni zhes bye brag pa'i tshad ma byed pas gzhan la /
translated: The phrase not dependent on one's own position refers to the expression of uncertainty by others, such as the VaiÅ›eá¹£ikas, who do not accept it as a valid means of knowledge.

original: gzhan la 'khrul bar brjod pas na tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la 'khrul bar brjod pas na tha dad pa yin no //
translated: Since it is expressed as erroneous with respect to others, it is distinct.

original: gal te de lta na ba lang nyid la sogs pa 'khrul ba brjod pa ni 'gal ba'i lan brjod pa yin par de ltar gyur pa ma nges pa'i yul gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na ba lang nyid la sogs pa 'khrul ba brjod pa ni 'gal ba'i lan brjod pa yin par de ltar gyur pa ma nges pa'i yul gang yin zhe na /
translated: If that is so, the expression of uncertainty regarding cowhood, etc. is an expression of a contradictory response. What is the object of that uncertainty?

original: gnyi ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gnyi ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says both, etc.

original: rgal ba dang phyir rgol ba gnyis pa'i phyogs la rab tu grub par khas blangs pa'o //
analyzed: rgal ba dang phyir rgol ba gnyis pa'i phyogs la rab tu grub par khas blangs pa'o //
translated: It is accepted as well established in the position of both the respondent and the opponent.

original: de ni ma nges pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma nges pa yin te /
translated: That is not so, because

original: de de yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de de yin pa'i phyir /
translated: that is it.

original: nye bar brtags nas de ltar 'jug pa des na ma nges par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nye bar brtags nas de ltar 'jug pa des na ma nges par rig par bya'o //
translated: Having examined it, one should understand that it is not so.

original: 'dir yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Here, he says, etc.

original: de yang bgag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang bgag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is also to be refuted.

original: de la brten nas de dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: de la brten nas de dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba ste /
translated: In dependence on that, there is the contradiction with the thesis.

original: da ni des de bzhin du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: da ni des de bzhin du byas pa yin no //
translated: Now, he has done that in that way.

original: des dam bca' bar byas pa yin no //
analyzed: des dam bca' bar byas pa yin no //
translated: He has made the thesis.

original: lhag ma @111a * //
analyzed: lhag ma @111a * //
translated: The rest

original: ni go sla'o //
analyzed: ni go sla'o //
translated: is easy to understand.

original: tha dad pa rnams kyang ri la sogs pa 'ga' zhig kyang mngon sum pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa rnams kyang ri la sogs pa 'ga' zhig kyang mngon sum pa'o //
translated: Even though they are different, such things as a mountain, etc. are directly perceived.

original: bskal pa ni sha za la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bskal pa ni sha za la sogs pa'o //
translated: The inconceivable is such things as a flesh-eater, etc.

original: de la 'di nyid tshar gcad pa'i gnas te /
analyzed: de la 'di nyid tshar gcad pa'i gnas te /
translated: In that regard, this is the point of defeat:

original: dper na dam bca' ba ni 'gal ba med par dam bcas pa'o //
analyzed: dper na dam bca' ba ni 'gal ba med par dam bcas pa'o //
translated: For example, the thesis is not contradictory.

original: tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The point of defeat is to be supplied.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de la brten pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la brten pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because it is in dependence on that, that is the meaning.

original: gal te de la brten pa yin na tshar gcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhe na /ğŸ”½gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: gal te de la brten pa yin na tshar gcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhe na / gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: If it is based on that, then it becomes a basis for refutation.

original: skabs su bab pa'i rgol ba'i mjug bsdu ba yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: skabs su bab pa'i rgol ba'i mjug bsdu ba yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The conclusion of the present argument is complete.

original: de sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan du dam bca' ba'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan du dam bca' ba'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: The statement of the thesis is the reason for establishing that.

original: de tsam gyis sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu brjod pa'i rgol ba rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de tsam gyis sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu brjod pa'i rgol ba rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that much, the argument is stated as a part of the proof, and the opponent is defeated.

original: dpe 'ga' zhig las skabs su bab pa'i mjug bsdu ba'i mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir 'don to //
analyzed: dpe 'ga' zhig las skabs su bab pa'i mjug bsdu ba'i mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir 'don to //
translated: In some examples, the conclusion of the present argument is stated at the end.

original: de la rgol ba yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la rgol ba yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
translated: There, the argument is complete.

original: dam bca' ba'i tshig gi sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i mthar thug pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i tshig gi sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i mthar thug pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is stated with respect to the end of the statement of the thesis. This is the meaning.

original: 'on te khyed kyi blo de ltar gyur na ni skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba gcig pa nyid la yod pa nyid dang skye ba dang ldan pa'i rkyen gyi bye brag gi tha dad pa la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs mang po rnams kyiğŸ”½khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on te khyed kyi blo de ltar gyur na ni skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba gcig pa nyid la yod pa nyid dang skye ba dang ldan pa'i rkyen gyi bye brag gi tha dad pa la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs mang po rnams kyi khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: But if your mind is like that, then you should understand that in the case of a single probandum, such as momentariness, there are many different reasons, such as existence, arising, and conditions.

original: de bzhin du sun da byung ba gcig la yang sgrub par byed pa'i ngag gi rim gyis sam dam bca' ba'i tshig la sogs pa'i sgo nas sam gzhan gyis kyang sun 'byin to //
analyzed: de bzhin du sun da byung ba gcig la yang sgrub par byed pa'i ngag gi rim gyis sam dam bca' ba'i tshig la sogs pa'i sgo nas sam gzhan gyis kyang sun 'byin to //
translated: In the same way, even in the case of a single refutation, one can refute by means of a sequence of statements that prove the opposite, or by means of a statement of the thesis alone, or by means of something else.

original: de ltar na pham zin pa la pham par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar na pham zin pa la pham par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In that case, one would not be defeated because one would not be defeated by what has already been defeated.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: gang du gtan tshigs yongs su brjod pa dang / de dag gi rnam par rtog pa'i sgo nas 'di dag nyid snga ma'i gtan tshigs la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang du gtan tshigs yongs su brjod pa dang / de dag gi rnam par rtog pa'i sgo nas 'di dag nyid snga ma'i gtan tshigs la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are dependent on the previous reasons, they are stated in terms of the complete expression of the reason and the conceptualization of that.

original: yang na rnam pa gzhan du sgrub par byed pa 'dis bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i 'jug pa'i rgyu'i nus pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na rnam pa gzhan du sgrub par byed pa 'dis bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i 'jug pa'i rgyu'i nus pa yod pa yin no //
translated: Or else, by this other formulation, the power of the reason to engage in the proof of the probandum exists.

original: bsdus pa'i sbyor ba nyid kyis ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: bsdus pa'i sbyor ba nyid kyis ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not just the combination that is the proof?

original: bshad pa / rnam pa gzhan du gang gi tshe bsdus pa'i sbyor ba'i gtan tshigs gzhan 'dod pa de'i tshe gnyis po don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / rnam pa gzhan du gang gi tshe bsdus pa'i sbyor ba'i gtan tshigs gzhan 'dod pa de'i tshe gnyis po don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In response, it is said: When the other reason of the combined proof is asserted, at that time the second one is pointless.

original: rnam par rtog pas @111b nus pa yin no zhes brjod pa don med pa bstan to //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas @111b nus pa yin no zhes brjod pa don med pa bstan to //
translated: It is explained that the assertion of the power of conception is pointless.

original: gal te de la yang sbyor ba gcig med par sbyor ba gzhan du yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te de la yang sbyor ba gcig med par sbyor ba gzhan du yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: If it is said that even in that case, without one application, the other application would not occur,

original: dgag pa gnyis kyis rnal mar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgag pa gnyis kyis rnal mar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the two negations, the natural state would occur.

original: gang gi tshe sbyor ba gcig gis sbyor ba gzhan 'dus par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi tshe sbyor ba gcig gis sbyor ba gzhan 'dus par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: When it is said that by one application, the other application is combined, that is the meaning.

original: de'i tshe gnyis pa sgrub par byed pa'i don 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe gnyis pa sgrub par byed pa'i don 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: At that time, the second one has no purpose in the proof at all.

original: khong du ma chud par bstan pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khong du ma chud par bstan pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no teaching that is not understood.

original: gtan tshigs dang po bstan pa kho nas don tha dad pa'i phyir shing gcad pa'i bya ba grub zin pa la sta res cung zad cig kyang bsgrubs pa'i don byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang po bstan pa kho nas don tha dad pa'i phyir shing gcad pa'i bya ba grub zin pa la sta res cung zad cig kyang bsgrubs pa'i don byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The point is that, because of the very teaching of the first reason, the axe does not perform the function of accomplishing anything whatsoever in the completed action of cutting the wood.

original: 'o na sgrub pa bzhin du rnam par rtog pa'i sun 'byin par 'gyur ro zhes 'di snyam du sems na /
analyzed: 'o na sgrub pa bzhin du rnam par rtog pa'i sun 'byin par 'gyur ro zhes 'di snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that the refutation is like the proof,

original: gzhan dag gis khas blangs pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis khas blangs pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: then it is not logical for others to accept it,

original: 'di ltar des rang nyid kyi dam bcas pa sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu ma rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar des rang nyid kyi dam bcas pa sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu ma rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: because in that case they would not understand that it is a part that proves their own thesis,

original: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dang dpe dang nye bar sbyar ba dang / mjug bsdu ba yan lag gzhan bzhin no zhes bya ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½gtan tshigs gzhan dag nyid ces bya ba sngar yan lag can gyi rdzas bkag par bshad zin to //
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dang dpe dang nye bar sbyar ba dang / mjug bsdu ba yan lag gzhan bzhin no zhes bya ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½gtan tshigs gzhan dag nyid ces bya ba sngar yan lag can gyi rdzas bkag par bshad zin to //
translated: because it would contradict the thesis, the reason, the example, the application, and the conclusion, which are the other parts.ğŸ”½The other reasons are the same.

original: bum pa'i sgras bum pa'i yan lag can gyi rdzas kyi mtshan nyid gcig pa bstan du med par don sna tshogs par gzugs la sogs pa don gcig byed pa'i spyi yin gyi /
analyzed: bum pa'i sgras bum pa'i yan lag can gyi rdzas kyi mtshan nyid gcig pa bstan du med par don sna tshogs par gzugs la sogs pa don gcig byed pa'i spyi yin gyi /
translated: The word pot does not indicate the single universal of the substance that is the possessor of the potâ€™s parts, but rather the universal that is the single object of the various objects such as form and so on.

original: spyi gcig pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: spyi gcig pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: The single universal should be understood to be inexpressible.

original: sgra'i don thams cad gzugs la sogs pa don gcig byed par nus pa sna tshogs pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i rgyus dngos po gcig pa'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin med par bstan pas dngos po gcig pa med pa yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: sgra'i don thams cad gzugs la sogs pa don gcig byed par nus pa sna tshogs pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i rgyus dngos po gcig pa'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin med par bstan pas dngos po gcig pa med pa yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: Since the meaning of all words is the single object of form and so on, it is shown that the nature of the various abilities is not the nature of a single thing.

original: sangs rgyas pa ni gzugs la sogs pa med par dbang po'i don ni mi spong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa ni gzugs la sogs pa med par dbang po'i don ni mi spong ngo //
translated: The Buddhist does not reject the object of the sense faculties as nonexistent, but form and so on.

original: gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i nus pa du ma 'dod na /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i nus pa du ma 'dod na /
translated: If you assert that the many abilities are different from form and so on,

original: de ji ltar gcig yin no zhes brjod par bya //
analyzed: de ji ltar gcig yin no zhes brjod par bya //
translated: how can you say that they are one?

original: de ji ltar sgra gzhan gyi don yin /
analyzed: de ji ltar sgra gzhan gyi don yin /
translated: How can they be the object of another word?

original: don rang gi mtshan nyid ni sgra'i don du brjod par mi bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: don rang gi mtshan nyid ni sgra'i don du brjod par mi bya'o zhe na /
translated: The meaning of the word is not to be expressed as the meaning of the word.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: nus pa tha dad pa ni don dam pa yang ma yin te /ğŸ”½dngos po tha dad pa'i don gcig byed par shes pas nges @112a * //
analyzed: nus pa tha dad pa ni don dam pa yang ma yin te / dngos po tha dad pa'i don gcig byed par shes pas nges @112a * //
translated: The different potencies are not ultimate,ğŸ”½because the cause of the ascertainment is the cognition of the performance of a single purpose by the different things.

original: pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir phan tshun gcig pa yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir phan tshun gcig pa yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: Therefore, they are mutually the same.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: gcig pa'i shes pas rgyu yi phyir //
analyzed: gcig pa'i shes pas rgyu yi phyir //
translated: Because of the cause of the single cognition,

original: blo ni tha dad med pa yin //
analyzed: blo ni tha dad med pa yin //
translated: the cognition is not different.

original: blo gcig rgyu yi dngos po yis //
analyzed: blo gcig rgyu yi dngos po yis //
translated: Because of the single cause of the cognition,

original: gsal ba rnams ni tha mi dad //
analyzed: gsal ba rnams ni tha mi dad //
translated: the manifestations are not different.

original: ces bshad do //
analyzed: ces bshad do //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: skyes bus nges par byas pa la brten nas sgra'i don rnam par 'jog pa yin no //
analyzed: skyes bus nges par byas pa la brten nas sgra'i don rnam par 'jog pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of the word is established in dependence on the ascertainment by the person.

original: skyes bu ni thog ma med pa nas phyin ci log pa'i bag chags yongs su smin pa las byung ba'i nang gi ldog pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams la mthong ba'i rnam par rtog pas sgro btags gcig tu gtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: skyes bu ni thog ma med pa nas phyin ci log pa'i bag chags yongs su smin pa las byung ba'i nang gi ldog pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams la mthong ba'i rnam par rtog pas sgro btags gcig tu gtogs pa yin no //
translated: The person is the various internal aspects that arise from the ripening of the habitual tendencies of error from beginningless time. The conceptual thought of seeing superimposes them as one.

original: don dam par sgra ni yul med pa yin no //
analyzed: don dam par sgra ni yul med pa yin no //
translated: In the ultimate sense, sound is not an object.

original: gsal ba rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i don las gzhan pa'i rjes su 'gro ba yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i don las gzhan pa'i rjes su 'gro ba yin te /
translated: The manifestations are not different from the object of consciousness,

original: brjod pa'i spyod yul gyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod pa'i spyod yul gyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are things that are the domain of expression.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: Thus it is said:ğŸ”½In the sutra:

original: mdo las / gang dang gang gi ming gis ni //
analyzed: mdo las / gang dang gang gi ming gis ni //
translated: By whatever name

original: gang dang gang gi chos brjod pa //ğŸ”½chos rnams lhan cig chos can la //ğŸ”½de dang de ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: gang dang gang gi chos brjod pa // chos rnams lhan cig chos can la // de dang de ni yod ma yin //
translated: whatever dharma is expressed,ğŸ”½that dharma is not in the dharmin

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: simultaneously with the dharmas.

original: des na / 'dir bsdus pa'i don ni gzugs la sogs pa dang bum pa ni ci rigs par du ma nyid dang gcig pa ste /
analyzed: des na / 'dir bsdus pa'i don ni gzugs la sogs pa dang bum pa ni ci rigs par du ma nyid dang gcig pa ste /
translated: Thus, the meaning of the summary here is that form and so on and the pot are either many or one,

original: mang po la gcig gi tshig gis brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: mang po la gcig gi tshig gis brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: but they are not to be expressed by the word â€œoneâ€ in the case of many,

original: dper na skar ma dang zla ba la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba de lta bu dpag pa ltar snang ngo //
analyzed: dper na skar ma dang zla ba la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba de lta bu dpag pa ltar snang ngo //
translated: just as the stars, the moon, and so on are not.

original: gzhan gyi bum pa la sogs pa sgra'i yul gang yin pa 'di don gcig par brjod par khas blangs pa de nyid spang bar bya ba yin la /
analyzed: gzhan gyi bum pa la sogs pa sgra'i yul gang yin pa 'di don gcig par brjod par khas blangs pa de nyid spang bar bya ba yin la /
translated: The object of the word, such as a pot, is the same as the object of the word, such as a pot, that is to be abandoned.

original: gzugs dang ro la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs dang ro la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the nature of the subtle particles of form, taste, etc.

original: 'di ltar de dag so so re re'i bdag nyid yin par 'dod pa de nyid de /ğŸ”½se'u nyi tshe'i sa bon bzhin du tshogs pa nye bar gyur pa las nges par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di ltar de dag so so re re'i bdag nyid yin par 'dod pa de nyid de / se'u nyi tshe'i sa bon bzhin du tshogs pa nye bar gyur pa las nges par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: For, it is accepted that they are each of the nature of a single subtle particle.

original: yongs su gsal bar rigs pa ma yin no //ğŸ”½'dod na dbang po med pa la //
analyzed: yongs su gsal bar rigs pa ma yin no // 'dod na dbang po med pa la //
translated: When they come together, like a pile of sesame seeds, it is not reasonable that they would become manifest.

original: sgra med phra rab rdul rdzas brgyad //
analyzed: sgra med phra rab rdul rdzas brgyad //
translated: If one wishes, one can say that the subtle particle without a sense organ has eight substances.

original: lus dbang ldan pa rdzas dgu ste //ğŸ”½dbang po gzhan la rdzas bcu'o //
analyzed: lus dbang ldan pa rdzas dgu ste // dbang po gzhan la rdzas bcu'o //
translated: The subtle particle with the body sense organ has nine substances.

original: zhes bshad do //
analyzed: zhes bshad do //
translated: The subtle particle with the other sense organs has ten substances.

original: de ltar rdul phra rab rnams kyi mthar dbang pos gzung ba dang / mi rtag pa dang / gzhan yang kho bo cag gis de rgyas par bshad do //
analyzed: de ltar rdul phra rab rnams kyi mthar dbang pos gzung ba dang / mi rtag pa dang / gzhan yang kho bo cag gis de rgyas par bshad do //
translated: Thus, the subtle particles are apprehended by the sense organs up to the end, and are impermanent.

original: gang yang 'di dag mang po'i tshig dang gcig gi tshig gis brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de ni 'khrul @112b pa'i phyir ro //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdul phra rab gcig pa nyid khas blangs pas gong bu'i 'dus par rnam par dpyad na 'di 'dod pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdul phra rab gcig pa nyid khas blangs pas gong bu'i 'dus par rnam par dpyad na 'di 'dod pa nyid do zhe na /

original: de'i phyir gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

original: 'o na de ltar na gzhan dngos po med par rnam pa gzhan gyis sgrub par byed par 'dod pa ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de ltar na gzhan dngos po med par rnam pa gzhan gyis sgrub par byed par 'dod pa ji ltar yin zhe na /

original: gcig dang du ma 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because singularity and plurality are refuted.

original: drug gis cig car sbyar bas na //
analyzed: drug gis cig car sbyar bas na //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa re zhig gcig bkag pas de'i 'dus pa du ma yang de med pas med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa re zhig gcig bkag pas de'i 'dus pa du ma yang de med pas med par 'gyur ro //
translated: and so on. First, singularity is refuted. Since that does not exist, its collection, plurality, also does not exist.

original: de skad du ;
analyzed: de skad du ;
translated: Thus it is said:

original: dngos po gang gang rnam dpyad na //
analyzed: dngos po gang gang rnam dpyad na //
translated: Whatever things are analyzed

original: de dang de ni gcig tu med //
analyzed: de dang de ni gcig tu med //
translated: are not found to be singular.

original: gang gis gcig kyang yod min pa //
analyzed: gang gis gcig kyang yod min pa //

original: des na du ma nyid kyang med //ğŸ”½ces bshad do //
analyzed: des na du ma nyid kyang med // ces bshad do //
translated: plurality also does not exist.

original: 'o na / drug gis cig car sbyar bas na //
analyzed: 'o na / drug gis cig car sbyar bas na //
translated: â€œBy the simultaneous conjunction of six . . .â€

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji ltar gcig pa nyid sel ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji ltar gcig pa nyid sel ba yin zhe na /
translated: How does this passage refute identity?

analyzed: gang gi tshe de la de nyid cha shas su sgrub par byed pa de nyid kyis /
translated: When one establishes that it has parts,

analyzed: rdul phra rab de'i cha shas kyis phra bar 'gyur te /
translated: then it is subtle due to having parts.

original: rdul phra rab kyi rnam par dbye ba'i mtshan nyid mthar thug pa'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½ji ltar de dag kyang cha shas su brjod pa 'dis /
analyzed: rdul phra rab kyi rnam par dbye ba'i mtshan nyid mthar thug pa'i phyir ro // ji ltar de dag kyang cha shas su brjod pa 'dis /

original: de'i cha shas su brjod pa de lta na /
analyzed: de'i cha shas su brjod pa de lta na /
translated: they are said to have parts in that way.

original: de la de nyid lan yin no zhes bya ba rnams 'di nyid kyis rdul phra rab gcig pa nyid dgag par byed par mi nus te /
analyzed: de la de nyid lan yin no zhes bya ba rnams 'di nyid kyis rdul phra rab gcig pa nyid dgag par byed par mi nus te /

original: de ni rnam par dbye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rnam par dbye ba'i phyir ro //

original: rdul phra rab khas mi len pa de ji lta gcig pa nyid du khas len par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rdul phra rab khas mi len pa de ji lta gcig pa nyid du khas len par 'gyur te /

analyzed: de med par ston pa'i gtan tshigs thams cad rang nyid la ma grub par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Because all the reasons that demonstrate their nonexistence would not be established for oneself.

original: gang gi don du smra ba'i cha shas kyis rnam par dbye ba'i bsgrub pa gang yin pa de mthar 'dren par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi don du smra ba'i cha shas kyis rnam par dbye ba'i bsgrub pa gang yin pa de mthar 'dren par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the conclusion that is distinguished by the part that is spoken of for the sake of something is brought to an end.

original: rdul phra rab dngos por brjod pa de la drug gis cig car sbyar ba des gcig nyid gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: rdul phra rab dngos por brjod pa de la drug gis cig car sbyar ba des gcig nyid gsal ba yin no //
translated: The atom that is said to be a thing is one with the six that are simultaneously joined to it.

original: gang gi tshe de yang de ltar yod pa gsal bas /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de yang de ltar yod pa gsal bas /
translated: When that is also made manifest in that way,

analyzed: cha shas ji ltar gsal ba bstan @114b pa de'i tshe rang gi dam bca' ba nyams pa yin no //
translated: then the manifestation of the parts is taught. At that time, oneâ€™s thesis is undermined.

analyzed: cha shas dang bcas pa'i yan lag tu mi byed pa de lta na brgal zhing brtag pa mi rigs so //
translated: If one does not take it as having parts, then it is not reasonable to debate it.

original: rdul phra rab de nyid cha chas dang bcas par yod par rnam par gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid rnal 'byor spyod pa las 'gegs pas tshar gcod pa'i phyir dang de nyid thug pa med par thal bar bsgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdul phra rab de nyid cha chas dang bcas par yod par rnam par gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid rnal 'byor spyod pa las 'gegs pas tshar gcod pa'i phyir dang de nyid thug pa med par thal bar bsgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: The yogÄcÄra refutes the very definition of the atom that is posited as having parts, and so it is refuted. And because it is established that it would follow that it would be endless,

analyzed: ma grub pa'i skyon yang med pa'i phyir 'di brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: Because there is no fault of nonestablishment, this should not be said.

original: 'dir brjod pa kho bo cag gis khyed la ni brjod pa ma yin gyi rmongs pa'i rgol bas rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa kho bo cag gis khyed la ni brjod pa ma yin gyi rmongs pa'i rgol bas rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Here, it is said that we do not say this to you, but to the opponent who understands through delusion.

original: de yang thams cad du med pa'i yin te /
analyzed: de yang thams cad du med pa'i yin te /
translated: But that is not the case for all.

original: tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis tha dad pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: du ma'i mtshan nyid ni gcig gi dngos por ma grub po zhes bya ba'i skabs 'dir /

analyzed: dva ra dva dza kho bo cag gi 'dod na dbang po med pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pas grub pa'i mtha' 'di ci'i phyir spong bar brjod /

analyzed: de ltar khas blangs pa la skyon gzhan yang bshad pa 'dis sngar gyi yon tan las tha dad par bshad pa la sogs pa bstan pa 'dis dam bca' dang gtan tshigs dag 'gal ba la tha dad pa med na gnod pa dang 'brel pa'i dper brjod pa des
translated: In this way, another fault in the assertion is explained. This explanation shows that the previously explained difference from the qualities, etc., are stated by this example of the related harm, where there is no difference in the contradiction between the thesis and the reason.

analyzed: sam / dper brjod pa logs shig pas kyang don med 'ga' zhig tha dad pa ni med kyi tshig tha dad par zad do //

analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i dper brjod pas logs shig byed na byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one makes a separate [distinction] with an example of that kind, it would be absurd to say because it is made and so on.

original: gzhung 'ga' zhig las lhan cig gam tha dad pa dag ces 'don te /
analyzed: gzhung 'ga' zhig las lhan cig gam tha dad pa dag ces 'don te /

original: de la don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la don ni 'di yin te /

analyzed: lhan cig pa ni dang po las cig car ji lta ba'o //

original: tha dad pa ni 'dir logs shig pa ji lta bu'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa ni 'dir logs shig pa ji lta bu'o //

original: 'on te 'dir 'gal ba gsal bar mi rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te 'dir 'gal ba gsal bar mi rigs so zhe na /
translated: But if it is not reasonable to clearly state the contradiction here,

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

original: thams cad tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: thams cad tha dad pa yin te /

analyzed: tshogs pa la dngos po'i sgra sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba gtan tshigs 'di ni chos thams cad kyi chos su mi 'gyur la /

original: sgra'i chos yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: sgra'i chos yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'o //
translated: The reason â€œbecause it is a sound phenomenonâ€ is not established.

original: de ltar yang rten tha dad pa'i phyir ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon ni /
analyzed: de ltar yang rten tha dad pa'i phyir ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon ni /
translated: Thus, the error of nonestablishment due to the difference in the basis is not contradictory in that case,

analyzed: bu ram gyi mngar ba dang khva'i gnag pa la sogs pa bzhin du de la 'gal ba ma @115a * //

analyzed: yin te / gtan tshigs dang dam bca' ba dag la rten tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reason and the thesis have a different basis.

original: 'o na tshogs pa brjod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dngos por bshad kyi ta ki las rab tu sbyar bas gzhi tha dad med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na tshogs pa brjod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dngos por bshad kyi ta ki las rab tu sbyar bas gzhi tha dad med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that the expression of the collection is explained as a thing, but it is not applied to the letter â€œta,â€ therefore there is no difference in the basis,

original: 'di snyam du dgongs te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du dgongs te /
translated: we think as follows.

original: re zhig 'od byed kyis rab tu sbyar ba gang yin pa de kho bo cag gis skyon brtsam pa 'di brjod pa ma yin du zin kyang da ni rnam pa gzhan du sbyar ba yin te /
analyzed: re zhig 'od byed kyis rab tu sbyar ba gang yin pa de kho bo cag gis skyon brtsam pa 'di brjod pa ma yin du zin kyang da ni rnam pa gzhan du sbyar ba yin te /
translated: Even though we have not stated this error that we have begun with regard to what is applied by the light, now it is applied in another way.

original: gal te de dag la skyon 'dir mi 'gyur yang bshad ma thag pa'i skyon dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i skyon ni /
analyzed: gal te de dag la skyon 'dir mi 'gyur yang bshad ma thag pa'i skyon dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i skyon ni /
translated: If this error does not occur for them, the error just explained and the error that will be explained

original: tshongs pas kyang spang bar mi nus so //ğŸ”½dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal bar tshar gcod pa'i gnas gzhan yang khas len pa 'di kho bos gzhan du byas nas de skad du bshad do //
analyzed: tshongs pas kyang spang bar mi nus so // dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal bar tshar gcod pa'i gnas gzhan yang khas len pa 'di kho bos gzhan du byas nas de skad du bshad do //
translated: and also by selling it, one cannot abandon it.ğŸ”½The other topics of refutation by contradiction and by reason are accepted by us, and we have explained them elsewhere.ğŸ”½The topics of refutation by contradiction and by reason are included in the topics of refutation by fallacious reasons.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba 'dis bsdus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar brjod pa de dag la gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so: / skyon gyi rigs rnam pa gnyis po cha shas kyi skyon gyi
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba 'dis bsdus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar brjod pa de dag la gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so: / skyon gyi rigs rnam pa gnyis po cha shas kyi skyon gyi
translated: The two types of faults are the fault of the part and the fault of the whole.

original: rnam pa gnyis po de gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis po de gang zhe na /
translated: What are the two types of faults?

original: bshad pa 'gal ba nyid dang ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa 'gal ba nyid dang ma grub pa'o //

original: yang ji ltar na 'gal ba dang / ji ltar ma grub pa yin /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na 'gal ba dang / ji ltar ma grub pa yin /

original: bshad pa / mdor bsdus pa'i don ni yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa / mdor bsdus pa'i don ni yin te /
translated: The meaning in brief is this:

original: gang la dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs kyis 'gal ba'i sbyor ba yang brjod pa de la gdon mi za bar chos can grub pa la bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: gang la dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs kyis 'gal ba'i sbyor ba yang brjod pa de la gdon mi za bar chos can grub pa la bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
translated: And when one states a syllogism that contradicts the thesis and the reason, then the subject must be established.

original: chos can de la gtan tshigs grub pa 'am bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang gnyi ga med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos can de la gtan tshigs grub pa 'am bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang gnyi ga med par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if the subject is established, then either the reason or the property to be proven is not established.

original: de la re zhig nyi ga yang yod pas phan tshun 'gal ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de la re zhig nyi ga yang yod pas phan tshun 'gal ba yin gyi /
translated: In that case, since the reason is established, the two are not contradictory.

original: me dang grang ba bzhin du gzhi gcig la 'gal bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: me dang grang ba bzhin du gzhi gcig la 'gal bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: But if they are not contradictory, then they are not mutually exclusive, like fire and heat.

original: de ltar ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin no //
translated: But that is not so.ğŸ”½Here, if they were to coexist in one thing, they would not be mutually exclusive, like two things that are shared in common.

original: 'dir gcig la lhan cig gnas pa ni thun mong ba bzhin du mi 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs ring ba la yang 'gal bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir gcig la lhan cig gnas pa ni thun mong ba bzhin du mi 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs ring ba la yang 'gal bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it follows that the thesis and the reason would not be contradictory, even if they were distant.

original: de 'gal bar brjod pa ni rang bzhin gyis gcig la 'gal bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de 'gal bar brjod pa ni rang bzhin gyis gcig la 'gal bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: When one states that they are contradictory, they are contradictory by nature.

original: de lta ma yin na 'gal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'gal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were not so, they would not be contradictory.

original: de lta na gtan tshigs de la yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na gtan tshigs de la yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the reason would exist.

original: gang la gtan tshigs de lta bu yin pas de la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de las bzlog pa @115b yang de la yod pa ma yin par gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: gang la gtan tshigs de lta bu yin pas de la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de las bzlog pa @115b yang de la yod pa ma yin par gsal ba yin te /
translated: Since there is such a reason, it is clear that the property to be established and the opposite of the property to be established do not exist there.

original: 'di dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it contradicts this.

original: sgra rtag ste /
analyzed: sgra rtag ste /
translated: Sound is permanent,

original: byas pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: byas pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it is produced.

original: bshad pa / chos can yod pa'i gtan tshogs 'gal bar grur par ma gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa / chos can yod pa'i gtan tshogs 'gal bar grur par ma gyur pa'o //
translated: The opponent says: The reason is established as contradictory to the existence of the subject.

original: yang gang gi tshe chos can de la tshad ma gzhan gyis sgrub par byed pa yod par nges pa de'i tshe de la gtan tshigs med par 'gal ba'i stobs kyis byas pa 'am gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: yang gang gi tshe chos can de la tshad ma gzhan gyis sgrub par byed pa yod par nges pa de'i tshe de la gtan tshigs med par 'gal ba'i stobs kyis byas pa 'am gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, when it is ascertained that there is a proof by another valid means of knowledge regarding that subject, then the reason is contradictory to the absence of the property to be established by the power of contradiction, or the reason is not established.

original: sgra ni byas pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni byas pa yin te /
translated: Sound is produced,

original: 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: because it is not a non-effect.

original: de ni chos can la gtan tshigs ma grub kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ni chos can la gtan tshigs ma grub kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response to that is, â€œEven though the reason is not established with respect to the subject,â€ and so on.

original: gal te yon tan las tha dad pa'i rdzas la sogs pa'i chos can tshad mas ma grub pa la dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs 'gal ba rnam par gzhag pa byas pa des na 'di ni skyon ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te yon tan las tha dad pa'i rdzas la sogs pa'i chos can tshad mas ma grub pa la dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs 'gal ba rnam par gzhag pa byas pa des na 'di ni skyon ma yin no //
translated: If the subject, such as substance, which is different from quality, is not established by valid knowledge, then the thesis and the contradictory reason are posited. Therefore this is not a fault.

original: des 'di ma grub pa la sogs par mi nus so snyam du sems na /
analyzed: des 'di ma grub pa la sogs par mi nus so snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that it is not possible for this to be a nonestablished reason,

original: gal te de lta na yang chos yod par 'gyur ba dang / phyogs kyi chos med pa dang 'gal ba dang ma grub pa yang yin pa de'i gnas skabs su yid la byed pas smras pas tshad ma dang 'brel pa med par rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba gnyis la chos can la gtan tshigs yod par the tshom za ba
analyzed: gal te de lta na yang chos yod par 'gyur ba dang / phyogs kyi chos med pa dang 'gal ba dang ma grub pa yang yin pa de'i gnas skabs su yid la byed pas smras pas tshad ma dang 'brel pa med par rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba gnyis la chos can la gtan tshigs yod par the tshom za ba
translated: then even though that is so, the property of the subject is not established because the property exists, the property of the subject does not exist, and there is a contradiction. Since that is the case, the respondent is doubtful about whether the reason exists with respect to the subject.

original: yin no // tshad ma log pas kyang don med par mi 'grub pa des na the tshom za ba'i ma grub pa la brten pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yin no // tshad ma log pas kyang don med par mi 'grub pa des na the tshom za ba'i ma grub pa la brten pa'i phyir /
translated: And because the non-establishment of the reason is not established by the cessation of the valid cognition,

original: ri sul 'di na rma bya yod de /
analyzed: ri sul 'di na rma bya yod de /
translated: there is the doubt, In this mountain valley there is a peacock,

original: sgra grags pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: sgra grags pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: because its sound is heard.

original: yang sgras ni ston par byed pa'i chos can la tshad mas rab tu sbyar ba na gtan tshigs kyi gzhi la the tshom za ba'o //
analyzed: yang sgras ni ston par byed pa'i chos can la tshad mas rab tu sbyar ba na gtan tshigs kyi gzhi la the tshom za ba'o //
translated: The word also indicates that when the valid cognition is applied to the subject that is indicated, there is doubt about the basis of the reason.

original: chos can gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma yod pas gzhi ma grub pa yin par gsal ba nyid ni /
analyzed: chos can gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma yod pas gzhi ma grub pa yin par gsal ba nyid ni /
translated: The presence of a valid cognition that contradicts the subject is clearly the non-establishment of the basis,

original: bdag ni thams cad du song bar bsgrub par bya ba la yon tan thams cad na dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: bdag ni thams cad du song bar bsgrub par bya ba la yon tan thams cad na dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don to //

analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu gzhan yang sprul pa la mkhas pas ta la'i lo ma gcig la glang po la sogs pa'i gnas pa ston par byed do //

translated: Thus, having briefly taught the characteristics of the fallacious reason that is contradictory to the proof, what is the use of elaborating on that?

translated: The characteristics of the fallacious reason that is contradictory to the example have been eliminated by elaborating on that.ğŸ”½In that regard, etc. means that in the case of a contradiction between the thesis and the example, the example is contradictory because it possesses the reversal of the property of the subject, but the contradiction between the thesis and the example is not stated.

original: phyogs su byas pa'i chos mthun pa de las bzlog pa la yod pa yin no zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: phyogs su byas pa'i chos mthun pa de las bzlog pa la yod pa yin no zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: The property of the subject is reversed from the similar example, and it exists in the dissimilar example. This is how the words should be connected.

original: dpe zhes bya ba ni mthun pa'i dpe'i chos su 'dod do //
analyzed: dpe zhes bya ba ni mthun pa'i dpe'i chos su 'dod do //

original: gang gi phyir mi mthun pa'i dpe sgrub pa'i chos las bzlog pa ma yin na de la 'gal ba ci zhig yod /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mi mthun pa'i dpe sgrub pa'i chos las bzlog pa ma yin na de la 'gal ba ci zhig yod /
translated: What contradiction is there in the fact that the dissimilar instance is not the opposite of the property of the probandum?

original: de la dpe ni sgra dang bum pa bzhin yin no //
analyzed: de la dpe ni sgra dang bum pa bzhin yin no //
translated: The example is like sound and pot.

original: 'gal ba'i dper gyur pa ni gal te phyogs su byas pa'i chos yod cing gzhan dang thun mong pa ma gyur pa rab tu sgrub pa de'i tshe 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'o //

translated: The contradictory example is when the property of the subject is present and not common to the other, and the proof is contradictory.

original: gzhan dang thun mong du gyur pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan dang thun mong du gyur pa ni /

original: gzhan dang thun mong du ma gyur pa'o //ğŸ”½gzhan dang smos pa ni phyogs su byas pa'i chos las smos pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang thun mong du ma gyur pa'o // gzhan dang smos pa ni phyogs su byas pa'i chos las smos pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The other is not common.ğŸ”½The other is mentioned.

original: phyogs su byas pa'i chos las tha dad par sgrub pa ni mngon par mi 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs su byas pa'i chos las tha dad par sgrub pa ni mngon par mi 'dod pa'o //
translated: The property of the subject is mentioned. The proof is different from the property of the subject. It is not accepted.

original: phyogs su byas pa'i chos las bzlog pa dang ldan pa la yod par gal te de ltar bsgrubs na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyogs su byas pa'i chos las bzlog pa dang ldan pa la yod par gal te de ltar bsgrubs na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If it is established in this way, then it is said to be the opposite of the property that is the counter-correlate of the property-possessor.

original: bsgrub bya dang dpe dag gi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs nam mkha' la sogs pa 'jug cing de las bzlog pa bum pa la 'jug pa la yang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang thun
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang dpe dag gi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs nam mkha' la sogs pa 'jug cing de las bzlog pa bum pa la 'jug pa la yang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang thun
translated: Because it is the effect of the probandum and the example, this very [reason] engages with space, etc., which are the counter-correlates, and it engages with the pot, which is the opposite of those.

original: mong du gyur pa zhes bya ba tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: mong du gyur pa zhes bya ba tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder of the sentence is it becomes common to the similar and dissimilar instances.

original: thun mong gi ma nges par bshad pa ni dper na bsgrub par bya ba dang dpe dag la gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dis rab tu ma bsgrubs pa nyid la 'jug par nges so //
analyzed: thun mong gi ma nges par bshad pa ni dper na bsgrub par bya ba dang dpe dag la gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dis rab tu ma bsgrubs pa nyid la 'jug par nges so //
translated: As for the explanation of the common inconclusive [reason], for example, by this [reason] because of being an object of knowledge, it is ascertained to engage with what is not established, in both the probandum and the example.ğŸ”½That is ascertained to engage with the similar instances,

original: de ni mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug par nges pa 'am //
analyzed: de ni mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug par nges pa 'am //
translated: It is certain that one will engage in the favorable.ğŸ”½

original: mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug par nges par the tshom za ba'i ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug par nges par the tshom za ba'i ma nges pa yin no //
translated: The inconclusive is doubt about the presence of the reason in the similar and dissimilar instances.

original: ldog pa la the tshom za ba ni dper na skyes bu thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa 'am 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ldog pa la the tshom za ba ni dper na skyes bu thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa 'am 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin no //
translated: Doubt about the reversal is like, for example, doubting whether a person is not omniscient or not free from attachment.

original: @117a * // smra ba'i phyir lam po che'i mi bzhin no //ğŸ”½mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa de ni sgra rtag ste /
analyzed: @117a * // smra ba'i phyir lam po che'i mi bzhin no // mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa de ni sgra rtag ste /
translated: Because he speaks, like a person on the road.

original: mnyan par bya ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: The inconclusive that is not shared with the similar and dissimilar instances is like, for example, saying, â€œSound is permanent because it is audible.â€

original: gzhan gyis smras pa /
analyzed: gzhan gyis smras pa /
translated: Another says:

original: 'gal ba'i dpe la mi 'jug cing bzlog pa 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs la gtan tshigs kyi skyon cung zad cig kyang yod pa ma yin te /

original: dper na sgra ni mi rtag ste /
analyzed: dper na sgra ni mi rtag ste /
translated: For example, sound is impermanentğŸ”½because it is produced.

original: rkyen gyi bye brag tha dad pas tha dad pa'i phyir chos mthun pa'i dpe ni nam mkha' bzhin no //
analyzed: rkyen gyi bye brag tha dad pas tha dad pa'i phyir chos mthun pa'i dpe ni nam mkha' bzhin no //
translated: The example of a similar property is space, because of the difference of the different specific conditions.

analyzed: chos mi mthun pa'i dpe ni bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba 'di la /

original: 'dir ma grub pa la 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs la /
analyzed: 'dir ma grub pa la 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs la /
translated: Here, the reason for engaging in the unestablished is

analyzed: 'dir ma grub pa ni ma yin te /
translated: not unestablished here,

original: gtan tshigs chos can la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs chos can la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reason exists in the subject.

original: ma nges pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ma nges pa yang ma yin te /

analyzed: gnyi ga la mi 'jug pa'i phyir dang / 'brel pa grub pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'gal ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gal ba yang ma yin te /

analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the opposite of the similar property does not engage in the dissimilar property.

original: dam bca' ba dang dpe 'gal ba 'di ni gtan tshigs kyi skyon yul 'das pa'i dam bcas pa 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang dpe 'gal ba 'di ni gtan tshigs kyi skyon yul 'das pa'i dam bcas pa 'gal ba yin no zhe na /

original: 'di ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not tenable,

original: de la the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs las ma log pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs las ma log pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no reversal from the reason that is doubted.

original: gang gi phyir dpe dang 'gal ba'i phyir dam bca' ba ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dpe dang 'gal ba'i phyir dam bca' ba ni /
translated: Because it contradicts the example, the thesis

original: mthun pa'i phyogs kyi skyon yin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi skyon ma yin no //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs kyi skyon yin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi skyon ma yin no //
translated: is a fault of the similar class, not a fault of the dissimilar class.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mngon par 'dod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
