original: phyogs su byas pa'i chos las bzlog pa'i 'gal ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: phyogs su byas pa'i chos las bzlog pa'i 'gal ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the contradiction of the property of the subject.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs su brjod do zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs su brjod do zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no //
translated: The meaning is that it is stated as the dissimilar class.

original: gal te de lta na de yang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba las ji ltar 'das pa ma yin zhe na /ğŸ”½bshad pa / chos mthun pa nyid can gyi dpe la phyin ci log pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: gal te de lta na de yang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba las ji ltar 'das pa ma yin zhe na / bshad pa / chos mthun pa nyid can gyi dpe la phyin ci log pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni /
translated: If that is so, then how is it not a fallacious reason?ğŸ”½It is explained:

original: 'khrul pa med pa'i chos nyid du bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'khrul pa med pa'i chos nyid du bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir /
translated: In the case of an example that has the property of similarity, it is not possible to demonstrate that it has a non-erroneous nature.

original: de'i don dpes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i don dpes bstan pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the meaning that is illustrated by the example

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: is as stated:

original: gtan tshigs tshul gsum ldan pa bshad //
analyzed: gtan tshigs tshul gsum ldan pa bshad //
translated: The three modes of the reason are explained.

original: phyogs kyi chos la gnas pa dang // lhag ma tshul gnyis ldan pa'i don //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos la gnas pa dang // lhag ma tshul gnyis ldan pa'i don //
translated: The property of the subject and the remaining two modes have a meaningğŸ”½that is based on the property of the subject.

original: dpe yis rab tu bstan pa yin //ğŸ”½zhes bshad do //
analyzed: dpe yis rab tu bstan pa yin // zhes bshad do //
translated: It is taught by means of an example.

original: 'o na rkyen gyi bye bag tha @117b dad pa nyid kyis mi rtag pa de nyid la ji ltar mi 'khrul bar mi nus she na /
analyzed: 'o na rkyen gyi bye bag tha @117b dad pa nyid kyis mi rtag pa de nyid la ji ltar mi 'khrul bar mi nus she na /
translated: If one says that the impermanence of things is not established because of the non-establishment of the reason, then that is not so.

original: bshad pa / dngos po bsgrub par bya ba la mi 'khrul par ma yin yang tshad ma ma bstan pa'i phyir med pa dang 'dra ba yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: bshad pa / dngos po bsgrub par bya ba la mi 'khrul par ma yin yang tshad ma ma bstan pa'i phyir med pa dang 'dra ba yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that although the impermanence of things is not established as non-erroneous, it is like a non-existent because the valid cognition is not taught.

original: de ltar na gtan tshigs dang med na mi 'byung ba'i 'bral ba ma bstan pa de yang bsgrub par bya ba nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na gtan tshigs dang med na mi 'byung ba'i 'bral ba ma bstan pa de yang bsgrub par bya ba nges pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the non-teaching of the reason and the invariable concomitance is also not the ascertainment of the probandum.

original: de la dam bca' ba dang dpe'i 'gal ba de yang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba las ma 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: de la dam bca' ba dang dpe'i 'gal ba de yang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba las ma 'das pa yin no //
translated: The contradiction of the thesis and example is also not beyond being a fallacious reason.

original: da ltar gyi 'di yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog pa the tshom za ba'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: da ltar gyi 'di yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog pa the tshom za ba'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa yin no //
translated: The meaning is that the present is also doubtful because of being the opposite of the discordant class.

original: gtan tshigs 'gal ba 'ba' zhig ma yin pas yang gi sgra smos so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'gal ba 'ba' zhig ma yin pas yang gi sgra smos so //
translated: Since it is not only a contradictory reason, the word â€œalsoâ€ is stated.

original: gzhan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni gtan tshigs kyi sgo nas dang dpe'i sgo gnyi ga ltar yang gtan tshigs kyi skyon las sngar dpe'i skyon gyis rgol ba pham pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni gtan tshigs kyi sgo nas dang dpe'i sgo gnyi ga ltar yang gtan tshigs kyi skyon las sngar dpe'i skyon gyis rgol ba pham pa ni /
translated: Anticipating another's doubt, he says, It is not the case that the opponent is defeated by the fault of the example, prior to the fault of the reason.

original: dpe dang 'gal ba'i skyon gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: dpe dang 'gal ba'i skyon gzhan ma yin te /
translated: There is no other fault of contradicting the example.

original: gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not depend on another.

original: pham par 'gyur ba las pham pa gzhan med do zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: pham par 'gyur ba las pham pa gzhan med do zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: There is no other defeat than defeat by the reason.

original: rigs pa can khyad par gzhan du bsgrub pa'i yan lag go rims nges par rgol ba ni dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dang dpe dang nye bar sbyor ba dang / mjug bsdu ba dag go rims nges par brjod par rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs pa can khyad par gzhan du bsgrub pa'i yan lag go rims nges par rgol ba ni dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dang dpe dang nye bar sbyor ba dang / mjug bsdu ba dag go rims nges par brjod par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: The NaiyÄyika, who maintains that the members of proof have a fixed order, says, It is not correct to state the thesis, reason, example, application, and conclusion in a fixed order.

original: yang de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: yang de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the difference between the two?

original: dpe dang chos mthun par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: dpe dang chos mthun par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: He says, The example must be similar to the property-possessor.

original: dpe dang 'gal ba'i phyir gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yod pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: dpe dang 'gal ba'i phyir gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yod pa ma yin pas /
translated: Since there is no fallacious reason due to contradicting the example,

original: ji skad du bshad ma thag pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i skyon gyis rnam par gsal pa yin no //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad ma thag pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i skyon gyis rnam par gsal pa yin no //
translated: It is clear that it is flawed by the faults of conceptuality, just as they have been explained.

original: de ltar re zhig gang yang dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i rnam par gzhag pa 'di las shin tu 'das pa ma yin no zhes bya'o //ğŸ”½gang yang rna ma phug gi rnam bshad kyi t'i k'a las dper brjod pa'i rang bzhin gcig gsal ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig gang yang dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i rnam par gzhag pa 'di las shin tu 'das pa ma yin no zhes bya'o // gang yang rna ma phug gi rnam bshad kyi t'i k'a las dper brjod pa'i rang bzhin gcig gsal ba ma yin te /
translated: Thus, it is not at all beyond the presentation of a fallacious reason that contradicts a thesis.

original: tshad dang ldan pa'i phyir kham phor bzhin no zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs de yang 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: tshad dang ldan pa'i phyir kham phor bzhin no zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs de yang 'gal ba yin te /
translated: Also, in the Tika, in the context of the example, it says that the reason â€œbecause it is limitedâ€ is contradictory.ğŸ”½This is because a reason that is limited does not pervade the similar class, and it pervades the dissimilar class, such as a pot, because it is a plurality.

original: tshad dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs kyang mthun pa'i phyogs la med pas mi 'jug la mi mthun pa'i phyogs kham por la sogs pa rang bzhin du ma la 'jug pa'i phyir dang / sa'i skad cig ma re re la cha shas yod pa'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½nga ni @118a * //
analyzed: tshad dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs kyang mthun pa'i phyogs la med pas mi 'jug la mi mthun pa'i phyogs kham por la sogs pa rang bzhin du ma la 'jug pa'i phyir dang / sa'i skad cig ma re re la cha shas yod pa'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½nga ni @118a * //
translated: This is because each moment of earth has parts.

original: gtan tshigs kyang dpe dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'dus pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyang dpe dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'dus pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: The reason is included in the apparent reason that contradicts the example.

original: gtan tshigs kyang dpe dang 'gal ba gnyis la thun mong du yod pa 'am 'al ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyang dpe dang 'gal ba gnyis la thun mong du yod pa 'am 'al ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The reason is contradictory because it is common to both the similar and dissimilar instances.

original: gang gi tshe 'gal bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'gal bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: When is it contradictory?

original: bshad pa chos ni mthun pa la 'jug pa na'o //
analyzed: bshad pa chos ni mthun pa la 'jug pa na'o //
translated: It is said: when the property is engaged in the similar instance.

original: gang yang gang la dper brjod pa de nyid kyis yin te /ğŸ”½rdzas ni yon tan las tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: gang yang gang la dper brjod pa de nyid kyis yin te / rdzas ni yon tan las tha dad pa yin te /
translated: And also, it is by that very example that is given.

original: don gzhan du mi dmigs pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin no //ğŸ”½gang la snang du rung bar gyur pa na gtan tshigs kyi khyad par dang 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan du mi dmigs pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin no // gang la snang du rung bar gyur pa na gtan tshigs kyi khyad par dang 'gal ba yin te /
translated: Substance is different from quality because it is not perceived as a different object, like a pot.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la mi 'jug pa'i phyir dang / gzugs la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rang gi ngo bo la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la mi 'jug pa'i phyir dang / gzugs la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rang gi ngo bo la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When it is suitable to appear, it is contradictory to the distinction of the reason because it is not engaged in the similar instance and because it is engaged in the nature of the dissimilar instance, such as form.

original: khyad par du ma byas na ni sha la sogs pa bzhin du mi dmigs pa yang don gzhan gyis 'khrul bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: khyad par du ma byas na ni sha la sogs pa bzhin du mi dmigs pa yang don gzhan gyis 'khrul bar 'gyur te /
translated: If it is not distinguished, then non-apprehension, like flesh, etc., would be confused with something else,

original: phan tshun tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are mutually different.

original: 'dir bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba 'di dpe ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba 'di dpe ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, the example â€œlike a potâ€ is not correct,

original: de'i rdzas gzhan 'di dag phyogs su byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rdzas gzhan 'di dag phyogs su byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because its substance is different from these.

original: gzugs la sogs pa de'i tha dad par 'dzin pa sngar nyid nas bgag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa de'i tha dad par 'dzin pa sngar nyid nas bgag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The apprehension of its difference from form, etc., has already been refuted.

original: 'dzin na ni ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin pa'i phyir kho bo cag gi 'dod pa nyid gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dzin na ni ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin pa'i phyir kho bo cag gi 'dod pa nyid gnas pa yin no //
translated: If it is apprehended, then it is an unestablished reason, a fallacious one, and so our assertion remains.

original: 'on te gtan tshigs tshad ma dang 'gal ba'i tshad mas de ltar snang ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gtan tshigs tshad ma dang 'gal ba'i tshad mas de ltar snang ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the reason is contradicted by valid cognition, then it appears thus.

original: bshad pa ma grub pa yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa ma grub pa yin te /
translated: The explanation is unestablished,

original: me la grang ba ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me la grang ba ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because cold is not established in fire.

original: gang yang 'dir dper brjod pa gzhan ni me ni dro ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang yang 'dir dper brjod pa gzhan ni me ni dro ba ma yin te /
translated: And also, here, another example is given: â€œFire is not hot,ğŸ”½because it is a product, like a sense-organ.â€

original: rdzas yin pa'i phyir chu bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: rdzas yin pa'i phyir chu bzhin no zhe na /
translated: because it is a substance, like water.

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not a correct reason,

original: mngon sum gyi rdzas la gnod pas de chos can la ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi rdzas la gnod pas de chos can la ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the substance of direct perception is not established as the subject, since it is contradicted.

original: 'on te dam bca' ba'i don tsam shes pa yin pa de lta na dam bca' ba'i don mngon sum dang 'gal ba'i phyir de gtan tshigs des khyab pa med pa ni gtan tshigs tshad ma dang 'gal ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'on te dam bca' ba'i don tsam shes pa yin pa de lta na dam bca' ba'i don mngon sum dang 'gal ba'i phyir de gtan tshigs des khyab pa med pa ni gtan tshigs tshad ma dang 'gal ba'i don to //
translated: If it is the mere understanding of the meaning of the thesis, then because the meaning of the thesis contradicts direct perception, the absence of pervasion by that reason is the meaning of the reason contradicting valid knowledge.

original: de lta na 'on te bsgrub par bya ba dang 'gal ba'i chos kyis khyab pa na ldog pa la the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin pas kho bo cag gi phyogs bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na 'on te bsgrub par bya ba dang 'gal ba'i chos kyis khyab pa na ldog pa la the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin pas kho bo cag gi phyogs bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: In that case, if it is pervaded by a property contradictory to the probandum, it is a seemingly correct reason that causes doubt about the counter-pervasion, so our position is established.

original: gtan tshigs tshad ma dang 'gal ba ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs tshad ma dang 'gal ba ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because contradicting valid knowledge is not beyond being a seemingly correct reason.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: khyab pa 'dzin pa'i dus @118b su ni //
analyzed: khyab pa 'dzin pa'i dus @118b su ni //
translated: At the time of apprehending the pervasion,

original: mngon sum la sogs 'gal ba yi //
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs 'gal ba yi //
translated: there is contradiction with direct perception and so on.

original: 'gal bas khyab par gyur pa na //ğŸ”½chos can la ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: 'gal bas khyab par gyur pa na // chos can la ni mi rigs so //
translated: When there is pervasion by contradiction,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: it is not reasonable for the subject.

original: dam bca' tshad ma dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba de tsam du gyur par 'dod na 'ga' zhig kyang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'du bar nus pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dam bca' tshad ma dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba de tsam du gyur par 'dod na 'ga' zhig kyang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'du bar nus pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you accept that the thesis is just that which contradicts valid knowledge, then nothing can be included among the fallacious reasons.

original: bshad pa / dam bca' ba tshad ma dang 'gal ba ni rang gi tshig gi sgo nas bshad zin pa yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa / dam bca' ba tshad ma dang 'gal ba ni rang gi tshig gi sgo nas bshad zin pa yin te /
translated: Response: The thesis that contradicts valid knowledge is explained by way of its own words.

original: byas zin pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: byas zin pa med pa yin no //
translated: It is not nonexistent.

original: de la 'di nyid sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu ma gyur ba'i dam bca' ba'i tshig sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'i tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: de la 'di nyid sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu ma gyur ba'i dam bca' ba'i tshig sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'i tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no //
translated: In that case, the statement of a thesis that is not a part of the proof is a basis for refutation in the proof statement, and so on.

original: phyi rol zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
analyzed: phyi rol zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
translated: â€œExternalâ€ means because of that.

original: thams cad 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: â€œEverything is just thisâ€ is the conclusion.

original: gang yang 'gal ba'i lan gzhan ni phyogs snga ma brjod pa gzhan dang gzhan spang bar bya ba de ni 'brel pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gang yang 'gal ba'i lan gzhan ni phyogs snga ma brjod pa gzhan dang gzhan spang bar bya ba de ni 'brel pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: Any other contradictory response is not related to the other and other rejections of the opponentâ€™s position.

original: gang gi phyir gang gi tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te sgra ni mi rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang gi tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te sgra ni mi rtag pa yin te /
translated: Because when one says, â€œSound is impermanent,â€

original: dbang po'i gzung bar bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: dbang po'i gzung bar bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: it is apprehended by the sense faculties,

original: bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba de ltar sangs rgyas pa las gzhan pa dpyod pa dang gzhan gzegs zan pa nyid pa lang nyid la sogs pa'i phyir rang gi phyogs la grub pa gzhan rgol ba sangs rgyas pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs 'khrul par dogsğŸ”½pa yin no //
analyzed: bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba de ltar sangs rgyas pa las gzhan pa dpyod pa dang gzhan gzegs zan pa nyid pa lang nyid la sogs pa'i phyir rang gi phyogs la grub pa gzhan rgol ba sangs rgyas pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs 'khrul par dogs pa yin no //
translated: like a pot,â€ the Buddhist fears that the non-Buddhist opponentâ€™s proof, â€œBecause of being bovine, etc.,â€ is a mistaken reason.

original: khyed kyi ba lang nyid de yang dbang po'i gzung bya yin par mi rtag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyed kyi ba lang nyid de yang dbang po'i gzung bya yin par mi rtag par 'gyur ro //
translated: And that bovine-ness of yours is apprehended by the sense faculties, so it would be impermanent.

original: gang gi tshe de ltar gzhan la sgro btags nas brjod pas 'khrul par 'gyur ba de'i sangs rgyas pa de'i rang gi phyogs la de dang de'i spyi rtag pa dbang pos gzung bar bya ba 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de ltar gzhan la sgro btags nas brjod pas 'khrul par 'gyur ba de'i sangs rgyas pa de'i rang gi phyogs la de dang de'i spyi rtag pa dbang pos gzung bar bya ba 'gal ba yin no //
translated: When one superimposes something else and speaks in that way, one is mistaken.

original: rtag pa'i don gang yin pa khas len pa dang 'dod pa'i phyir ji ltar 'khrul bar 'gyur /
analyzed: rtag pa'i don gang yin pa khas len pa dang 'dod pa'i phyir ji ltar 'khrul bar 'gyur /
translated: But since the Buddhist accepts that the universal of that is permanent and is apprehended by the sense faculties, how could he be mistaken?

original: 'gal bas gnod par yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gal bas gnod par yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The point is that it is not right to refute him by contradiction.

original: rigs na ni lan du brjod par 'gyur gyi de lta na yang gzhan gzhan gyis 'khrul ba'i khur steng du 'jog par brjod pa 'di ni ji ltar 'gal ba'i lan ma yin /
analyzed: rigs na ni lan du brjod par 'gyur gyi de lta na yang gzhan gzhan gyis 'khrul ba'i khur steng du 'jog par brjod pa 'di ni ji ltar 'gal ba'i lan ma yin /
translated: If it were right, then we would respond, but since it is not, how could this statement that places the burden of error on another be a response that avoids contradiction?

original: gang gi phyir de ni rgol ba rang nyid kyi khas len pa'i ba lang nyid brtags pa la dbang pos gzung bar bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'jug pa yod pa'i lan ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ni rgol ba rang nyid kyi khas len pa'i ba lang nyid brtags pa la dbang pos gzung bar bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'jug pa yod pa'i lan ni /
translated: The response to the argument that the universal of cow is apprehended by the sense faculties in the context of the opponentâ€™s own assertion is as follows.

original: the tshom du gyur pa ni de ci @119a * //
analyzed: the tshom du gyur pa ni de ci @119a * //
translated: The opponent thinks, â€œHow can that be?â€

original: bum pa bzhin du dbang po'i gzung bya yin pa'i phyir sgra mi rtag par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: bum pa bzhin du dbang po'i gzung bya yin pa'i phyir sgra mi rtag par 'gyur ram /
translated: Or, like a pot, would sound become impermanent because it is an object apprehended by a sense faculty?

original: ci ba lang nyid la sogs par brtag par 'gyur /
analyzed: ci ba lang nyid la sogs par brtag par 'gyur /
translated: Or, would it be like the investigation of cowness?

original: bdag nyid kyi rtog pa med par de ltar ston par byed ces smras so //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi rtog pa med par de ltar ston par byed ces smras so //
translated: He says that he teaches in that way without his own investigation.

original: rang gi phyogs ba lang nyid brtag pa la dbang pos gzung bar bya ba yin pa de'i phyir 'di kho na nyid la ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di bdag nyid khas blangs kyi ma nges par brjod pas spong bar byed do //
analyzed: rang gi phyogs ba lang nyid brtag pa la dbang pos gzung bar bya ba yin pa de'i phyir 'di kho na nyid la ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di bdag nyid khas blangs kyi ma nges par brjod pas spong bar byed do //
translated: He himself accepts that the reason is not established for his own position, that cowness is an object apprehended by a sense faculty, and he rejects it by stating that it is not established for the opponent.

original: kho bo'i lan yin no //
analyzed: kho bo'i lan yin no //
translated: That is my response.

original: sangs rgyas pa la ba lang nyad brtag pa med par 'dod pa des na lan 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa la ba lang nyad brtag pa med par 'dod pa des na lan 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is contradictory for me to respond in that way because Buddhists do not assert that cowness is investigated,

original: de'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: then in response to that I say this:

original: gtan tshigs de yang dbang pos gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de yang dbang pos gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The reason is that it is an object apprehended by a sense faculty.

original: ba lang nyid don dam par yod dam med kyang rung sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa la bsgrub pa ni bzlog pa la yod par gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma mi 'jug par the tshom gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid yin //
analyzed: ba lang nyid don dam par yod dam med kyang rung sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa la bsgrub pa ni bzlog pa la yod par gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma mi 'jug par the tshom gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid yin //
translated: Whether or not the meaning of â€œoxâ€ exists ultimately, the reason is inconclusive because it is the cause of doubt, since a valid cognition that contradicts the existence of the reverse of the probandum does not engage.ğŸ”½The reason is inconclusive because the power to prove is not established.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa rab tu ma bsgrubs pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang med na mi 'byung ba 'di dang zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa rab tu ma bsgrubs pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang med na mi 'byung ba 'di dang zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The statement â€œthe reasonâ€ is connected to â€œthis is the invariable relation with the probandum.â€

original: sgrub par byed pa smos pa ni dngos po sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa smos pa ni dngos po sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: The statement â€œthe reasonâ€ is connected to â€œthe establishment of the thing.â€

original: gang gi tshe gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma'i stobs kyis gtan tshigs med na mi 'byung bar thams cad bsdus nas sgrub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma'i stobs kyis gtan tshigs med na mi 'byung bar thams cad bsdus nas sgrub par byed pa yin te /
translated: When the power of a valid cognition that contradicts is applied, the reason is established by including all the cases of the invariable relation.

original: dbang po'i shes pa'i gzung bar bya ba'i rang snang ba'i shes pa gang cung zad cig skyed pa'i phyir mi rtag na de thams cad thams cad kyi tshe shes pa'i yul du thal bar 'gyur ba'i res 'ga' zhig kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa'i gzung bar bya ba'i rang snang ba'i shes pa gang cung zad cig skyed pa'i phyir mi rtag na de thams cad thams cad kyi tshe shes pa'i yul du thal bar 'gyur ba'i res 'ga' zhig kyang ma yin no //
translated: Because it is impermanent, since it generates any consciousness that is its own appearance, which is the object of the sense consciousness, it follows that it is always the object of consciousness, and it is not the case that it is sometimes not.

original: da ni ba lang nyid la sogs pa la yang gnod par byas na 'chi ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni ba lang nyid la sogs pa la yang gnod par byas na 'chi ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, if one objects that it is also harmed by the existence of cowness, etc.,

original: ba lang nyid la gtan tshigs mi 'jug par the tshom med pa yin no //
analyzed: ba lang nyid la gtan tshigs mi 'jug par the tshom med pa yin no //
translated: then there is no doubt that the reason does not apply to cowness.

original: de dag gis ni zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de dag gis ni zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
translated: â€œ By theseâ€ is easy to understand.

original: de yang ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba las 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: de yang ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba las 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the summary is that it is beyond the uncertain and fallacious reasons.

original: de ni the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs nyid kyi sgo nas sgrub mi nus pa'i ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs yin no / phyogs gcig gzhan la zhugs pa yang dngos po'i phyir gnyi ga la grub na cig shos la yang ma yin pas dngos po la yang ma
analyzed: de ni the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs nyid kyi sgo nas sgrub mi nus pa'i ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs yin no / phyogs gcig gzhan la zhugs pa yang dngos po'i phyir gnyi ga la grub na cig shos la yang ma yin pas dngos po la yang ma
translated: And when one part is engaged in the other, it is inconclusive because it is a reason that is established for both parties, but not for one of them.

original: nges par khyad par med do //
analyzed: nges par khyad par med do //
translated: So there is no difference between the inconclusive reason and the one that is established for both parties.

original: ji ltar sngar ji skad bshad @119b ma thag pa'i gtan tshigs de yang yod dam med kyang rung zhes bya ba cig shos kyi phyogs la zhugs pa ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar sngar ji skad bshad @119b ma thag pa'i gtan tshigs de yang yod dam med kyang rung zhes bya ba cig shos kyi phyogs la zhugs pa ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa bshad pa yin no //
translated: As was just explained, the reason is inconclusive because it is engaged in the other position, whether it exists or does not exist.

original: mi 'dod pa dang nyes pa thams cad med par sems pa na sgrub pa dang sun 'byin pa gnyi ga la rab tu grub pa yin no zhes bya /
analyzed: mi 'dod pa dang nyes pa thams cad med par sems pa na sgrub pa dang sun 'byin pa gnyi ga la rab tu grub pa yin no zhes bya /
translated: When one thinks that there is no undesirable fault, then both the proof and the refutation are well established.

original: ji ltar de dag dang 'gal bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de dag dang 'gal bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is it that they are not contradictory?

original: de yang de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang de lta ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: nges par sun 'byin par 'dod nas smras pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par sun 'byin par 'dod nas smras pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is stated with the intention of refuting it.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gzhan yang bsgrub bya yin la ltos pa yin no zhes de ma thag tu bshad zin to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gzhan yang bsgrub bya yin la ltos pa yin no zhes de ma thag tu bshad zin to //
translated: For this very reason, it was just explained that the other is also the probandum and the dependent.

original: de ltar gyur na gnyi ga las gcig kyang de'i tshe pham pa dang rgyal ba dag tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na gnyi ga las gcig kyang de'i tshe pham pa dang rgyal ba dag tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were the case, then neither would be defeated or victorious at that time.

original: gang gi tshe 'od byed kyi dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba'i mdo'i 'grel pa 'chad pa'i dpe ltar snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa'i tshe yang rigs pa can yan lag gzhan par smra ba ni mi rigs so zhes sangs rgyas pas brjod pa ni
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'od byed kyi dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba'i mdo'i 'grel pa 'chad pa'i dpe ltar snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa'i tshe yang rigs pa can yan lag gzhan par smra ba ni mi rigs so zhes sangs rgyas pas brjod pa ni
translated: When the Buddhist says that it is not right for the NaiyÄyika to speak of another part when he states the example, â€œas in the case of the statement of a sÅ«tra that contradicts the thesis of the Illuminator,â€

original: mdzes pa yin no zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: mdzes pa yin no zhes dgongs so //
translated: he thinks that it is beautiful.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang pa bstan pa'i tshig de ltar snang ba yang de'i tshig gi sgo nas go ba yin pa de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa gzhan med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang pa bstan pa'i tshig de ltar snang ba yang de'i tshig gi sgo nas go ba yin pa de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa gzhan med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The statement that reveals the fallacious reason is understood by means of that statement, and therefore it follows that there is no other proof.

original: des zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: â€œBy thatâ€ refers to the remainder.

original: 'o na dpe ltar snang ba dag gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams kyi nang du 'dus par 'dod na gtan tshigs dang dpe yan lag gzhan du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshig 'brel pa med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na dpe ltar snang ba dag gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams kyi nang du 'dus par 'dod na gtan tshigs dang dpe yan lag gzhan du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshig 'brel pa med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you maintain that the fallacious examples are included among the fallacious reasons, then the expression the reason and example are not stated separately is not correct.

original: dpe ltar snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dpe ltar snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The expression fallacious example and so on.

original: 'di dang 'dir sbyor ba brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'di dang 'dir sbyor ba brjod pa ni /
translated: The expression of this and this in the syllogism

original: gang dang gang don gzhan du gyur pa de ni der snang bar brjod pa la yin la /
analyzed: gang dang gang don gzhan du gyur pa de ni der snang bar brjod pa la yin la /
translated: is in terms of what is different from the object.

original: gang der snang ba rnams ni de'i nang du 'dus pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gang der snang ba rnams ni de'i nang du 'dus pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But those that appear in that way are not included in that,

original: dper na mngon sum la snang ba rnams dang rjes su dpag pa la snang ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mngon sum la snang ba rnams dang rjes su dpag pa la snang ba bzhin no //
translated: just as, for example, what appears in perception does not appear in inference.

original: khyed kyi gtan tshigs dang dpe don gzhan du gyur pa yang de bzhin du yin pas zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: khyed kyi gtan tshigs dang dpe don gzhan du gyur pa yang de bzhin du yin pas zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba dmigs pa yin no //
translated: Your reason and example are different from the object in the same way, is a case of the observation of contradiction with the pervasion.

original: de bas na dpe yang gtan tshigs kyi nang du 'dus par 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na dpe yang gtan tshigs kyi nang du 'dus par 'dod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the example should be considered as included within the reason.

original: de lta na yang dpe logs shig tu sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur na logs shig tu 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na yang dpe logs shig tu sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur na logs shig tu 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even so, the example would be a separate member of the proof, but it is not mentioned separately.

original: byed pa gcig pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byed pa gcig pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: because it has the same function.

original: dpe gang yin pa de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ltar dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs yang 'gal @120a * //
analyzed: dpe gang yin pa de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ltar dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs yang 'gal @120a * //
translated: As for the example, etc., it is explained that the thesis and the reason are contradictory.

original: par bshad pa de yang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir logs shig tu brjod par mi bya'o zhes bstan to //
analyzed: par bshad pa de yang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir logs shig tu brjod par mi bya'o zhes bstan to //
translated: Since that is also included within the apparent reason, it should not be mentioned separately.

original: 'dis ni dam bca' ba la gnod pa dag kyang 'di bzhin du khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni dam bca' ba la gnod pa dag kyang 'di bzhin du khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: By this, one should understand the refutation of the thesis in the same way.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Moreover, etc.

original: rgol ba'i phyogs snga ma smos pa ni rgol ba'i phyogs phyi ma ma shes pa la sogs pa gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dang 'brel ba yod par bstan pa'i don to //
analyzed: rgol ba'i phyogs snga ma smos pa ni rgol ba'i phyogs phyi ma ma shes pa la sogs pa gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dang 'brel ba yod par bstan pa'i don to //
translated: The mention of the opponent's position is for the purpose of showing that the fallacious reason is related to the opponent's position, etc.

original: de dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: The word related means related to the fallacious reason.

original: 'on te don gzhan go bar byed pa la sogs pa brjod pas gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on te don gzhan go bar byed pa la sogs pa brjod pas gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, it is because the fallacious reason is related to the expression of the other meaning, etc. that are to be understood.

original: de dag ni nang du 'du ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de dag ni nang du 'du ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say they are not included within those,

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: that is also not so.

original: don gzhan go bar byed pa la sogs pa yang gtan tshigs la nus pa med pa nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gzhan go bar byed pa la sogs pa yang gtan tshigs la nus pa med pa nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the other meaning, etc. that are to be understood also have the absence of capacity with respect to the reason.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: nus pa med pa la rigs pa'i stobs kyis rgol bas bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: nus pa med pa la rigs pa'i stobs kyis rgol bas bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: The opponent's position, etc. is taught by the power of reasoning with respect to that which is without capacity. This is the remainder.

original: don gzhan gyis go bar byed pa la sogs pa phyin ci log pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: don gzhan gyis go bar byed pa la sogs pa phyin ci log pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that it is a perversion to understand the meaning in any other way.

original: lan phyis 'byung ba de la yang dam bca' ba 'di yod pa med pa de ltos pa ci zhig bya ci yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lan phyis 'byung ba de la yang dam bca' ba 'di yod pa med pa de ltos pa ci zhig bya ci yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And in response to that, what use is this thesis of yours, â€œThe existent is not, the nonexistent is not,â€ which is meaningless?

original: yongs su bgrang bar mi nus pa dang / gang dag sman par rab tu smra ba dag gis 'dod pa de dang de bzhin du sman la sogs pa la brjod pa'i rgol ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni dam bca' ba yod pa med pa la sogs pa de dag go //
analyzed: yongs su bgrang bar mi nus pa dang / gang dag sman par rab tu smra ba dag gis 'dod pa de dang de bzhin du sman la sogs pa la brjod pa'i rgol ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni dam bca' ba yod pa med pa la sogs pa de dag go //
translated: The meaning is that the arguments that are stated in regard to medicine, etc., by those who are proponents of medicine, are the same as the arguments in regard to the thesis of the existence of the nonexistent, etc.

original: nye bar bkod pa de ni ci zhag yin /
analyzed: nye bar bkod pa de ni ci zhag yin /
translated: What is this reductio that you adduce?

original: de ltar gyur pa'i skyon yang 'ga' zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i skyon yang 'ga' zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the fault that would ensue if that were the case?

original: de lta bu ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de lta bu ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, â€œBecause it would lead to absurd consequences.â€

original: de bzhin du gzhan yang brgyal ba dang myos pa dang 'khrul pa dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa ni sogs pa'i sgra bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan yang brgyal ba dang myos pa dang 'khrul pa dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa ni sogs pa'i sgra bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Likewise, fainting, intoxication, confusion, pain, etc. are included by the word â€œetc.â€

original: de'i phyir de dag kyang 'brel pa med pas mkhas pa'i dbang po rnams kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu rigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag kyang 'brel pa med pas mkhas pa'i dbang po rnams kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu rigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Therefore, since they are also unrelated, the master of the wise thinks that this kind of form is reasonable.

original: gal te 'dir rna ma phug gi rang nyid nus pa med pa zlog par byed pa rags pa yin pa'i phyir 'di tshar gcad pa'i gnas ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'dir rna ma phug gi rang nyid nus pa med pa zlog par byed pa rags pa yin pa'i phyir 'di tshar gcad pa'i gnas ma yin zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that here the ear-hole itself is not capable of refuting, because it is gross, it is not a basis for refutation,

original: dbang po dang phyir rgol ba nye ba na dam bca' ba don khyad du gsod par byed pa zhes bya @120b ba 'brel pa med par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang po dang phyir rgol ba nye ba na dam bca' ba don khyad du gsod par byed pa zhes bya @120b ba 'brel pa med par brjod pa yin no //
translated: then, when the sense faculty and the opponent are near, the statement â€œthe proposition is disregardedâ€ is said to be unrelated.

original: bsam pa yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam pa yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the intention is not fully understood.

original: sgra ni 'jigs pa'i phyir brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: sgra ni 'jigs pa'i phyir brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: Sound should not be expressed because of fear.

original: 'on kyang dam bca'i don ldan pa dang rnam par dbye bas gsal bar mi byed do snyam nas smras pa /
analyzed: 'on kyang dam bca'i don ldan pa dang rnam par dbye bas gsal bar mi byed do snyam nas smras pa /
translated: But, thinking that the meaning of the thesis is not clearly stated by the mere statement of the thesis, he says:

original: spyi'i dngos po la brten nas gsal ba'i phyir 'khrul bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin te /
analyzed: spyi'i dngos po la brten nas gsal ba'i phyir 'khrul bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin te /
translated: â€œIt is a ground for defeat if one says, â€˜There is no error because the particular is based on the universal,â€™

original: sngar dam ma bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar dam ma bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one has not previously stated the thesis.â€

original: ma nges pa'i skyon gyis gtan tshigs bgag pas dam bca' ba khyad par du gsod par byed pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya bar de la brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ma nges pa'i skyon gyis gtan tshigs bgag pas dam bca' ba khyad par du gsod par byed pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya bar de la brjod par bya'o //
translated: â€œIt is a ground for defeat if the reason is refuted because of the fault of inconclusiveness, and the thesis is thereby especially confirmed,â€ this is what should be said to him.

original: gal te rgol ba dogs pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi nang nas mdzangs pa'i 'ga' zhig ma nges pa'i skyon rjod par byed de /
analyzed: gal te rgol ba dogs pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi nang nas mdzangs pa'i 'ga' zhig ma nges pa'i skyon rjod par byed de /
translated: If a clever debater, out of fear of defeat, states the fault of inconclusiveness,

original: dam bca'i don gyi 'bras bur byed pa ni /
analyzed: dam bca'i don gyi 'bras bur byed pa ni /
translated: then the result of the thesis is

original: rang gi 'dod pa bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: rang gi 'dod pa bsal ba yin no //
translated: the elimination of his own assertion.

original: de'i tshe skyon gzhan 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: de'i tshe skyon gzhan 'ga' yang med do //
translated: At that time, there is no other fault.

original: dam bca' ba bkod pa yang ci'i yan lag yin /
analyzed: dam bca' ba bkod pa yang ci'i yan lag yin /
translated: And why is the statement of the thesis a part of that?

original: 'on te 'dod pa med na yod pa'i phyir dam bca' ba khyad par du byed do //
analyzed: 'on te 'dod pa med na yod pa'i phyir dam bca' ba khyad par du byed do //
translated: But if you do not accept that, then the thesis is distinguished by the reason.

original: de'i tshe yang ma nges pa'i skyon kho nas tshar gcad pa'i phyir dam bca' ba nye bar bkod pa la ltos pa ci zhig yod /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang ma nges pa'i skyon kho nas tshar gcad pa'i phyir dam bca' ba nye bar bkod pa la ltos pa ci zhig yod /
translated: And at that time, what is the point of positing a thesis, since you are refuted by the fault of nonestablished reasons alone?

original: ci zhig spong zhing ci zhig gsal bar byed //
analyzed: ci zhig spong zhing ci zhig gsal bar byed //
translated: What is to be refuted? What is to be clarified?

original: dam bca' ba gzhan par gyur pa zhes bya ba 'di ni logs shig tu brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dam bca' ba gzhan par gyur pa zhes bya ba 'di ni logs shig tu brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: The thesis â€œthe otherness of the thingâ€ should not be stated separately.

original: gtan tshigs khyad par med pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdo las bstan pas /
analyzed: gtan tshigs khyad par med pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdo las bstan pas /
translated: The sÅ«tra states that the reason is not distinguished, and so on.

original: 'dir dpe gsal bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don te //
analyzed: 'dir dpe gsal bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don te //
translated: The example clarifies this, that is, the meaning.

original: ser skya'i gtso bos tshad ma sgrub par 'dod pas shing la sogs pa'i gsal ba ni rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: ser skya'i gtso bos tshad ma sgrub par 'dod pas shing la sogs pa'i gsal ba ni rang bzhin yin te /
translated: The chief proponent of Kapila, desiring to establish a means of valid knowledge, says: Manifestations such as trees are natures,

original: tshad yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tshad yod pa'i phyir /
translated: because they are limited.

original: bum pa dang kham phor la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bum pa dang kham phor la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: They are like pots, dishes, and so on.

original: rang bzhin gcig pa yin no zhes bya ba sbyar ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig pa yin no zhes bya ba sbyar ro //
translated: They are the same nature.

original: rang bzhin gzugs la sogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gzugs la sogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The cause of form, etc., is the nature.

original: rang bzhin gyi 'gyur ba ni tshogs gang yin pa de gtso bo yin la /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi 'gyur ba ni tshogs gang yin pa de gtso bo yin la /
translated: The transformation of the nature is the collection, which is the primary nature.

original: gru bzhi dang zlum po la sogs pa ni gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gru bzhi dang zlum po la sogs pa ni gyur ba yin no //
translated: The square, round, etc., are the transformations.

original: grangs can 'dod do //
analyzed: grangs can 'dod do //
translated: This is the belief of the Samkhyas.

original: ji lta ba sngon du song ba'i rgyu dang / 'bras bu med do snyam nas smras pa /ğŸ”½phyir rgol ba gtan tshigs 'di 'khrul pa yin no zhes brgal zhing brtag par byed pa dang / rta dang ba lang la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du ma dang bum pa dang kham phor la @121a * //ğŸ”½sogs pa gcig gi rang bzhin yongs su gyur pa tshad ma thong ba yin no zhes rgol bas de ltar brgal zhing brtag par byed pa la gal te gtso bor smra bas /
analyzed: ji lta ba sngon du song ba'i rgyu dang / 'bras bu med do snyam nas smras pa / phyir rgol ba gtan tshigs 'di 'khrul pa yin no zhes brgal zhing brtag par byed pa dang / rta dang ba lang la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du ma dang bum pa dang kham phor la @121a * // sogs pa gcig gi rang bzhin yongs su gyur pa tshad ma thong ba yin no zhes rgol bas de ltar brgal zhing brtag par byed pa la gal te gtso bor smra bas /
translated: The opponent may say, â€œThe cause that existed previously does not exist as an effect,â€ and so he may argue and investigate, saying, â€œThis reason is mistaken.â€ğŸ”½The opponent may argue and investigate, saying, â€œThe nature of many things, such as horses and oxen, and the nature of one thing, such as a pot or a bowl, are seen to transform.â€

original: brgal zhing brtag pa 'gegs pa ni 'du ba'i 'brel pas 'gyur ba rnams rang bzhin du mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: brgal zhing brtag pa 'gegs pa ni 'du ba'i 'brel pas 'gyur ba rnams rang bzhin du mthong ba yin no //
translated: If the proponent of the primary nature responds to such arguments and investigations, he may say, â€œThe transformations are seen as the nature by the connection of their collection.â€

original: gtan tshigs khyad par dang bcas pas 'khrul pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs khyad par dang bcas pas 'khrul pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is not a mistake because of the special reason,

original: ji ltar rang bzhin gcig dang 'du ba yin /
analyzed: ji ltar rang bzhin gcig dang 'du ba yin /
translated: how can there be a single nature and a combination?

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang ma rig pa dang 'brel pa'i yongs su gyur pa'i gsal ba 'di dag tshad ma dang ldan par 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang ma rig pa dang 'brel pa'i yongs su gyur pa'i gsal ba 'di dag tshad ma dang ldan par 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: These manifestations, which are transformations related to pleasure, pain, and nescience, are apprehended by valid cognition.

original: thams cad du de'i 'bras bu mthong ba yin no zhes bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad du de'i 'bras bu mthong ba yin no zhes bsams pa yin no //
translated: The result of that is seen everywhere.

original: 'di ltar bde ba shas che ba ni dang ba dang / spangs pa dang skye ba dang / ngal sos pa dang dga' ba dang mgu ba dag 'bras bu yin no //ğŸ”½rdul cha shas che bar gyur pa na /ğŸ”½skams pa dang / gdung ba dang / rengs pa dang / zhe sdang ba'o //

analyzed: mi 'dod pa'i phyir dang rnam par mi chod pa'i phyir dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: yongs su gzung ba ni rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag gis byas pa'o //

analyzed: rang bzhin 'di gtan tshigs kyi dbang du byas nas bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin gyi don to //

original: sgra ni rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni rtag pa yin te /
translated: Sound is permanent,

original: reg bya ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: reg bya ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po sgrub pa med na yang 'chad pa po la sogs pa'i bshad pa'i @121b rnam pa 'ga' zhig rtogs pa'i don nyid kyis don sgrub par byed pa'i rigs pa de dag rang gis 'dod pa dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir zhes shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, even though the thing is not established, the one who explains and so on understands the meaning of the explanation in some way, and the reason that establishes the meaning is not contradicted by what is accepted by the opponent.

analyzed: sgra'i ngo bor grub par brjod pa ni de nyid don med pa yin te /

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: dper brjod pa na //

analyzed: yang dam bca' ba brjod pa ni mjug bsdu ba yin no zhes bya ba mtshan nyid de lta bu ni mjug bsdu ba'o //

analyzed: skyes bu chos can du brjod pas ci zhig bya /

original: legs par sbyar ba'i sgra bsgrub par bya ba'i chos su brjod par 'dod na /
analyzed: legs par sbyar ba'i sgra bsgrub par bya ba'i chos su brjod par 'dod na /
translated: If you want to express the property to be established using a Sanskrit term,

original: legs par sbyar ba ma yin pa de yang 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: legs par sbyar ba ma yin pa de yang 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that non-Sanskrit term would also be unrelated.

original: khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no relation between the pervader and the pervaded.

original: gang dang gang gi phyir kho bo cag gis sgra sbyar ba ni ba lang gi sgra brjod par 'dod pas ni dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang dang gang gi phyir kho bo cag gis sgra sbyar ba ni ba lang gi sgra brjod par 'dod pas ni dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: For whatever reason, when we use the term â€œcow,â€ one who wishes to express the term â€œcowâ€ does not have an object.

original: 'on te phyogs kyi chos mtshang ba mi gsal bas yin na byis pa'i tshig mi gsal ba las rjes su dpag par bya'o zhes brgal zhing brtag par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te phyogs kyi chos mtshang ba mi gsal bas yin na byis pa'i tshig mi gsal ba las rjes su dpag par bya'o zhes brgal zhing brtag par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is because the property of the subject is not stated, then one should infer from the unclear words of a child.

original: de bzhin du legs par sbyar ba ma yin pas legs par sbyar ba'i zhes bya ba de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du legs par sbyar ba ma yin pas legs par sbyar ba'i zhes bya ba de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, it is not correct to say that â€œthe correct is by means of the correctâ€ because it is not well-formed.

original: de yang brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is because the objection and analysis are the same.

original: kho bo cag gis dngos po rtogs pa med pa de'i phyir de yang mi gsal ba tsam gyis don rtogs pa yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: kho bo cag gis dngos po rtogs pa med pa de'i phyir de yang mi gsal ba tsam gyis don rtogs pa yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: We do not understand things, and therefore it is not correct to say that â€œunderstanding is by means of the mere non-clarity of that.â€

original: de yang ming dang ming can gyi 'brel ba shes pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang ming dang ming can gyi 'brel ba shes pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: And that is because there is no understanding of the relation between the name and the bearer of the name.

original: rtogs pa yang mi rigs pa ni khas blang bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: rtogs pa yang mi rigs pa ni khas blang bar mi bya ste /
translated: And it is not correct to accept that â€œunderstanding is not correct,â€

original: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas tha snyad brgyud pa de lta bur gyur ba 'di dang 'brel pa'i rtags med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas tha snyad brgyud pa de lta bur gyur ba 'di dang 'brel pa'i rtags med pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'di ltar shing la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyang phal che ba la ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar shing la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyang phal che ba la ma yin te /
translated: And it is not the case that the words â€œtreeâ€ and so on are the majority,

original: don gyi zung tsam nges pa med pas so //
analyzed: don gyi zung tsam nges pa med pas so //
translated: because there is no ascertainment of the mere pair of objects.

original: brdar byas pa'i tha snyad brgyud pa la mkhas pas nges pa dang ldan pa ni 'dir thun mong ba nyid do //
analyzed: brdar byas pa'i tha snyad brgyud pa la mkhas pas nges pa dang ldan pa ni 'dir thun mong ba nyid do //
translated: The common property is the possession of certainty by the expert in the tradition of the conventional symbol.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni nags tshal na du ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni nags tshal na du ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the smoke in the forest.

original: aam pa aam be zhes bya ba ni dper na byis pa dang slob sbyor ba dang / mkhas pa bya ba @125a * //
analyzed: aam pa aam be zhes bya ba ni dper na byis pa dang slob sbyor ba dang / mkhas pa bya ba @125a * //
translated: The expression â€œam-pa-veâ€ is like the case of the child, the apprentice, and the expert.

original: gsal ba dang de yang rigs pas gsal por nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsal ba dang de yang rigs pas gsal por nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: And that is made clear by the reasoning.

original: de ltar legs par ma byas pa las blo 'khrul pa skye ba de bas na legs par sbyar bas bskal ba'i don 'ga' zhig 'dren par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar legs par ma byas pa las blo 'khrul pa skye ba de bas na legs par sbyar bas bskal ba'i don 'ga' zhig 'dren par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since the error of the mind arises from the incorrect [use of the symbol], therefore, by the correct [use of the symbol], one does not lead to the meaning of the word.

original: gal te de yang ku m'a ra ri las brjod pa //
analyzed: gal te de yang ku m'a ra ri las brjod pa //
translated: If that is so, then KumÄrila has said:

original: kho bo'i sgra yi gnas pa la //
analyzed: kho bo'i sgra yi gnas pa la //
translated: In my grammar

original: de skyed byed pa'i nus med na /
analyzed: de skyed byed pa'i nus med na /
translated: there is no capacity to produce

original: goo yi sgra las ba lang blo //
analyzed: goo yi sgra las ba lang blo //
translated: the cognition of a cow from the word â€œgo.â€

original: rtsa ba'i sgra yi rjes 'brang 'gyur //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sgra yi rjes 'brang 'gyur //
translated: It follows after the word â€œroot.â€

original: de yang de nyid brjod pa dang // 'di thams cad bsdoms nas mjug bsdu na brgyud pas rtogs pa yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de yang de nyid brjod pa dang // 'di thams cad bsdoms nas mjug bsdu na brgyud pas rtogs pa yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: Moreover, it is said that the meaning of the treatise is understood through the commentary, and that all of this is summarized in the conclusion.

original: 'dir yang gtan tshigs bsags pa ni bshad pa don rtogs pa'i nus pa med pa ni sgra 'dir yang rtogs pa skyed pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang gtan tshigs bsags pa ni bshad pa don rtogs pa'i nus pa med pa ni sgra 'dir yang rtogs pa skyed pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the collection of reasons is explained: the meaning of the treatise is not understood because the words do not have the power to generate understanding.

original: de la 'di snyam du kho bo cag lags par ma sbyar bas don rnams la rtogs pa skye'i 'on kyang rjod par byed pa ni ma yin pa legs par ma sbyar bas rtogs pa skyes par byed kyang rjod par byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'di snyam du kho bo cag lags par ma sbyar bas don rnams la rtogs pa skye'i 'on kyang rjod par byed pa ni ma yin pa legs par ma sbyar bas rtogs pa skyes par byed kyang rjod par byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you think that we do not connect the words, but understanding arises from the meanings, and that although the words do not connect, understanding arises, then it is said:

original: don yang rjod par byed pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan nyid ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: don yang rjod par byed pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan nyid ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The meaning is not different from the words.

original: gal te legs par sbyar ba ma yin pa'i don rtogs pa bskyed pa nyid du 'dod na kho bo cag de tsam gyis yongs su mgu bas kho bo cag la rjod par byed pa ma yin pa rjod par byed pa gzhan brtags pa nyid kyis ci zhig bya
analyzed: gal te legs par sbyar ba ma yin pa'i don rtogs pa bskyed pa nyid du 'dod na kho bo cag de tsam gyis yongs su mgu bas kho bo cag la rjod par byed pa ma yin pa rjod par byed pa gzhan brtags pa nyid kyis ci zhig bya
translated: If you assert that the meaning of a well-formed statement generates understanding, we are not satisfied with just that. What is the point of positing another statement that does not express that meaning?

original: snyam du dgongs so //
analyzed: snyam du dgongs so //
translated: This is what he thinks.

original: da lta na 'di ni don khong du chud pa skyed par byed par mi nus na yang sgra kho nas yin no zhe na /
analyzed: da lta na 'di ni don khong du chud pa skyed par byed par mi nus na yang sgra kho nas yin no zhe na /
translated: If you think that even though it cannot generate understanding of the meaning now, it can do so later,

original: zur chag pa'i sgra yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zur chag pa'i sgra yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says â€œEven a corrupt statement,â€ and so on.

original: 'dir bshad pa sgra ni don de'i rang bzhin gyi 'brel pa ma yin pa de'i phyir de nyid kyis don rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa sgra ni don de'i rang bzhin gyi 'brel pa ma yin pa de'i phyir de nyid kyis don rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Here â€œstatementâ€ is not related to the nature of that meaning, therefore it does not generate understanding of that meaning.

original: dper na mig gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis gsal bar byed pa yin gyi sgra la sogs pa'i ma yin pa bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na mig gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis gsal bar byed pa yin gyi sgra la sogs pa'i ma yin pa bzhin du /
translated: For example, the eye is that which illuminates form by its nature, but it is not sound and so on.

original: brdar ma byas pa'i sgra yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /ğŸ”½rtogs pa dang 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: brdar ma byas pa'i sgra yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni / rtogs pa dang 'brel pa ste /
translated: The phrase because the sound that is not a conventional symbol is not seen is related to the understanding.

original: sing ga la'i sgras 'phags pa'i yul gyi tha snyad la 'jug par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: sing ga la'i sgras 'phags pa'i yul gyi tha snyad la 'jug par mi 'gyur la /
translated: The word Siá¹…gÄla would not be used in the conventions of the noble land.

original: brdas byas pa nyid yod na ni rtogs pa skyes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brdas byas pa nyid yod na ni rtogs pa skyes par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it were a conventional symbol, the understanding would arise.

original: de la brdas byas pas don 'di dang 'brel pa yang mi bzlog pa yin /
analyzed: de la brdas byas pas don 'di dang 'brel pa yang mi bzlog pa yin /
translated: And in that case, the connection with the meaning by the conventional symbol would not be refuted.

original: de bshad pa /
analyzed: de bshad pa /
translated: The response to that is:

analyzed: legs par ma sbyar ba legs par sbyar ba brda'i dbang gis 'jug na /
translated: If the usage of a well-formed word is due to the power of a conventional symbol,

analyzed: khams la sogs pa'i sgra ci'i phyir don nyid la 'jug @125b par me 'gyur /
translated: why would the word element not engage with the meaning itself?

original: de lta bu'i skyon dang yon tan ni 'ga' zhig kyang med do snyam nas /
analyzed: de lta bu'i skyon dang yon tan ni 'ga' zhig kyang med do snyam nas /
translated: Thinking that there is no such fault or virtue,

original: de lta na rtogs pa po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de lta na rtogs pa po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: the opponent says, In that case, the one who understands... and so on.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being shown:

original: dper na sgron ma la sogs pa dang gzugs la sogs pa la mig la sogs pa skye ba bzhin du sgra nyams pas 'gal te sgra la rang bzhin gyis gsal bar byed pa de na de yang sgra la mi ltos par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na sgron ma la sogs pa dang gzugs la sogs pa la mig la sogs pa skye ba bzhin du sgra nyams pas 'gal te sgra la rang bzhin gyis gsal bar byed pa de na de yang sgra la mi ltos par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: For example, the eye and so on arise from sound, just as a lamp and so on arise from form and so on. This contradicts the claim that sound is the clarifier of the nature of things, because then the lamp and so on would not depend on sound.

original: ltos na yang des sgra 'di'i rang bzhin la nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ltos na yang des sgra 'di'i rang bzhin la nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if it did depend on sound, it would not have the power to clarify the nature of sound.

original: 'di rjes su dpag par nus pa de lta na yang thams cad brda la ltos nas 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di rjes su dpag par nus pa de lta na yang thams cad brda la ltos nas 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Even though it is possible to infer that sound is the clarifier of the nature of things, all [words] operate in dependence on conventional symbols.

original: ji lta ba'i brda ni log pa med pa ni dngos su rtogs par byed par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji lta ba'i brda ni log pa med pa ni dngos su rtogs par byed par mi 'gyur te /
translated: A conventional symbol that is not mistaken does not directly cause the understanding of the nature of things.

original: dper na lus kyi rnam par rig byed bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na lus kyi rnam par rig byed bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the bodily expression of an intention.

original: zur chag pa'i sgra de yang de bzhin du sgra la ltos nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di grub pa yin no //
analyzed: zur chag pa'i sgra de yang de bzhin du sgra la ltos nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di grub pa yin no //
translated: And the corrupted sound also operates in dependence on sound in the same way. This is established.

original: de nyid don rtogs pa nyid la sgrib pa med do //
analyzed: de nyid don rtogs pa nyid la sgrib pa med do //
translated: There is no obstruction to the understanding of the meaning of that [sound].

original: yul gzhan yang bstan pa bsags pa ni shing dang me dang rdo ni 'di lta bu'o //
analyzed: yul gzhan yang bstan pa bsags pa ni shing dang me dang rdo ni 'di lta bu'o //
translated: The other object is taught in the Collection on Topics: â€œWood, fire, and stone are like this.â€

original: bshad pa nas byas pa'i blo can mi mkhas pa shing la sogs pa 'di ci la bya zhes rim gyis dri ma yod pa na /
analyzed: bshad pa nas byas pa'i blo can mi mkhas pa shing la sogs pa 'di ci la bya zhes rim gyis dri ma yod pa na /
translated: The explanation is: â€œThe ignorant person who is confused asks, â€˜What is this wood, etc.?â€™ in sequence.

original: de la yang mkhas pas thabs med pas sgra nyams pa'i sgo nas shing dang me dang rdo yin no zhes bstan no //
analyzed: de la yang mkhas pas thabs med pas sgra nyams pa'i sgo nas shing dang me dang rdo yin no zhes bstan no //
translated: The expert, not having a method, teaches by way of a defective sound, â€˜It is wood, fire, and stone.â€™â€

original: de ltar 'dir sgra nyams pa kho na de'i rjod par byed pa yin na legs par sbyar ba kho na ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar 'dir sgra nyams pa kho na de'i rjod par byed pa yin na legs par sbyar ba kho na ma yin te /
translated: Thus, if only a defective sound is the expresser of that, it is not only a well-formed sound,

original: yod kyang rnam grangs pa'i mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod kyang rnam grangs pa'i mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because even that is seen to be a synonym.

original: 'on te legs par sbyar ba'i sgras bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'on te legs par sbyar ba'i sgras bstan pa ni /
translated: But if the teaching is by a well-formed sound,

original: chos yin te /
analyzed: chos yin te /
translated: that is Dharma.

original: de skad du /ğŸ”½legs par chos kyi sgrub byed du //
analyzed: de skad du / legs par chos kyi sgrub byed du //
translated: It is said:ğŸ”½The well-formed is established by scripture

original: ya rabs rnams la lung gis grub //
analyzed: ya rabs rnams la lung gis grub //
translated: for the righteous.

original: don shes tha dad med na yang //
analyzed: don shes tha dad med na yang //
translated: Even though the meaning is not different,

original: sgra nyams phyin ci log pa yin //
analyzed: sgra nyams phyin ci log pa yin //
translated: the defective sound is mistaken.

original: de bzhin sngags kyi dbyangs dang yi ge nyams pa yang log pa'i rab tu sbyor ba de ni don med yin par bshad /
analyzed: de bzhin sngags kyi dbyangs dang yi ge nyams pa yang log pa'i rab tu sbyor ba de ni don med yin par bshad /
translated: Likewise, the degeneration of the melody and syllables of mantra is also explained as a meaningless perverse application.ğŸ”½For example,

original: dper na / dbang po'i dgra bo yi ge nyams pa las //
analyzed: dper na / dbang po'i dgra bo yi ge nyams pa las //
translated: from the degeneration of the syllables of the enemy of the sense faculties,

original: gsung gi rdo rje mchod spyin brlag pa yin //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje mchod spyin brlag pa yin //
translated: the offering of the vajra speech is lost.

original: de ni lha la hi la yan hi la yang zhes brjod pa dang ldan pa ni sgra gcig gis bsnan nas sbyar na ni mkhas pa'i 'jig rten gyis go bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni lha la hi la yan hi la yang zhes brjod pa dang ldan pa ni sgra gcig gis bsnan nas sbyar na ni mkhas pa'i 'jig rten gyis go bar 'gyur ro //
translated: That is endowed with the utterance of hala and hala to the deity. If it is applied with the addition of one sound, it will be understood by the wise world.

original: sgra nyams pa brjod pa'i ltung ba'i nyes pa ni me la mchod pa byas pas dag par 'gyur ro zhe'o //
analyzed: sgra nyams pa brjod pa'i ltung ba'i nyes pa ni me la mchod pa byas pas dag par 'gyur ro zhe'o //
translated: The fault of the downfall of expressing the degeneration of sound is purified by making offerings to the fire.

original: 'di dag gsal bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di dag gsal bar bya ste /
translated: These should be clarified.

original: chos sgrub pa ni ma yin gyi sgra mngon par 'du byed pa yin te /ğŸ”½de ci'i @126a * //
analyzed: chos sgrub pa ni ma yin gyi sgra mngon par 'du byed pa yin te / de ci'i @126a * //
translated: It is not the practice of Dharma, but the creation of sound.

original: phyir zhe na /
analyzed: phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: brjod pa las log pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: brjod pa las log pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: It is said that from expression, one enters into the opposite.

original: log pa la 'jug pa brjod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu yin te /ğŸ”½dper na byu ru lta bu'i lcug ma sar pa'i snye ma'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i nags tshal gyi drung /
analyzed: log pa la 'jug pa brjod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu yin te / dper na byu ru lta bu'i lcug ma sar pa'i snye ma'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i nags tshal gyi drung /
translated: The result is the statement, â€œOne would be speaking of engaging in error.â€ğŸ”½For example, it would be like saying, â€œCut the branch of the coral tree with the sharp sword of the blue lotus, while lying on the Malaya mountain near the beautiful Asoka forest.â€

original: ma la ya'i ri la nyal ba'i bram ze autpala sngon po lta bu'i ral gyi shin tu rnon pos chod cig ces brjod par 'gyur ba nyid bram ze gsod pa'i 'brel par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma la ya'i ri la nyal ba'i bram ze autpala sngon po lta bu'i ral gyi shin tu rnon pos chod cig ces brjod par 'gyur ba nyid bram ze gsod pa'i 'brel par 'gyur ro //
translated: The statement would be related to the killing of the brahmin.

original: legs par ma sbyangs pa gzhan dag gis phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa la 'jug pa rjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: legs par ma sbyangs pa gzhan dag gis phyin ci ma log pa yang dag pa la 'jug pa rjod par 'gyur te /
translated: Others who are not well trained would speak of engaging in non-error and correctness.

original: dpar na bram ze 'di la ba lang cig byin cig ces bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dpar na bram ze 'di la ba lang cig byin cig ces bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it would be like saying, â€œGive this brahmin a cow.â€

original: brjod pa thams cad la tshad ma med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: brjod pa thams cad la tshad ma med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because all statements are invalid,

original: khyed kyi tshig tsam yin no zhes bsams nas rtsegs pa ni /
analyzed: khyed kyi tshig tsam yin no zhes bsams nas rtsegs pa ni /
translated: thinking, â€œIt is just your words,â€ you object,

original: sgra sbyor ba kho na las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sgra sbyor ba kho na las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: saying, â€œIt is only from the application of sound,â€ and so on.

original: rnam pa de ltar brjod pa ni tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa de ltar brjod pa ni tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Such statements are not valid cognitions.

original: 'o na mi gnas pa'i sa phyogs mchod rten bzhengs na tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskrun pas bskal pa'i lha'i bde skyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang tshad ma med par mtshungs pas khyed yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na mi gnas pa'i sa phyogs mchod rten bzhengs na tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskrun pas bskal pa'i lha'i bde skyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang tshad ma med par mtshungs pas khyed yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Well then, it is also equally unreasonable to say that one who builds a stupa in an uninhabited place will create the merit of Brahma and will obtain the happiness of the gods for an eon.

original: mtshungs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshungs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the same.

original: gang gi phyir yul gnyis po 'dir rnam par dag pa dang gtso bo'i don la 'dir mi slu ba yod pa yin na gnas gsum par bya ba la yang rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams la yongs su mgu nas 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yul gnyis po 'dir rnam par dag pa dang gtso bo'i don la 'dir mi slu ba yod pa yin na gnas gsum par bya ba la yang rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams la yongs su mgu nas 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because in these two cases, there is nondeception in regard to the pure object and the primary object, respectively. But in the third case, those who understand will be completely satisfied and will engage in the practice.

original: de ltar khyed kyi 'dod pa de ma thag tu bstan pa gnyi ga yang yod pa ma yin te: tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar khyed kyi 'dod pa de ma thag tu bstan pa gnyi ga yang yod pa ma yin te: tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, both of your assertions are untenable, because they are contradicted by valid cognitions.

original: tshad ma dang 'gal ba ni de ma thag tu bshad zin to //
analyzed: tshad ma dang 'gal ba ni de ma thag tu bshad zin to //
translated: The contradiction with valid cognitions has already been explained.

original: de'i dbul po dang phyug po mnyam kyang mnyam par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i dbul po dang phyug po mnyam kyang mnyam par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the poor and the rich are equal, but they are not equal.

original: gang rig bya rig pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba yin /
analyzed: gang rig bya rig pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba yin /

analyzed: rig byed kyi rkyen nang du 'dus par bstan pa yin no //

original: sogs pa smos pa ni snying rje la sogs pa yongs su gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pa ni snying rje la sogs pa yongs su gzung ngo //

original: 'di ni legs par sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni legs par sbyar ba'o //

analyzed: gzhan ni legs par sbyar ba ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni med pa'o //

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /

original: sgra @126b ni tha dad pa'i phyir don shes pa'i 'bras bu can yin te /
analyzed: sgra @126b ni tha dad pa'i phyir don shes pa'i 'bras bu can yin te /

analyzed: gnas pa yin pa la mngon par zhen pa khyad par can gyis sbyar ba'i khyad par can gang zhig yin /

original: de nyid kyi phyir rtogs pa dang ldan pas bsams pa las gzhan yin pa'i phyir rjes su rtog pa'i don ming gi 'di nyid yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rtogs pa dang ldan pas bsams pa las gzhan yin pa'i phyir rjes su rtog pa'i don ming gi 'di nyid yin no zhes bya'o //

analyzed: yang na kho bo cag bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis 'di spong bar mdzad pa ni dgos pa ci zhig yod /

analyzed: gang bshad pa 'dir tha dad par bya ba 'ga' zhig gi ngag la yang dbang po mid na dbang pos gang las 'di de lta bu yid /

analyzed: 'di rab tu sbyor ba gzhan ni ma yin par nges par bya /

analyzed: de ci ltar yon tan khyad par can du 'gyur ba ma yin zhes brjod pa na /

original: rig byed bsrung ba la sgos pa'i dgos pa ni de'i brdar byas pa ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i lugs la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rig byed bsrung ba la sgos pa'i dgos pa ni de'i brdar byas pa ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i lugs la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //

original: sgra ni smyon pas bstan pa yin la de ltar ni dva ra dva dza yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni smyon pas bstan pa yin la de ltar ni dva ra dva dza yin te /
translated: Sound is taught by the insane, and that is the case with Dvaidha.

original: yan lag bzlog pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: yan lag bzlog pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: â€œAlso the reversal of the limbsâ€ and so on is stated.

original: 'brel pa shes pa zhes bya ba ni phan 'dogs par byed pa dang phan gdags par bya ba'i dngos po 'brel par brgyud pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa shes pa zhes bya ba ni phan 'dogs par byed pa dang phan gdags par bya ba'i dngos po 'brel par brgyud pa'o //
translated: â€œKnowledge of the connectionâ€ is the connection of the thing that benefits and the thing to be benefited.

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i nus pa las rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i nus pa las rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //

analyzed: 'on te rkang mig gis grub mtha' brkyang pa'i dam bca' ba la sogs pa bzlog pa yin zhe na /
translated: But if it is the thesis, etc. of the opponent that is being refuted,

analyzed: 'dir nges par byed pa'i brda dang grub mtha' cung zad kyang tshad ma med pa yin pa'i phyir tha snyad du mi bya'o //

analyzed: gzhan gyis gal te bzlog pa la ni rtogs pa ma yin te zhes bya ba bsgrub bya'o //

original: 'o na te de las bzlog pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na te de las bzlog pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then, since the opposite is understood,

original: ro: / de dag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de nyid bshad de /
analyzed: ro: / de dag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de nyid bshad de /
translated: â€œ Thoseâ€ and so on explain just that.

analyzed: de de byas pa las bzlog pa las yin no zhes bya bar brjod pa gang las yin don rtogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /

analyzed: chos mthun pa'i sbyor ba byas kyang chos mi mthun pa'i sbyor ba byed par thal bar 'gyur na /

analyzed: lhag ma dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

original: dam bca' ba smos pa ni /
analyzed: dam bca' ba smos pa ni /

analyzed: nye bar mtshon pa tsam gyi don yin no //

translated: That is not correct.ğŸ”½The one who, without the meaning of the words, applies the statement of the probandum as the proof, by implication understanding the statement of the proof, is worthy of defeat.

analyzed: don dang 'brel pa dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel ba ci brjod par mi rigs pa ma yin gyi yang dag par dpyad pa la sogs par byed pa ni rnam 'grel byed pa yin no //

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: gang gi phyir snga mas sgra byas pa nyid du rtogs pa kho na'o //

analyzed: skabs kyi sgra yang blo la gnas pa yin pa de las rjes su 'gro ba dag dran pa tsam las skyes pa'i phyir ro // rtogs pa med pa na slar yang byas pa nyid bya ba ma yin no //
translated: The word â€œalsoâ€ indicates that sound is also a property of the subject.ğŸ”½If there is no understanding, then the statement â€œSound is a productâ€ is not a correct proof.

analyzed: de sgra yang byas pa yin no zhes bya ba de las kyang mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de rjes su mthun pa nyid du byas pa yin te / 'di ltar gal te res 'ga' nges par rtogs pa yod pa 'dir phyir rgol ba la ni byas pa yin no zhes dpe de'i tshe phyogs la chos bsdu bar mi bya ste /
