analyzed: de ltar na 'on te nges pa med pa de'i tshe yang 'dir gzhan la phyogs chos bsdu ba byas pa gang yin pa de yang ma grub pa brjod par 'gyur ro // de la bdag gi de rkyen gyi bye brag tha dad pa'i thabs kyi gsal ba 'am /

original: sgra yang byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra yang byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: mi 'gyur bar gzhan la grub pa de'i skabs su yang sgra ni byas pa'o zhes bya ba yang brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni de tsam brjod par bya'o //

original: de skad du /ğŸ”½dpe la de yi ngo bo dang / @128a * //
analyzed: de skad du / dpe la de yi ngo bo dang / @128a * //
translated: As it is said:ğŸ”½In regard to examples, one does not know their nature

analyzed: rgyu'i dngos mi shes de dag la //
translated: and the cause, so those

original: ston te mkhas pa rnams la ni //
analyzed: ston te mkhas pa rnams la ni //
translated: are taught to the wise.

original: gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig brjod par zad //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig brjod par zad //

original: ces bya ba smos so //
analyzed: ces bya ba smos so //
translated: The reason is stated.

analyzed: de dang de dag ni nges par khas blangs pas lhag ma tshar gcad pa'i gnas kyi khyad par gyi yul du gzhag go //

analyzed: khyad par gyi yul de yang sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

analyzed: 'o na nges pa khas blangs nas brjod pa yin zhes bya ba rnam bshad mkhan gyis brjod pa slob dpon gyis 'dir ci zhig tu brjod /
translated: â€œBut it is said that the expounder has stated it after accepting the thesis,â€ what is the Master saying here?

original: bden te cung zad kyang brjod pa med de slob dpon gyis rkang mig gis smras pa nyid rjes su shes pa'i don du yang rjes su brjod do //
analyzed: bden te cung zad kyang brjod pa med de slob dpon gyis rkang mig gis smras pa nyid rjes su shes pa'i don du yang rjes su brjod do //
translated: It is true that he does not state anything at all, but the Master repeats what PÅ«rá¹‡avardhana said in order to make it known.

original: sgra dang don dag smra ba ni yang brjod pa yin no zhes bya bar smra ba ni skur ba 'debs pa ni /ğŸ”½rjes su smras pa las gzhan zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: sgra dang don dag smra ba ni yang brjod pa yin no zhes bya bar smra ba ni skur ba 'debs pa ni / rjes su smras pa las gzhan zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The statement â€œthe statement of the word and the meaning is a repetitionâ€ is a denial.

original: rjes su smras pa ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su smras pa ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: The statement â€œfrom the repetitionâ€ is a conclusion.

original: rjes su smra ba ni yang brjod pas bstan par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su smra ba ni yang brjod pas bstan par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: The subsequent statement is not taught by repetition,

original: sgra dag gis don gyi bye brag byed na 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra dag gis don gyi bye brag byed na 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is tenable that the words make a distinction in the meaning.ğŸ”½The conclusion is the teaching of the establishment of the thesis from the teaching of the probandum.

original: bsgrub bya bstan pa gang las dam bca' ba grub zin pa ston pa ni mjug bsdu ba yin no zhes bshad de yang sgra du ma nyid mthong bas dus mi ring bar yang nges pa'i nus pa nges par yang bya ba'o zhes kyang rig par bya ba nyid
analyzed: bsgrub bya bstan pa gang las dam bca' ba grub zin pa ston pa ni mjug bsdu ba yin no zhes bshad de yang sgra du ma nyid mthong bas dus mi ring bar yang nges pa'i nus pa nges par yang bya ba'o zhes kyang rig par bya ba nyid
translated: And it should be understood that the capacity for ascertainment is also produced in a short time by seeing the multiplicity of words.

original: do // 'o na te de lta na gal te yang brjod pas thob pa nyid med pa yin na ni don 'di gsal pa ci'i phyir rtsol zhe na /
analyzed: do // 'o na te de lta na gal te yang brjod pas thob pa nyid med pa yin na ni don 'di gsal pa ci'i phyir rtsol zhe na /
translated: But if, in that case, there is no attainment by repetition, why make an effort to clarify this point?

original: bden te 'di lta bu 'di nyid rtog ge ba phul du phyung ba la ji lta ba yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: bden te 'di lta bu 'di nyid rtog ge ba phul du phyung ba la ji lta ba yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dri bar bya'o //
translated: It is true, but this very thing should be asked: â€œHow is it for the best logicians?â€

original: kho bo cag la pha rol gnas sems shing dpyod pa rnams kyis ci zhig bya ste /
analyzed: kho bo cag la pha rol gnas sems shing dpyod pa rnams kyis ci zhig bya ste /
translated: What need have we for those who dwell on the other side, pondering and investigating?

original: zhar la 'byung bas chog go /
analyzed: zhar la 'byung bas chog go /
translated: Enough with this digression.

original: 'di la yang mdo gnyis pa yod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di la yang mdo gnyis pa yod pa yin te /
translated: Here, too, there is a second sutra:

original: don spangs nas sgra rang nyid la 'jug pa yin no zhe'o //
analyzed: don spangs nas sgra rang nyid la 'jug pa yin no zhe'o //
translated: Having abandoned the meaning, one engages in the sound itself.

original: de slob dpon gyi nye bar bkod pa ni mtshon pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de slob dpon gyi nye bar bkod pa ni mtshon pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the master's formulation, because it is merely an illustration.

original: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i don la bzlas pa nas brjod pa la sogs pa 'di dag kyang spang bar bya zhing bsal bar 'dod pas 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa skyon rtsol ba yin no //
analyzed: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i don la bzlas pa nas brjod pa la sogs pa 'di dag kyang spang bar bya zhing bsal bar 'dod pas 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa skyon rtsol ba yin no //
translated: From the repetition of the meaning of what is to be understood and what understands, these expressions such as spoken are to be abandoned. The one who wishes to eliminate this fault says here and so on.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being shown:

original: gang la sgra dang don la nye bar tha dad pa de la don yang bshad pa nyid kyis rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang la sgra dang don la nye bar tha dad pa de la don yang bshad pa nyid kyis rtogs pa yin no //
translated: For one to whom the sound and meaning are adjacent, the meaning is understood just by the explanation.

original: gang la sgra don dang nye bar tha dad pa de la sgra yang brjod pa 'di yang skyon cung zad tsam med de /
analyzed: gang la sgra don dang nye bar tha dad pa de la sgra yang brjod pa 'di yang skyon cung zad tsam med de /
translated: For one to whom the sound and meaning are not adjacent, the sound is also expressed. This expression has not the slightest fault.

original: ci 'di 'dra @128b pa yod dam zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'di 'dra @128b pa yod dam zhe na /
translated: If one asks, Is there such a thing?

original: sgra yang brjod pa gang yin pa 'di la don tha dad pa yod pa nyid srid pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra yang brjod pa gang yin pa 'di la don tha dad pa yod pa nyid srid pa yin te /
translated: In this expression of sound, it is possible that there is a different meaning.

original: bshad pa / dper na rgod na yang rgod par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa / dper na rgod na yang rgod par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: For example, when one is excited, one becomes excited, and so on.

original: 'dir ni snga ma'i brjod pa'i sgra ni 'dun pa yin la gnyis pa ni ti ngan ta yin pas don tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni snga ma'i brjod pa'i sgra ni 'dun pa yin la gnyis pa ni ti ngan ta yin pas don tha dad pa yin no //
translated: Here, the former expression of the word is desire, and the second is a negative particle, so the meaning is different.

original: 'di 'dra ba snyan dang gas mkhan 'don pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba snyan dang gas mkhan 'don pa yin te /
translated: This is the way the grammarians explain it.

original: srid pa yin nam zhes bya ba'i dgos pa la dpe yang brjod pa ni /
analyzed: srid pa yin nam zhes bya ba'i dgos pa la dpe yang brjod pa ni /
translated: In the case of the necessity of the expression â€œis there existence?,â€ the example is stated:

original: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: For example, and so on.

original: 'on te 'dir bya ba de'i mtha' dang t+ya de'i mtha' yang yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te 'dir bya ba de'i mtha' dang t+ya de'i mtha' yang yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if here the end of that action and the end of that are also existent,

original: bden te sgra nyi tshe tsam yang yod pa yin te /
analyzed: bden te sgra nyi tshe tsam yang yod pa yin te /
translated: it is true that only the sound exists.

original: 'dir yang sgra mi rtag ces bya ba lta bu sgra tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang sgra mi rtag ces bya ba lta bu sgra tha dad pa'o //
translated: Here also, like â€œsound is impermanent,â€ the sound is different.

original: rang gi tha dad pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi tha dad pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The difference of itself is due to the difference of its own characteristic.

original: de lta ma yin na rim pa med pas thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na rim pa med pas thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, there would be no order, and it would be obtained.

original: mtshungs pa la brten nas mtshungs par thos pa'i 'di zlog par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshungs pa la brten nas mtshungs par thos pa'i 'di zlog par brjod pa yin no //
translated: The repetition is stated in order to refute the notion that the similarity is based on the similarity of hearing.

original: de la cig shos 'di yang mtshungs pa yin no zhes don tha dad pa 'di yang bya ba tha dad pa la sogs pa'i tshig tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la cig shos 'di yang mtshungs pa yin no zhes don tha dad pa 'di yang bya ba tha dad pa la sogs pa'i tshig tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And in this case, the other is also similar, because the words â€œdifferentâ€ and so on refer to different actions.

original: rtogs par gyur pa'i don la yang brjod par yang zlos par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: rtogs par gyur pa'i don la yang brjod par yang zlos par brjod pa yin no //
translated: And the repetition is stated in order to express the meaning that is understood.

original: yang brjod pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis pa'i mdo ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin no //
analyzed: yang brjod pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis pa'i mdo ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin no //
translated: The sÅ«traâ€™s second definition of repetition is merely an illustration.

original: dpe 'di yang bad tsha ya yis rigs pa bshad pa dang chos mthun par chos mi mthun pa'i sbyor ba la bshad do //
analyzed: dpe 'di yang bad tsha ya yis rigs pa bshad pa dang chos mthun par chos mi mthun pa'i sbyor ba la bshad do //
translated: This example is explained as a syllogism with a dissimilar example that is similar to the explanation of the reasoning.

original: slob dpon gyis dam bca' ba la yang mtshungs par dgongs nas dam bca' ba bsgrub par bya bar brjod nas rjes su dpag pa ston par byed par 'dod pa la tshig zur gyis dam bca' ba'i tshig brjod pa'i dpe nyid du nye bar bkod pa yin no //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis dam bca' ba la yang mtshungs par dgongs nas dam bca' ba bsgrub par bya bar brjod nas rjes su dpag pa ston par byed par 'dod pa la tshig zur gyis dam bca' ba'i tshig brjod pa'i dpe nyid du nye bar bkod pa yin no //
translated: The master, thinking that the thesis is similar, having stated the thesis to be established, wishes to teach the inference, and he sets forth the example, which is the statement of the thesis in a different way.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i tshig nges par sbyor pa'i ngag la ni dper na dam bca' ba'i tshig bzhin du sgrub par byed tshig nges par sbyor bar byed pa'i ngag gang yin pa la zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i tshig nges par sbyor pa'i ngag la ni dper na dam bca' ba'i tshig bzhin du sgrub par byed tshig nges par sbyor bar byed pa'i ngag gang yin pa la zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu ste /
translated: In the case of a statement that definitely employs the words of the proof, the statement that definitely employs the words of the proof is the effect, just like the words of the thesis.

original: 'di spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di spangs pa yin no //
translated: This is what is abandoned.

original: don zlos par brjod pa nyid kyis khong du chud pa'i phyir logs shig tu brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: don zlos par brjod pa nyid kyis khong du chud pa'i phyir logs shig tu brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: Because it is understood by the mere statement of the meaning that is repeated, it should not be stated separately.

original: dpe ni sgra gcig gis bstan pa'i don de bstan zin pa sgra gzhan gyis bstan pa yin na don med pa de bzhin du shugs kyis go ba'i don yin na don yang bzlas nas brjod pa nyid bsdus pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dpe ni sgra gcig gis bstan pa'i don de bstan zin pa sgra gzhan gyis bstan pa yin na don med pa de bzhin du shugs kyis go ba'i don yin na don yang bzlas nas brjod pa nyid bsdus pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The example is this: just as the meaning that is taught by one sound is taught again by another sound, and is therefore meaningless, in the same way, if the meaning is understood by implication, the meaning is also redundant.

original: dam bca' ba brjod pa don gyis go bar gyur ba 'di bzlas pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: dam bca' ba brjod pa don gyis go bar gyur ba 'di bzlas pas ci zhig bya /
translated: What is the use of repeating what is understood by implication?

original: yang bzlas pa brjod pa ni @129a * //
analyzed: yang bzlas pa brjod pa ni @129a * //
translated: The statement of the thesis is understood by implication.ğŸ”½What is the use of repeating it?ğŸ”½The statement of the proof is the statement of a definite application.

original: tshar gcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes pa ni sgrub par byed pa nges pa'i sbyor ba brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa'o //
analyzed: tshar gcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes pa ni sgrub par byed pa nges pa'i sbyor ba brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the very statement.

original: yang bsgrub par byas pa 'di nyid go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i don la skyon du 'gyu la /
analyzed: yang bsgrub par byas pa 'di nyid go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i don la skyon du 'gyu la /
translated: Moreover, this very statement of the thesis is faulty in terms of the meaning of what is to be understood and what understands it.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i ngag kho na la nges par sbyor ba'i tshig la yang 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i ngag kho na la nges par sbyor ba'i tshig la yang 'jug pa yin no //
translated: It is also faulty in terms of the statement of the proof, which is a statement of a definite application.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being shown.

original: gang gi tshe dbang po sgra'i don la dpyod pa na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dbang po sgra'i don la dpyod pa na /
translated: When the sense faculty is investigating the meaning of the word,

original: yang rtog pa dang ldan pas shin tu dpyod par byed pa yod pa yin la ston pa po'i de bzhin du 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: yang rtog pa dang ldan pas shin tu dpyod par byed pa yod pa yin la ston pa po'i de bzhin du 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: it is still investigating, since it is endowed with thought.

original: de yang tshig gzhan gyis bsgrub byar sgrub par byed de de nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de yang tshig gzhan gyis bsgrub byar sgrub par byed de de nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: And that is established by another statement, which should be applied in the same way.ğŸ”½But it is not the case for the rest.

original: lhag ma ni ma yin no zhes smras pa de'i skyon ni gzhan du na ma yin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni ma yin no zhes smras pa de'i skyon ni gzhan du na ma yin no //
translated: The fault of that statement is not in another place.

original: gang gi tshe snying rje gzhan dbang du gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyu mtshan gyi tshogs pas yid du 'ong ba lta bu'i phyir rgol ba rnams dang slob ma rnams rig byed pa'i lam du 'jug pa'i 'bad pas yang bzlas nas brjod pa la yang skyon med do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe snying rje gzhan dbang du gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyu mtshan gyi tshogs pas yid du 'ong ba lta bu'i phyir rgol ba rnams dang slob ma rnams rig byed pa'i lam du 'jug pa'i 'bad pas yang bzlas nas brjod pa la yang skyon med do //
translated: When the assembly of causes of the mind that is under the control of compassion is like a pleasant object, there is no fault in repeating the statement with effort in order to engage the opponents and students in the path of understanding.

original: de nyid bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa /
translated: That is explained:

original: rgol ba pos 'bad pas ston par byed cing brjod pas 'jug pa thos pa dang rtogs pa yang dag pa ma yin par dgos pa byed par 'gyur ba yang dag pa ma yin pa'i thos pa dang rtogs pa'i don du yang dang yang du brjod par bya ba
analyzed: rgol ba pos 'bad pas ston par byed cing brjod pas 'jug pa thos pa dang rtogs pa yang dag pa ma yin par dgos pa byed par 'gyur ba yang dag pa ma yin pa'i thos pa dang rtogs pa'i don du yang dang yang du brjod par bya ba
translated: The opponent, by exerting himself, teaches and expresses for the sake of false hearing and understanding, which serve no purpose, and he should express himself again and again for the sake of false hearing and understanding.

original: yin no // ma yin te: yul ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni pha rol po'o //
analyzed: yin no // ma yin te: yul ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni pha rol po'o //
translated: The opponent says, â€œNo, because it is not an object.â€

original: rgol ba 'di ni bla ma yin la phyir rgol ba 'di ni slob ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: rgol ba 'di ni bla ma yin la phyir rgol ba 'di ni slob ma yin pa ste /
translated: This opponent is the teacher and this respondent is the student,

original: rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba gnyi ga yang phan tshun rgyal bar 'dod pas rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba gnyi ga yang phan tshun rgyal bar 'dod pas rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because both the opponent and the respondent are desirous of mutual victory, since they are intent on destroying each other.

original: de'i phyir rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba 'bad pas bstan par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba 'bad pas bstan par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the opponent and the respondent should not teach with exertion.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni slob dpon no //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni slob dpon no //
translated: The master says, â€œNo.â€

original: gal te phyir rgol ba la bstan par bya bas dbang pos gnod pa mi za bar khong du chud de de rtogs pa kho nas dbang po rgyal ba yin la /
analyzed: gal te phyir rgol ba la bstan par bya bas dbang pos gnod pa mi za bar khong du chud de de rtogs pa kho nas dbang po rgyal ba yin la /
translated: If the opponent is taught, he will understand without being harmed by the sense faculties. Just by understanding that, the sense faculties are victorious.

original: de lta ma yin na pham pa yin pa'i phyir ji ltar dpang pos khong du chud par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na pham pa yin pa'i phyir ji ltar dpang pos khong du chud par mi 'gyur /
translated: If that is not so, then how could the sense faculties understand, since there would be a defeat?

original: gzhan yang nges par dpang po bzhin du phyir rgol bas kyang khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang nges par dpang po bzhin du phyir rgol bas kyang khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: Moreover, just like the witness, the opponent must also understand.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ma bstan na skyon du brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma bstan na skyon du brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if it is not taught, it is said to be a fault.

original: de yang sgra la ltos nas 'jug pa dang nges par byed do //
analyzed: de yang sgra la ltos nas 'jug pa dang nges par byed do //
translated: And that is engaged in and ascertained in dependence on sound.

original: gal te dpang po 'jug pa la bstan par byed pa med par 'gyur ba de'i phyir khyed kyis rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba @129b dag lan gsum du brjod pa'i don la ma rtogs pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas su bshad pa gang yin pa de dang 'gal ba
analyzed: gal te dpang po 'jug pa la bstan par byed pa med par 'gyur ba de'i phyir khyed kyis rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba @129b dag lan gsum du brjod pa'i don la ma rtogs pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas su bshad pa gang yin pa de dang 'gal ba
translated: If the witness were to engage without being taught, then that would contradict what you said, namely that the proponent and opponent are to be refuted if they do not understand the meaning of the three statements.

original: yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: gang yang 'di zhes bya ba brjod pa de ma grub ste phyir rgol ba 'di slob ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang yang 'di zhes bya ba brjod pa de ma grub ste phyir rgol ba 'di slob ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But that is not so, because the opponent is a student.

original: de kho na nyid shes pa don du gnyer ba'i slob ma la bstan par bya ba yin pa las gzhan mtshan nyid ni de la med do //
analyzed: de kho na nyid shes pa don du gnyer ba'i slob ma la bstan par bya ba yin pa las gzhan mtshan nyid ni de la med do //
translated: It is to be taught to a student who is seeking to know reality, but not to anyone else, because there is no other characteristic.

original: de ltar gyur pa'i phyir rgol ba ci'i phyir slob ma yin //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i phyir rgol ba ci'i phyir slob ma yin //
translated: Why is the opponent a student?

original: de kho na nyid don du gnyer ba 'di phyir rgol ba ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ba brjod pa ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de kho na nyid don du gnyer ba 'di phyir rgol ba ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ba brjod pa ci zhig bya /
translated: What is the point of saying that this one who is seeking to know reality is not an opponent?

original: de gnyis ka yang ldang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: de gnyis ka yang ldang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so //
translated: Because both are standing, is unreasonable.

original: sngar rgyal bar 'dod pa'i smra ba dag dgag par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar rgyal bar 'dod pa'i smra ba dag dgag par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because previously the desire to win was refuted.

original: de lta na yang 'di 'bad pas bstan par bya ba ma yin na yang drang srung gis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod pa'i nges par byas pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang 'di 'bad pas bstan par bya ba ma yin na yang drang srung gis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod pa'i nges par byas pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Even so, because the opponent has made a promise to state his position three times, it is to be taught with effort, even though it is not to be taught.

original: de'i phyir lan gsum gyi bar du brjod pa'i tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir lan gsum gyi bar du brjod pa'i tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, the text says, up to three times he should state his case.

original: 'di gzhan du 'chad par 'gyur ba las bstan par bya ste /ğŸ”½gal te re zhig gzhan la bstan pa'i don du 'jug na lan gsum gyi bar du ci'i phyir brjod par bya /
analyzed: 'di gzhan du 'chad par 'gyur ba las bstan par bya ste / gal te re zhig gzhan la bstan pa'i don du 'jug na lan gsum gyi bar du ci'i phyir brjod par bya /
translated: This will be explained below.ğŸ”½If he is speaking for the sake of teaching others, why should he speak up to three times?ğŸ”½Even if he speaks in that way, if the other person is not convinced, what is the point of speaking up to three times?

original: ji ltar brjod pa de ltar des rtogs par bya ba'i don yin pa de lta na yang gzhan du gdung bar 'gyur bas lan gsum gyi bar du brjod pa ci zhig bya /
analyzed: ji ltar brjod pa de ltar des rtogs par bya ba'i don yin pa de lta na yang gzhan du gdung bar 'gyur bas lan gsum gyi bar du brjod pa ci zhig bya /
translated: If the opponent does not understand the meaning of the words, he should be taught the meaning of the words. If he does not understand the meaning of the sentence, he should be taught the meaning of the sentence. analyzed: sgra dang don dag zlos pa'i tshig gis go bar bya ba 'am /

analyzed: don zlos pa'i tshig gis tha dad med par sgrub par byed do //

analyzed: tshig nges par sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gtan tshigs dang dpe lhag pa'i skyon yin no //

analyzed: byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gcig las ni don med par brjod pa'i phyir ro //

original: skyon du mi 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: skyon du mi 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
translated: It is said, It is not a fault in the various stories.

original: gang gi yin zhe na /ğŸ”½gtan tshigs la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi yin zhe na / gtan tshigs la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o //

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /

analyzed: ma dpyad pa'i don gcig pa bsgrub pa'i dbang du byas nas don 'di bsgrub par bya ba'i don du gnyer ba'i phyir byas pa'o //

analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs dang chos can gyi dbang du byas nas don dang lhan cig tu sgrub par byed pas don sgrub par byed pa ste bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pa'o //

analyzed: 'di'i don du sgrub par byed pa gcig pa'i phyir ro zhes de skad du bshad do //

translated: Because it is not taken as the subject, it is a variety of stories that are not analyzed, because the opponent is alive, and so on. The subject is a living body, and so on. It is not a subject that is ascertained as a single thing, such as the absence of self, and so on.

analyzed: de bzhin du du ma'i gtan tshigs ni 'on kyang de gcig ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: 'di nyid rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du brjod pa ni /
translated: This is stated in order,

original: don sna tshogs la sgrub par 'dod pa 'am sgrub par byed pa sna tshogs par 'dod pa'i nyan pa'i sngon du sgrub par byed pa smos pa ni dngos po sgrub par byed pa'i phyir grub pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: don sna tshogs la sgrub par 'dod pa 'am sgrub par byed pa sna tshogs par 'dod pa'i nyan pa'i sngon du sgrub par byed pa smos pa ni dngos po sgrub par byed pa'i phyir grub pa'i tshig go //

analyzed: phyis rgyu sgrub par byed pa'i phyir gtan tshigs smos so //

analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs la sogs pa mang po dang tshig mang pos sgrub par byed par nges pa'o //

original: tshig la skyon med do //
analyzed: tshig la skyon med do //
translated: There is no fault in the words.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: brtags zin pa la brtag par byar med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: yang gi sgras ni zlos par byed pa lhag ma'i nang du ji ltar 'du bar 'gyur zhe na /

analyzed: bshad pa rnam grangs kyi sgrar btags pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan gnyis pa ni gtan tshigs gcig bstan pa'i yul la 'jug pa yin te /

analyzed: bstan par bya ba'i yul bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: don yang bstan pa la sa tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no //

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /

analyzed: 'di ltar chos mthun pa'i spyir ba byas nas chos mi mthun pa'i dpe sbyor ba'i don zlos pa'i dper brjod par bshad do //

analyzed: gang yang brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa spong bar byed pa go sla'o //

analyzed: phyir rgol ba gang yin pa ni lan brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba dang 'brel pa /

analyzed: cig char lan gsum brjod pas na rjes su smra ba med pa zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes ba shes par bya ba'i don to //

translated: The meaning of without response is that the opponent says, I do not accept the reason, and the proponent of the thesis says, If you do not accept the reason, then you have no basis for refuting the position of others.

original: bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of this is that since there is no basis, there is no refutation.

analyzed: khyed kyis bshad pa 'di yin no zhes brjod na sun 'byin pa brjod par bya'o //

original: de lta na sun 'byin pa brjod pas kyang bsgrub par brjod pa'i rjes su bzlas nas lan brjod par bya dgos pa de'i phyir 'di gnyi ga yang tshar gcad pa'i gnas so //

translated: In that case, since you must state the response by repeating the statement of the refutation, both of these are grounds for defeat.

analyzed: 'di ba ra dva dzas re zhig ma mthong ba spod par byed pa ni /

analyzed: gal te lan gyi sgo nas nges par yongs su shes pa 'di ni tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin zhe na /

analyzed: dam bca' ba brjod pa med pa zhes bya ba de nyid yin gyi rten med par gzhan gyi phyogs dgag pa med pa brjod pa ni mi rigs pa'i lan ma brjod pa zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas su rigs pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di tsam
translated: This is the mere statement of the thesis. It is not reasonable to state a reply that does not express the refutation of the opponentâ€™s position without a basis. This is the mere statement of the reply.

original: ni pha rol gyi gzhung ngo //
analyzed: ni pha rol gyi gzhung ngo //
translated: This is the opponentâ€™s position.

original: 'dir slob dpon gyis sun 'byin pa rtsom pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir slob dpon gyis sun 'byin pa rtsom pa ni /

original: gal te rgol ba rang gi sgrub par byed @131a * //

translated: If the proponent does not state a reason,

analyzed: pa'i don gyi rten zol gyis zhar la 'ongs pa gzhan dang gzhan smra bar 'gyur ba ni sngar dper brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: The other things that are mentioned incidentally are like the examples given above.

analyzed: ri dang khang bzangs la sogs pa blo sngon du song ba rgyus byas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'o //
translated: The proposition is that mountains, buildings, etc. are produced by causes that are preceded by the cognition of them.

analyzed: lus la sogs pa bstan pa'i zol gyis ma lus pa'i rgyud brjod pa yin no //

analyzed: dper na shes par 'dod pa'i don tsam bshad pa ji ltar rgyas par byed /
translated: For example, how does the mere explanation of the object that is to be known become an elaboration?

analyzed: gang gi tshe rgol ba rgyas par byed pas ci zhig byed ces sbyor ro //

analyzed: dper na ci 'dus byas pas 'di thams cad skad cig ma yin nam ma yin zhes rtsod pa'i dngos po nyid la sogs pa'i spyi la brten nas de la brten pa dang de'i yul mngon sum la sogs pa shes pa rang gi bdag nyid du grub pa de

analyzed: de med na zhes bya ba ni de dag gi lan mi shes pa dag med par 'gyur ro //
